Comment: Professor Clark was helpful even though lectures were a bit dry.  He gives a good background to the work he is covering and helps you understand the history of the time.  Worth going to lecture for sure!  He is a very knowledgeable instructor.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Jennifer Radke ENG100
Comment: you really have to do the reading and go to lecture to get a good grade. grade is based on two exams and the final, attendance and participation are not considered, he's a tough grader, he explains a lot of the readings in class but at the end of his sentences, he lowers his voice, so you really have to listen. boring class, but informative.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Jennifer Radke PHDEXAMS
Comment: Can make your blood freeze during the orals but definitely motivates you to know your stuff.  An expert on both colonial and 20c American lit.  Good to have on your dissertation committee b/c he's so well-connected professionally.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Jennifer Radke HCC1A
Comment: Okay, what was with the maps? Half of his lectures were dedicated to unnecessary historical and geographical background. He was an okay lecturer, but not really interesting. At all.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Jennifer Radke BIO104
Comment: GREAT TEACHER!  VERY HELPFUL, WILLING TO WORK WITH YOU ON ANYTHING.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Jennifer Radke HUMCO1A
Comment: Excellent lecturer. Clear and doesn't beat around the bush when getting his point across. Though it can get boring at times because of the material, he's still a really good professor.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Jennifer Radke BIO110
Comment: easy teacher with completely easy exams if you are in need of an A go for it.  Labs were boring and easily completed

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Jennifer Radke BIO103
Comment: Willing to help, easy to listen to, uses humor on a regular basis. Lots of work, especially the labs and out of class requirements.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Jennifer Radke ENG24
Comment: Professor Radke is awesome  Take her she''s an easy A

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Jennifer Radke HUMCORE
Comment: Professor Clark's lectures were the most interesting this quarter. He used a lot of visuals and had great connections between the three books he covered. He was very interesting and I would definitely recommend him.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Jennifer Radke HUMCORE1A
Comment: He was an okay lecturer, he spoke loadly and knew his material, even though at times he could be a bit boring.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Jennifer Radke BIO103
Comment: All of the test answers are in the notes.  She's very helpful if you have any questions.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Jennifer Radke HCORE1A
Comment: you reallyyyy have to pay attention in his lectures because his outline for his notes are very minimalist. he uses a LOT of pictures and he seems like a way chill person. overall, a pretty good lecturer

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Jennifer Radke HUMH1B
Comment: Very clear and concise lecturer. He improved my comprehension and understanding of the texts in HumCore.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Natalie Serianni ENG112
Comment: yes, she is an awesome teacher, the class was so fun and exciting, even though it was at 8:30 in the morning.  i don't want to take another english class without her.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Natalie Serianni ENGLISH
Comment: I wish you were still my teacher

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Natalie Serianni ENG100
Comment: Prof Clark is wonderful! You have to read, attend class and use your brain! If you make the effort, Clark will work with you. Attend office hours and introduce yourself to him. He is extremely helpful and understanding if you have any issues with the material or the class in general. Read the material, Show up, take notes, and you will do fine!

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Natalie Serianni ENGLISH
Comment: She is an awesome teacher, she is smart, she is nice, and best of all she is so hot.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Natalie Serianni ENGLI100
Comment: Great teacher. She introduced great ideas and strong structure. She opened the classroom into a debate setting which worked well. One of the best teachers I've been exposed to.

Teacher Name: Trinity Bible College - Ben McIntosh ENG100
Comment: English 100 is the worst English course I have ever taken.Theory is something you either love or hate (I hated it).You might as well take this professor because he's better than Warminski. You must attend class and you have to take very detailed notes. I'm an A/B student and I studied my ass off for this class, but still got a B-

Teacher Name: Trinity Bible College - Ben McIntosh BUSI157
Comment: My favorite professor at Trinity

Teacher Name: Trinity Bible College - Ben McIntosh PERSONALFINANC
Comment: Good Prof

Teacher Name: Trinity Bible College - Ben McIntosh MARKETING101
Comment: Great professor and awesome class!

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC250
Comment: Good instructor and gave feedback quickly. One thing that I have to say is that the tests were a HARD.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC205
Comment: Dr. Zucco is a good professor. Provided good feedback on assignments. He does grade a little hard, but is fair and consistent.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC135
Comment: Was very helpful and understanding, was a little unclear of expectations at first but became more clear as the class progressed, overall had a good experience

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC135
Comment: Got more from the class than anticipate from the beginning.  Dr Z was helpful and the feedback was appreciated.  Would take another class with Dr Z anytime.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC135
Comment: I enjoyed the class, learned a lot and was able to communicate easily with Professor Zucco. The assignments were hard and the feedback he gave was very helpful. I thought he was fair, impartial, helpful, and very familiar with the subject. Not only would I recommend this class I would defiantly recommend this professor.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC135
Comment: He made the class interesting. Was understanding about allowing late work. Very helpful.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC135
Comment: I did not enjoy this course at all. My GPA drastically dropped due to this course. I either did not understand the assignments due to me being a retard or they weren't clear. I will give him, that he challenges his students. But other than that I have nothing positive to say.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC135
Comment: Dr. Zucco was a very good professor. He was knowledgeable in the subject and answered any questions about the assignments the same day. The course was a bit challenging but I also learned a good bit from it. This was the first sociology class I have ever taken, I got a lot out of it and would recommend the class and the professor to others.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco ETHIC107
Comment: Made class more interesting, showed willingness to help students understand material

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC135
Comment: Dr Zucco definitely believed in thoroughness but made it very clear what was looked for in a response.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC135
Comment: Dr. Z., was fair and impartial. While the class was difficult for me, I found that his teachings and feedback, allowed me to take more information out of the course, than I had anticipated. As such, I am certain it will stick with me long after I have graduated.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC135
Comment: Feedback was extremely helpful.  I got more out of the class than I anticipated from the beginning.  Would take another class with Professor Z anyday.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC135
Comment: Teacher was knowledgeable about information. A standard was set and was expected to be kept, we also were not just given an assignment without clear direct and help when we needed it. We also were not just walked through the class just because we did as we were asked. Overall great professor and class just challenging enough to enjoy.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC250
Comment: I enjoyed this class

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco COC135
Comment: Very timely with his grading which is very helpful.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Raymond Zucco SOC135
Comment: Knowledgeable professor who maintained a clear expectation.  Could use a bit on effective praise.  Nice to know what I did was correct, but why was it so?  What was the process, strategy, or answer that made the assignment "good"?

Teacher Name: Herzing University - Winsome Stephenson ENG100
Comment: This picture is hilarious. He's really nasally and his lectures are boring and dry like his personality. I think he's approach to grading is out of whack.

Teacher Name: Herzing University - Winsome Stephenson ENG100
Comment: AWESOME LECTURER, just PAY ATTENTION and you don't even need to read the text. He's amazing. In Eng 100, the text is heavy and hard to understand, but if you take good notes in class and talk to Clark about things you don't understand, you'll do ok. BUT YOU GOTTA STUDY: seriously, it's not easy, but you can gain so much knowledge from this class.

Teacher Name: Herzing University - Winsome Stephenson NURS560
Comment: This professor does not go by outlines for paper submission. She grades students on different scales, and does not provide clear grading rubric. Students are able to get away with posting discussion information without providing references in initial and peer responses. If there was a choice of selecting this Professor I would NOT.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC101
Comment: Very kind and personable professor. She did go a bit slow at times, and I was often ahead of her myself. But it's an intro. class so you can't expect anything else. If anything she's a great professor for true beginners. Exams are easy if you do the practice exams she puts up beforehand. The class itself(labs)is challenging, but in a good way.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC681
Comment: Extremely nice, caring, compassionate professor.  Tests are appropriately difficult.  Not the easiest class but easy to do well if you study and give it the attention it deserves.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC280
Comment: With any other professor, this class is tough. With her it was a lot easier. I ended up getting an A without much trouble, an impossible feat with other profs. Lectures were from PowerPoint. Homeworks weren't too bad. Tests were hard but not impossible.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC108
Comment: While she is a very kind person, who genuinely does want to help, half the the time she seems like she has no idea what she is doing or talking about. We spend a lot of class time watching her try to figure out how her computer works. She constantly second guesses herself which leaves everyone very confused.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC108
Comment: Just wants to help but was not very good at explaining herself. Her classes are behind the labs so you will show up to lab and just be sitting there clueless and the Lab TA's do not help at all. It's pretty bad because it could have been a great class if taught right.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC108
Comment: She is the best teacher I ever had! I wish I could take her for all my classes.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC108
Comment: She is a very nice woman who definitely means well but most of the time she seems really confused. She spends too much class time going over old material and barely addresses new material that we need to know for labs. We didn't learn Java but were thrown into a java lab. i recommend taking another professor.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC108
Comment: Very good professor who really wants to help her students understand computer science. If you are having trouble understanding the material by all means, go to office hours. She is extremely helpful and will help teach you through the labs explaining the concepts necessary to complete them.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC108
Comment: My favorite teacher in all my years at the University of Delaware. She made learning computer science fun.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC108
Comment: The class is basically based on the lab. Unfortunately the lectures sometimes don't cover lab material in time so you find yourself stuck sometimes. Office hours are going to have to be part of your schedule to pass. Oh, and it's a problem when a computer science professor doesn't know how to hook a laptop up to a projector.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC108
Comment: SHe was very nice and very funny.  Class was easy at first, but got really hard really fast.  She was not helpful, was very bad at explaining things and gave really bad examples.  She did not teach us how to do the assignments for the required lab.  Took way too many hours a week and I was barely able to pass the class.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC108
Comment: I think she is a good teacher. The course itself is very hard, and it's not teacher's fault. overall, her exam is not hard and the lab score is base on the TA you choose.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC101
Comment: Very soft, encouraging, and kind. Gives great feedback and really helps with writing. Does one on one meetings with students in order to make sure each one gets in depth feedback on all papers.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC108
Comment: Dr. McCoy is freaking clown shoes. Like Eli, she is the best mayne, she deed it. That means she's completely awful. She once did check-expects for 40 minutes until she realized she was doing it wrong and then proceeded to correct herself for another 10-15 minutes, and then for the remaining 20 taught the material she intended, poorly at that.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC108
Comment: She means well, but fails at every other aspect. She assumes the class understands what's going on bc she really doesn't. She constantly is second guessing herself which doesn't help the class progress,& she rarely covers a topic before the required lab because she spends too much time taking attendance or doing something wrong. Take w another prof

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC280
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC681
Comment: She is crazy! She is not teaching at all. She is just wasting students time in class and try to arrange extra classes. If you really wanna learn AI avoid her. Try to take from others.Thus I have seen worst TA in my college life.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC280
Comment: Good teacher for a hard class. :)

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC890
Comment: On new graduate student orientation, professor McCoy as our chair gave an inspirational speech to welcome everyone. She has the vision of a real scientist, and her speech connects to my heart. I feel that I could be someone that really use my research to change the world. I want to thank her for extending my funding, a great caring professor.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Kathleen McCoy CISC882
Comment: Very good prof. Took 3 classes with her. Tends to give good grades if you give a decent effort. Some classes are focused very much around discussion instead of technical learning ... for better or worse.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Cara Davis MUS072D001
Comment: She knows how to have a good time as well as get done what needs to be done. Even if I'm having a terrible day I always leave choir with a smile because of her bubbly personality and her ability to make everyone laugh. To begin with I was a quiet and shy singer, now thanks to her help I'm a more confident singer!

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Cara Davis MUS170
Comment: She was very understanding and accommodating of those less musically inclined.  She attempted to clarify assignments, but it's sometimes difficult in an online learning environment.  She was really gung-ho at the beginning of the semester, but seemed to lose some interest as the semester came to a close.  Pretty easy grader!

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Cara Davis MUS287
Comment: Everything about this class was essentially easy peasy except for the fact that the chapters are very long and you don't know what the test will be on-you'll have to raw and memorize the entire book to do well. You pretty much have to learn everything on your own.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Cara Davis MUS287
Comment: This woman is horribly unclear and will not help you with anything you have questions on. If she does respond, she is rude and shows no effort for empathy or compassion. It was a mistake to take this class. I have never had a more disrespectful professor.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Cara Davis MUS278
Comment: This was one of my favorite classes of all time.  Whenever I asked a question, the professor was there with an answer.  She gave solid feedback on all assignments.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Cara Davis CHORUS
Comment: She's hilarious. Ask her about Juan. As long as you show up to class and concerts and write a one page paper you guaranteed an A. I'd recommend anyone who likes to sing to take it.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Cara Davis MUS170
Comment: I loved this teacher and loved this class. This teacher was really good at giving positive feedback which in my opinion, was very helpful. Her assignments were fun and I got a lot out of this class.  I would recommend this class to anyone.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Cara Davis MUS238
Comment: She is a great teacher, so easy! Any of her classes are great to take. She's super funny, and makes class enjoyable.

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson GENG221
Comment: Dr Johnson is amazing. I know way more about CS Lewis than I ever wanted but he made the class as easy as possible. Reading quiz every class but they're easy questions and you grade it yourself; at the very least sparknote it and you'll do okay. Gives random points out, but 2 big papers he grades pretty tough on. Weird but easy and enjoyable GenEd

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson ENG299
Comment: One of the sweetest professors. I took his 299 class last year and am currently enrolled in his Grammar 309 course this semester. He's not the easiest professor, he expects a lot of self-learning out of his students and quizzes heavily. Although, he is incredibly flexible and willing to help through office hours! Highly recommended!

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson ENG410
Comment: Bruce is amazing! I took his Eng 299 class and loved it. He makes a lot of quizzes and his answers are pretty specific, so make sure to read. Before a paper is due, go to his office hours. He is really helpful and it will likely boost your grade for the paper. Several opportunities for extra credit.

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson GENG221
Comment: Very nice man. Most of the class time consisted of discussions about the material read the night before. He will call on random people to participate in the discussions. His tests are hard but the papers were not too bad (you have 3 of them). Lectures can be confusing and hard to follow but otherwise good professor

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson ENG309
Comment: He is the sweetest. He really wants to help you. He teaches at the pace the class can handle which I really appreciated. If we were not ready to be quizzed on a topic, he would wait until he felt like we were ready. You have to do the homework and put in the effort. If you want to do the minimal amount of work, this is not the class for you.

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson ENG309
Comment: Johnson is the sweetest! He really cares about his students, whether that means success in his class or outside it. Some people in my class complained that they couldn't follow what he was saying, but they can't expect to vibe well with every professor they meet. Johnson really does his best to make grammar as easy to digest as possible! Take him!!

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson ENG309
Comment: He gives at least 1-2 quizzes per class and then you switch quizzes with a partner and grade them. And then, he goes down the attendance list and everyone reads their grade-not good. and this happens-every single class.

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson ENG299
Comment: Definitely suggest taking him. Interesting readings, great lectures, funny guy. He can be a bit of a tough grader on papers, but it will only make you better, and he's totally willing to work with you. Great class, awesome professor!

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson ENG299
Comment: Can't say enough good things about him. Interesting reading material, interesting discussion, & he is very knowledgeable but not unapproachable at all. When you turn in final drafts of papers he lets you get peer edits & then change things on the paper you turn in at the last minute, it's very helpful. You will learn a lot & feel motivated by him.

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson GHUM200
Comment: This has been my favorite professor so far at JMU. Really nice and cool guy. It does require reading almost every night and small quizzes on the reading that are graded by ur classmates. If you are willing to do the reading, you can come out with an A in this class.

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson ENG299
Comment: Johnson is the man! Love his class. His is so nice and super helpful when it comes to giving feedback. He wants you to be successful & states exactly what he expects from you. lets you venture your own path when it comes to the writing assignments (theres 3). There are daily quizzes in this class but if you do the readings, they arent hard at all.

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson GENG221
Comment: Johnson is really intelligent and interesting. I really enjoyed this class even though, i'm usually more of a science person. TAKE HIM! He really isn't that bad. The only reason I got a very high B is because I screwed up the midterm b/c of mono. One of the best profs at JMU i've had so far.

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson ENG309
Comment: Professor Johnson is like if a smile was a person. I'm not a massive fan of grammar, but he made it fun, useful, and easy. I love this man with my entire soul

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson ENG299
Comment: I really liked Dr. Johnson! He chooses interesting pieces for reading material, and you have discussions in class. There were 3 papers and a midterm and final, and quizzes almost every class. It may sound daunting, but it really isn't once you get into the swing of things! I would definitely take this class again!

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson GENG221
Comment: I LOVE BRUCE.  Such a cool guy and one of the BEST english profs I have ever had.  I read the assinged books and worked hard on the papers but i loved it!  I had more fun and learned more in his class than several classes combined.  TAKE Bruce but be prepared to write thorogh papers

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson HON300
Comment: Johnson is really cool. I had my doubts about this class but he makes it a lot of fun. Expect lots of class discussions with very few actual lectures. There are three papers, a midterm, a final, and some quizzes spread throughout the semester. The papers aren't that hard and he gives you clear instructions. Would take again.

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson ENG310
Comment: a great professor who genuinely cares about his students and trusts them. he is a personable guy and respects everyone's opinions. attendance isn't taken but there are quizzes each class. even though I was allowed two skips I didn't take any because I actually wanted to be in class.

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson GHUM200
Comment: Bruce Johnson is the best teacher I have ever had. He really wants you to do well in the class. Go to class every day because there are daily quizzes on the readings assigned. There are 3 papers which are definitely challenging so don't leave them until the last minute. Great class, Johnson is funny and knows what hes talking about.

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson ENG315
Comment: The class was titled "17th Century British Poetry" & should have been titled "17th Century British History" Although he is a nice guy & a good teacher, he was not good at teaching this class. We rarely discussed the poems and the paper assignments were unreasonable and vague. My advice, take Johnson but a different class that he teaches.

Teacher Name: James Madison University - Bruce Johnson ENG321
Comment: I LOVE BRUCE! He's a really funny and just nice guy.  Super helpful and always willing to answer questions (even if that means going way off-topic).  I'm definitely going to take him again.  Work load isn't too bad as long as you keep up with the readings for the mini quizzes in class.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Michael Joslin LIT331
Comment: A good professor. He is really nice, and will do alot to help you out. Depending on the material he is kinda difficult and there is ALOT of reading but the classes are interesting.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Michael Joslin HUMANITIES
Comment: Excellent teacher! Dr. J was my teacher in several classes a couple of years ago, and not only is he extremely intelligent, but he works hard to make every student feel important and will help in any way possible. He's great!

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Michael Joslin JOURNALISM
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Michael Joslin ENG421
Comment: Expects a lot of you, tough class. Dr. Joslin is nice enough if you take the time to speak with him, and will help you whenever you need it.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Michael Joslin LIT240
Comment: Lessons are backward for complicated readings, he simplifies lesson and readings AFTER he has you read the long assignment and mas you take a quiz which "are supposed to help your grade". Many friends express concern and confusion upon their struggle to understand readings.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Michael Joslin LIT240
Comment: He's a really good professor. I suppose many students would find him somewhat difficult, but he teaches you a great deal. He doesn't change his method of teaching to fit the class, which is both a strength and a weakness. Definitely one of the best professors at LMC.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Mary Dereshiwsky BUS210
Comment: I wish I got a hard text with this course.  Otherwise, I wish I had access to practice questions that would have helped.  Many questions in statistics can be answered via programs.  None were given by the school.  However, my instructor was great!  YouTube videos saved me in this course.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Anita Klatkiewicz SP001
Comment: Excellent instructor, kept the class engaging and fun.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Anita Klatkiewicz SPANISH
Comment: This teacher is  train wreck!  She has no clue what she is teaching.  Disorganized, lethargic, poorly preped---I can't believe the UW syastem has her on staff.  Egads!  She is awful.  What a waste of time and tuition.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Anita Klatkiewicz SPANISH
Comment: This instructor is useless.  She knows nothing aboout the Spanish language or teaching it.  What a waste of my time and money.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Anita Klatkiewicz INTROSPAN
Comment: She is a terrible teacher and I am very unsatisfied with the quality of the course.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Anita Klatkiewicz SPA101
Comment: Excellent Professor.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Anita Klatkiewicz SPANISH
Comment: Where do I begin?  I learned more in middle school Spanish than I did from this instructor.   She is so poorly prepared for class.   No energy.  Her accent is so bad, she seems like a person mocking smeone with a bad Spanish accent.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Anita Klatkiewicz SPANISH
Comment: A wasted semester.  I want my money back! I want my 14 weeks back!   I could have taught this class better than she did.  She is vey disorganized and has little knowledge of the subject matter.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Anita Klatkiewicz SPAII
Comment: Worst teacher in the world this women should not be teaching! She is never prepared and i didnt learn a single thing waste of fricken money, now she is teaching at a new university this women should NEVER be in the front of a classroom ever again!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC450
Comment: I love love love this class! Very interesting and engaging. Professor Carrion is challenging but casual and friendly. He is a very smart man and does an incredible job of explaining different topics. I do not have a single complaint about him or the class and I definitely would recommend him to other students.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC426
Comment: Excellent professor. Highly recommend his course. Very knowledgeable and friendly.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC426
Comment: Dr. Carrion is amazing. He is so funny, passionate and knowledgeable about everything. It's really important to do the readings in order to do well on the exams, but I sort of did them and pulled off a B+. His class wasn't a joke but it was really interesting and enjoyable. I highly recommend him and this class!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC100
Comment: great teacher, always willing to help, funny and smart

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC426
Comment: Mi estimado Carrin, always be looking out for you. I love his class. I would definitely take his class if I could. Very clear: 4  short essays, 2 exams and 1 take home (12-15 page paper).

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC450
Comment: Four 4-5 page reflection papers, two all written exams, one group speech project and one final take home 10-12 page essay. There's a fair amount of writing in the class, but it isn't terrible because he's not a super tough grader. You have to put in work in the class, but show an interest, work hard and you can get an A.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC100
Comment: Nice guy..funny..he goes over tests after TA grades and makes them better

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC450
Comment: Two tests and a final paper. He gives out study guides for the tests, but not only a few days ahead of time, so there isn't much time to do them. He uses the same questions from the study guides on the tests. He seems to know everything about Latin America.  Would definitely recommend a class with him.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC300
Comment: The whole class is Dr. Carrion reading off of slides that are word for word from the textbook. The TA was super unhelpful and could not correctly answer questions with problems in lab. The lab portion was a waste of time, only one or two concepts from lab was applicable for the final paper.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC100
Comment: Write your opinion and views on the test.. understanding over memorizatiion

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC
Comment: How does he not have a chili pepper yet? He's so cute!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC100
Comment: nicest guy ever. very funny/nerdy. go to class, he's helpful and really sweet!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC450
Comment: Great professor, very smart and incredibly helpful.  Fair grader, you will learn so much.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion 100
Comment: Julio is THE MAN-study guides are right on target. hes so cute too!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC426
Comment: Highly recommended. Great professor who cares about his students. 2 exams, take home final, and 4 easy short response essays. There is a fair amount of reading and material, but it's straightforward.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC270
Comment: Great teacher, makes things easy to understand. Really important to go to his exam reviews, they help so much if you have missed a class or two.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC426
Comment: Two exams and one final paper are all that is needed for this class. You can show up to class, but as long as you read the assigned papers a week before the exam, you should be fine in this class.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion HIST102
Comment: If he's as good at barbecue as his son is then this guy is legit!!!!!!! Also adorable!!!!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC300
Comment: Only took this class since it was required for all Political Science majors, but it has no actual politics discussed. He gives weekly hw assignments and three or four tests, all written no multiple choice. Plus you have to learn to program SPSS and write a 14 page on it. Did not enjoy but got through it. Said he'd curve the class but never did...

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Julio Carrion POSC426
Comment: Great teacher.  Helpful

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: The best professor by far! He knows his stuff & is very passionate about Genetics. He really wants you to learn. Exams are tough!! Not an easy class but he makes an 8am class very exciting every time. He does NOT curve!! I learned a lot in this class. Make sure you do the assigned homework questions. Do practice exam. He is always ready to help!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: Dr. Smith is somehow able to take an 8am class about bacteria and make it interesting enough to stay awake for! His lectures are very interesting, and he is very easy to find outside of class if you have questions. Exams are tough, but he gives you old exams to practice off of.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: I was excited for this class, but the first few months were dedicated to punnett squares and simple mathematical calculation. Then suddenly everything became route memorization. Tough. Note: Do not do the difficult book problems he assigns for the first exam. There will generally only be easy ones on it. -READ THE BOOK-STUDY OLD EXAMS LIKE WOAH-

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: i had him for genetics, micro, and bacterial evolution and he is by far my favorite prof here. very personable and knowledgeable. excellent at teaching the material. must study, go to class, and read tho to get a good grade

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: Amazing professor. Never fell asleep for a lecture - presents material very well. Difficult class (all BISC classes 400+ are) unless you keep up with the readings and go to his office hours. Beware the 1st Exam in Genetics - use the practice exams he gives you. You WILL learn Genetics in this class.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: Dr. Smith is extremely knowledgeable and enthusiastic about his area of study and it clearly shows in his teaching. The material is challenging, but you should do okay if you pay attention and take good notes. The lab section of this class is horrendous, but you just have to grit your teeth and do it. Smith makes 8am class not entirely terrible.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC401
Comment: BEST professor in the Bio department, Its a challenging class, but all 400 level bio classes are, if you do the work, he's more than happy to help you. GO TO STUDY SESSIONS, make sure you study the old exams he gives you a week before the test, they help A LOT. Overall, a hard class but worth it and there is no better professor to take it with.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: Liked him so much for 300 I took him again! Wants his students to do well, holds study sessions @library the night before exams. Gets along with students and is very helpful to them. Enthusiastic about what he teaches, tests are very fair, easy to do well if you study. Will clarify anything you ask. Good teacher, smart prof, great guy.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: Take really good notes in this class, the exams come right out of lectures. Also, study the old test really well (understand all the questions). Overall, he explains things well and is willing to help you. Not too hard of a class, but make sure you study and UNDERSTAND concepts. Read over the assigned readings, it may help clear up some concepts.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: Dr. Smith is very enthusiastic and knowledgeable about genetics. However, is exams are very tough. Be sure to thoroughly understand his notes and previous exams.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: The man came off very distant, cranky, and rude. Can recall when he actually kicked me out of his office for asking too many question.  Regardless, the guy is still the best BISC403 prof in UD. His lectures are typically clear, and his exams are hard but doable if you put in time with notes, the book, and the practice exams. Scored a B. So can you.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: Very interesting lectures, I didn't fall asleep once and I had him for an 8am. Knows what he teaches and makes it interesting by default somehow. Very easy to want to learn in his class, highly recommended.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC645
Comment: Great class, except the middle third on taxonomy which is very tedious. Not as hard as in micro and genetics. 3 tests, all essays, based on lectures and assigned articles. Most of the class got A's and B's. Take it if you wanna learn something different and interesting and not the usual classical stuff

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: TAKE SMITH!!! This class is a difficult class, but an A is possible. Dr. Smith is extremely helpful and for an 8 AM keeps everyone wide awake. One of the best biology teachers I've ever had I recommend him!! Take Notes on everything, study practice exams, read book and you will get a A or B

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: Dr. Smith is very passionate about what he teaches and usually willing to help. Make sure you go to class and take good notes because tests come straight form the notes. You won't even need to read the book. He is very good at explaining things so that they make sense too. If you have to take this class, definitely take it with Smith!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: Great professor, he's been teaching for over 30 years. He really knows the subject material, but carefully emphasizes the important information. He makes sure his instruction is very clear, because the subject can get pretty murky. He's great to talk to and he makes himself very available for help, especially right before exams.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: I had heard that this class was hard, but it is very easy. If you know how to read, you will do well. If you do not know how to read, you will do well.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: tough class, no curve. i feel that he is prob good to have for multiple classes, but i just took him for micro and found him difficult and uncomfortably approachable. def study old tests and know concepts. lectures are good...if you can stay awake

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: Had him for genetics/micro. BEST professor, absolutely love him! Very helpful, go to him for help during office hours. Any bio class is challenging, but put in the work and you can do well. Make sure you look at old tests. For micro, outline why wrong answers are wrong (test qs are usually re-worded, be careful tho!). Genetics-go to study sessions!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: best prof at delaware. hes tough but all 400 bio classes are. study old tests. go to him for help. attend review sessions. study the book. hardest bio class ive taken but id take this prof again any day. ive taken 3 classes with him cuz hes the best.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Steve Naragon PHIL201
Comment: Steve is the best professor ever! He has a great sense of humor and his lectures are very inspiring and interesting. He will make you think and question so many things that you take for granted. He is extremely helpful and has a great personality.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Steve Naragon ENVIROPHIL
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Steve Naragon PHIL102
Comment: I had this class at 8 am, and I still enjoyed it.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Steve Naragon PHIL318A
Comment: Professor Naragon is a great instructor. He is incredibly intellegent and great to work with. The work in his class is really demanding, but if you're into it it's fun!

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Steve Naragon PHIL101
Comment: NARAGON IS A WONDERFUL PROFESSOR! He truly cares about the subject and makes sure his lectures are thought-out and interesting. LOVE HIM!

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Steve Naragon PHIL311
Comment: Steve is awesome!  He's a lot of fun and very good at what he does:)  I wish I could have minored in philosophy so I could take more classes with him!

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Steve Naragon ENVS401
Comment: Environmental phil. with Naragon was a fun class with lots of debating put into play, if you like that sort of thing. He does not care what your views are but only gives the best info he thinks will help you understand the concepts better. Great Prof.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Steve Naragon PHILOSOPHY
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Steve Naragon PHIL311
Comment: Steve is the coolest philosophy prof :)  Tutorials with him are a blast...never a dull moment!

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Steve Naragon PHIL101
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Steve Naragon PHIL110
Comment: Dr. Naragon uses humor and passion to teach philosophy, a subject that many students find incomprehensible.  I works hard to help his students understand the material.  The readings are fascinating and the subject matter can be life changing.  His class is fairly tough though.  You just have to get into the material to get an A.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Steve Naragon PHIL201
Comment: Tests are hard! Lots of reading, discussion posts due every class period. He will call you out. Easy 5 question quiz every class period based on the reading. Get pictures of quizzes from a former student, they are the same.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Steve Naragon PHIL201
Comment: Steve knows the material inside-out, and cares whether we get it or not.  It's a hard class, but it can change your life.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Iris Chao ENG300
Comment: Grammar class - Not too hard, no essays required for this class - Check your understanding quizzes and HW assignments.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Nina Fisschesser BIO155
Comment: Hard to reach via email, and otherwise. Does not communicate well and is very oblivious

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Nina Fisschesser BIO281
Comment: Nina is not the best teacher, she tends to not respond to emails,and the criteria for her into to rehab is harsh. She requires students to work at the wildlife center for 3-4 shifts a week, and requires 3 weekend shifts. She is not very accommodating for those who have paying jobs on the weekends. However, she is very passionate about what she does

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC
Comment: A very bitter man. You'll never be inspired by him. Otherwise, an easy A if you turn in your stuff on time.

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MASS310
Comment: Great teacher if you were willing to work

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC201
Comment: He made me cry the whole way home after my first day of his class. Basically he told us that in the comm. field we will be poor, and on top of that, losers! He also was more interested in talking about what he has done in life, than teaching us any material from the book. I didn't learn anything, except to never take his class again!

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC331
Comment: Best teacher ever! He really tells it like it is! He may seem stern or mean, but he really prepares you for the industry. Have to take at least one class with him!

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC204
Comment: Avoid. Feels compelled to constantly insult every student in class for their work, even though he never actually shows how to properly do the assignments. Operates under the guise of "preparing students for the world"...only as an excuse to belittle their work. Riley needs to learn what the word Intro...means in Intro to TV & Audio course

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard VIDEO101
Comment: Took his class years ago as non-traditional student. I was 29, returning from workforce & extremely focused. Maynard knows his stuff & conveys it well. However, he curses like a sailor & talks to everyone like they were morons. It's offensive & pointless. If not for his bitterness, I'd give him an A, but gave him C, instead.

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard TELEVISION
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MASSCTVRN
Comment: a stud!

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC402
Comment: Riley was awesome.  Told you exactly what to expect like no other undergrad teacher I have ever had.

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC402
Comment: not too bad.  doesnt use the book except for take home tests. just turn ur stuff in on time and u'll get an A. def tells it like it is.

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard COMMTVR
Comment: the best

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC402
Comment: ugh...half the class got 30somethingpercents on their midterm take home test because he was UNCLEAR now the best we can get are c's...

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC334
Comment: This is a guy where you will either love him or hate him. I did not like him what so ever.  Yes he can crack a joke, yes he knows what he is talking about when it comes to advertising. But he is a jerk. Telling students that their work is sh** and that we don't know anything.  If would help if he actually taught something once in a while.Avoid him!

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MASSCOMM
Comment: Riley is one of the best teachers ever...definitely take his classes, you'll learn alot.

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC202
Comment: Awesome teacher

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC402
Comment: Media Management. This class seems useless to me. We don't do anything with the book at all besides take home tests with it. Every day we listen to him tell us how miserable our lives are going to be. I'm not learning anything. The guest lectures are the only thing that save this class. He's also very unclear on assignments and the syllabus is vagu

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC402MC333
Comment: I heard the bad stories as well however i enjoyed having him as a teacher...he taught me well and i loved it. I thank him for helping me through the department.

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard VIDEOPROD
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard VIDEOPROD
Comment: Riley is honest. That's why he uses the "F" word more than I do. As a teacher, he's one of the best I ever had.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - James Adams PHOTOGRAPHY
Comment: He's extremely intelligent, but he's aware of that.  I enjoyed the class, but I was challenged and sometimes annoyed.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - James Adams PHOTO
Comment: A Professor that was refine, intelligent and a tribute to the modern day Renaissance man.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - James Adams ART213
Comment: A really, really old professor, with over 53 years teaching at Manchester College - but still teaching. A good but serious teacher, great for a more classical approach to art.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - James Adams ETA
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Manchester University - James Adams PHOTO
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Manchester University - James Adams EXPARTS
Comment: He is terrible

Teacher Name: Manchester University - James Adams ART101
Comment: A wealth of knowledge if you just take the time to take interest in what he says. You can learn ALOT from this guy. One of a dying breed of true mentor-type professors.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - James Adams ARTINLIFE
Comment: Very full of himself.  Taught Non-Art Major, like we were all called to be artist.  Biggest waste of air on the campus

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Judy Barisonzi LEC101
Comment: Impossible to get an A in her classes, even when it's not an English class she is grading as if it were.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Judy Barisonzi ENG110
Comment: Really tough, and I've taken much higher level ENG courses...

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Judy Barisonzi ENG102
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Judy Barisonzi ENG
Comment: Ok courses, but rather strict and monotone. While she gives a good background in lectures, she grades without any mercy!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: Bellamy is one of the worst professors I've ever had.  He really doesnt care if you understand the material or if you pass the class.  He tells you to ask questions but then makes you feel stupid for asking that question.  Seriously, dont take him unless you want to fail

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH243
Comment: he's not exactly a good professor. If you have to take him, don't sweat it but I wouldn't choose to have him. Nobody really knows what he's talking about, but he usually gives an overall feeling of what the exams look like. Grade is based on the lower of your test grade and hw grade, so it's important that you do your hw. Not impossible to get A/B

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH245
Comment: I think Bellamy is great. You don't have a textbook in this class. I love the way he grades his students. Basically if you work hard enough you will get an A in the class, and it doesn't matter how you do on exams. He's a nice guy, terrible with names. Still doesn't know mine. Taking him again next semester.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH245
Comment: He uses a point-based grading system for all of his classes, so if you put the work in early, you don't have to take the final or show up for the last few weeks of class. Get up to the board to do some proofs as soon as possible.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: I'm taking this class now, and it's most likely the most difficult class I have ever taken. Don't expect to learn too much from the lectures as the notation can be quite confusing. If you don't understand one little detail, it's unlikely you'll be able to fully comprehend the proof or theorem he's writing on the board. READ the text and do the HW.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: At first, Bellamy seems awful. Discrete is a pretty tough subject and he is unorganized as can be. He writes out long boring proofs that you can pretty much space out and ignore a lot of the time. However, even though his grading scales seem super weird, if you put in a decent amount of effort in it is actually fairly easy to get an A.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH241
Comment: A great professor.  A litter home+not required participation. It's easy to gain A. I got 100+ in all three exams.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: I took him when i had no other options. He's the easiest of the professors, just the class material is somewhat confusing. His grading system is weird but makes it easy. His Exams are easier than homeworks by far, and you can study with friends for the homework. Would recommend him.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH230
Comment: Professor Bellamy is not as bad as he seems the first week of class. He doesn't have a Sakai or Canvas page so you must keep track of your grades yourself, but he is a great professor. Homework is hard, but you do not have to complete all of them to get an A. Exams are the easiest part of the class, which is a nice change of pace for a math class.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH230
Comment: This class is really dumb and easy. The grading system seems hard but he is very generous with points. Half the class didn't take the final because he said it couldn't hurt your grade and we already had A's.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH245
Comment: He isn't always the most clear and doesn't necessarily get up to teach this course. He makes you learn proofs by presenting them. Its pretty easy to rack up points and he has a unique grading scale that pretty much gaurentees you to pass if you come to class

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: The class is not tough like people talked about, but this professor is not good one to take. In the class, he just follow his thoughts to talk in spite of whether students can follow or not. handwriting is confusing.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: His lectures are so frustrating: he just stands at the board and rambles on without actually checking if you understand it or not.  He gives a normal amount of homework which are pretty hard, but the test questions are always easier than the homework.  You have to put in a lot of individual effort in order to do well.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: You should avoid Bellamy..Not a good professor at all. Tests are very hard, and he doesn't care about his students' grades at all. AVOID

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy FRE2241
Comment: He is very unorganized but he focuses on the grammar and making sure you understand how to use each word and conjugation properly. You do get graded on your attendance but if you still turn in your work and show an understanding of the material he will cut you some slack. He gives you until the end of the semester to make up any written or online.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH241
Comment: The teacher is nice. Grading system is great. It is easy to get a good grade if you work hard. Calculus teacher can not teach you every single algebra. This teacher can give students a good start. You need to work on them after class. He does not care about the antecedence and texting during class. Just a little homework will be provided.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH245
Comment: 150 points is an A and you get points for asking questions, going to class, and doing proofs. If you put the work in you'll get an A.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH241
Comment: He is a very good professor. I can get a pretty good grade on his exam. He just give a little homework a week and no on-line homework.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH241
Comment: Easy class if you've already taken calculus. If you haven't, you're going to have to study a lot. He teaches through sample problems, then assigns very similar ones for homework. Tests are pretty easy, he gives 5 questions on each test where each problem is worth 25 points but the test is graded out of 100 points. Overall, easy class.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH230
Comment: Professor Bellamy is not a good professor at all. His grading system consists of a homework grade and a test grade, and whichever is lower is your average. 2 of the tests are kind of easy, but one is very hard and it will ruin your average. He is also not good at explaining anything.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Joseph Kempker MGT330
Comment: Great Teacher!

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Joseph Kempker SOLAR200
Comment: Awesome & enthusiastic Professor.  Really interested in the Industry's theories.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Lella Shaffner SSC103
Comment: Ms. Shaffner is amazing. She wants all of her students to do well.  She is a good asset to LMC.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ123
Comment: Mr. Marcuson is the sh! Hes cool and hes a super easy teacher gives you the tools to succeed just read the material in advance and you will pass any of his classes. Plus he makes it fun. Lectures are interesting also. Cool class.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ101
Comment: He is a good person, not exactly the best teacher if your actually trying to learn a lot but stick to the book and youll be fine...it didn't seem like anybody cared about actually learning in that class anyways.  But yeah...very good person, good hearted individual.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ122
Comment: KIND MAN. VERY FUNNY. YOU NEED THE TEXT BOOK THOUGH SO MAKE SURE YOU BUY IT. HIS LECTURE IS STRAIGHT OUT OF THE BOOK AND HE EMPHASIZES THE AREAS THAT WILL BE ON THE TEST. SO JUST MARK IT ON YOUR BOOK. THEN A DAY BEFORE TEST HE REVIEWS AND EVERYTHING HE REVIEWS IS ON THE TEST. TAKE THIS CLASS IF YOU WANT AN A

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ101
Comment: This is the best professor i had at IVC. His lectures were interesting, and there was no activities. Only lecture and tests. He really knows the subject.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ123
Comment: Ihad Mr. Marcuson for AJ 123,and I had an A. He tells you what exactly is going to be on the tests. His classes are very easy. If you do not get an A is because you do not want it.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ100
Comment: Mr Marcuson's class will never be boreing. He always stars talking about other interesting things before crowding you up with the lesson. He's funny

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ102
Comment: Nice teacher. He uses his book as a guide for notes and tells you exactly what is going to be on the tests. Very helpful and easy...

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ100
Comment: Very knowledgeable teacher. When trying to make a point, you might think he got lost in explanation after some minutes, but he doesn't. His tests are not that easy as they have open answer, but if you study the stuff, you'll do well. I got an "A." Just make sure you buy the book to highlight the stuff he's explaining which will be in the test.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ100
Comment: He is the best teaher I have ever had..he knows what his doing and you learn a lot from his class..he makes class very interesting

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ104
Comment: he is a nice instructor and makes class really interesting

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ104
Comment: He is an excellent teacher, but watch out his tests are short answer tests. So you have to sit down and study for awhile, but you take a test maybe once every  few weeks. He gives no homework so that took the load off with my other classes. He is a funny person and his lectures are somewhat interesting. I would take his class again. Great teacher.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson TEENPROCEDURES
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ124
Comment: goes over the material plenty of times, very clear. great teacher!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ123
Comment: He will not flunk anybody! Yes his classes are interesting.However, not as much when he teaches much of the EXACT-SAME-THINGS EVERY A.J.COURSE!I seemed 2 get on his nerves cuz I knew the answer 2 all his tricky questions.Every time he asked me "how did u know that?" & I answered "cuz u said it in another class" he didn't like me very much anymore.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ100
Comment: REALLY GOOD TEACHER

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ100
Comment: SO I was saying, he's a sweetehear. Starts off his class with other interesting subjects before crowding you up with a lesson. He's funny and will always prepare you well for test.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ110
Comment: MArcuson Rocks my world

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ223
Comment: Mr. Marcuson is by far one of THE most fun instructors I ever had.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson AJ102
Comment: marcusons is a cool teacher hes funny hes always telling real life stories that relate to what he is talking about tests are easy he tells you what's going to be on it i took him for winter and we were in the auditorium type classroom so he lectured straight out of the book and we had to take notes from it which kinda sucked but hes a good teacher

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Bruce Marcuson CJA100
Comment: This proffessor in one of the best, he's got experience in the CJ system, Knows the subject very well and does everything possible so that you can understand the Material. Go to class, take good notes specially on the day of the Reviews for tests and youll get an A

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Katherine Tinsley HISTORY214
Comment: she talks for the entire class period and just stands there. and yawns. but she knows what she's talking about.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Katherine Tinsley FYC
Comment: This class is unreasonable difficult, and it adds pressure to students.  Even though Professor Tinsley has positive intentions and motives to instill the ideas of the 1920's into the minds of students, it is a demanding class.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Katherine Tinsley HIST101
Comment: Yawns too much

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Katherine Tinsley HISTORY
Comment: She was a very hard prof mainly because all she did was talk. If she would do something other then stand in front of the class and talk then everything would be a lot better in her class.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Katherine Tinsley HIST101
Comment: She's a little shy and not a natural public speaker, but she's awesome otherwise.  Really goes out of her way to help especially in upper level classes.  She's very understanding of students who are struggling for whatever reason.  If you can, I recommend avoiding her lower level classes.  Upper level is where she really shines.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Katherine Tinsley HA1
Comment: I see comments that say "Talks a lot, dense language, and talks the whole class." I'm not quite sure what students expect out of a History course? She is very intelligent, always helpful, and willing to help students improve their grades.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Katherine Tinsley HIST
Comment: Speaks in dense language, and speaks a LOT.  If you can keep up with writing it down, though, you'll have a very comprehensive set of notes.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Alma Becker MISANTHROPE
Comment: I adore Alma, and my mmories of being directed by her are all sweet and nice!

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Alma Becker TH250
Comment: Alma is unbelievable. She's fun, engaging, and thoroughly helpful. She loves what she's doing, and it really shines through. I never felt like a single class was wasted, and I was engaged in every activity. Her critiques are also incredibly helpful.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Alma Becker ACTINSTYL
Comment: She can change your world.  You just have to let her.  Listen and she'll listen back, and best of all you'll learn to listen.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Alma Becker TH231
Comment: I love her glasses

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Alma Becker TH103
Comment: Alma was a wonderful teacher, and I often felt like she could see what I was feeling before I knew myself. She helped me to open up more and to regain some of my emotions that I had lost at some point.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Alma Becker TH104
Comment: Brilliant. The best teacher I have ever had and the most inspirational person I've ever had in my life. She will go beyond what's required of her in order to help you improve if you show her how much it means to you. She brings out the best in her students. You MUST take a class with her!

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Alma Becker THEAT101
Comment: She was a difficult woman who always played favorites and had little to offer in the way of insightfulness. I think her day has come and gone and she eithers needs to get back in touch or stop teaching. What the **** is the point?

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Alma Becker TH103
Comment: Alma's amazing.  Take her class.  Now.  Run to the registrar.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PY102
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PHYS450
Comment: Very knowledgeable. Dr. Grosse is extremely experienced and does his best to share his knowledge. He is always willing to help and often goes the extra mile.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PY101
Comment: The class isn't easy, but he's a great guy

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PY
Comment: He really wants to make you think and learn, not just spit back information.  He's a great guy who makes physics fun and worth all the work you have to put into the class.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse CS201
Comment: from an old alum... i credit dr. grosse with the reason i got my first job and still love working for the same company (for 12 years!).  like it or not those COBOL skills and his emphasis on 'work ethic' were key!...

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PHYSLAB
Comment: I had Dr. Grosse for Physics I and II labs and he was an excellent teacher.  He rides a bike to school every day, too.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PHYS450
Comment: the material thought was very fulfilling information and he was an easy grader and due dates were very acceptable due dates

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse DIGITALELECTRO
Comment: Difficult. he knows his****, but he's tough at times.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PHY101
Comment: Class & Lab is hard especially w/ him, but he's helpful and understanding if you go to him for help.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PHYSICSLAB
Comment: not clear, condescending, and not organized

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSYC101
Comment: Wonderful teacher. Relates everything for people having trouble grasping concepts, but doesn't dumb it down for the smart people. You have to read a lot and try, he is the epitome of college.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher BIOLOGICALPSYC
Comment: This class is very difficult yet very interesting.You'll LEARN A LOT with Gage-Mosher!! If you read the chapters and listen to the lecture you'll do fine. Word of advice for this class (Psy 200) pay close attention to the first 4 chapters or you'll be lost the rest of the semester.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSYCH101
Comment: He is an excellent instructor.  Sort of makes you think he should be somewhere else teaching university level stuff. I took him for as many classes I could in psych.  No it is not easy for all you slackers trying to cheat and sleep your way through college.  This professor is for the ones who want to be educated and actually use some brain neurons.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSY101
Comment: Tests are very tricky, if u are good in studying go ahead, i would not recommend him.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSYCH202
Comment: Gage-Moser always makes the students, and a student better do more than that if he or she expects to do well. He doesn't simplify or summerize the material.  His test question are too challenging for this level. He doesn't go deep into topics, superfucial on most of the material.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSYCH200
Comment: Dr. Gage-Mosher teaches class for you to learn and not to  cheat. Very well explained and need to read ALL chapters.  His test are based on reading and lectures.  If you want to learn, this is the class to take.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher BIOPSY
Comment: great teacher class is hard but if you pay attention and study you do ok, great manners very polite

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSY202
Comment: I don't see how anybody could say that he does not want you to do well, because he definitely does.He will however make you earn your grade.  He is much smarter than the average IVC teacher and I really appreciated his dedication and how much he wanted me to try hard.  I actually never read the book and got a C+, but if you read the book its easier

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher INTRO1A
Comment: This instructor knows his stuff! Well educated and a great teacher. His lectures are interesting and apply to your real life. He used good examples that made the topic clear. You will work hard, but learn a lot. Not an easy class but a great one.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSY202
Comment: Dr Mosher is a great professor, he is tough but he got me thru my aa and ba, teachers aren't supposed to be kind and goodie two shoes, they help you become a better person for yourself and whatever else you decide to do in life. I can honestly say that he will always be my favorite teacher, he's input and the way he pushed me to better myself.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSYC100
Comment: BEst PSYC..tEAcHER eVer!! hE iS vERy PRePAreD foR tHE cLAss UsEs ManY exAMple;gReat nOtes! vEry IntEResTing Class, Its kInd OF hArd If yOU dOnt StUdy :s U reAllY neEd tO rEAd tHE chAptERs .. I REcommENd tHIs tEAcher iits the BEst!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSYCH202
Comment: Dr. Gage-Mosher's class starts out fairly easy, but it gets harder and harder.  Don't be fooled about have ing to read a few chapters, you will read the entire textbook for his class and to do well you'll have to read each chapter a few times, which is impossible with all the other stuff this egomanic asks.  He lectures to hear himself sound good.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSYCH101
Comment: I thought mr. gage-mosher was gonna be so hard since i heard so much about him, but hes not at all. right off the back, my first test i got an A. I think ppl. just need to study, its not that hard to do.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSYCH1A2
Comment: The best psych professor I had. His lecture is organized, clear and interesting. His exams are straightforward. Read the textbook 3 times, and you will do fine. He always answers the questions. Take all the classes with him. Highly recommended!!!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSY101
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSY200
Comment: This class was fairly easy for me because I had already taken Bio 204. Students coming out of A&P will think this class is easy.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSY100
Comment: cool teacher, very engaging in his lectures.  the work is kind of easy if you study a little.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher SPHY101
Comment: Great teacher, but like one of those courses that you must read the book to pass his class. His lectures were very educational and his examples were GREAT...very down to hearth.  Made time go by fast in his sphy classes. Not difficult at all.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PSY202
Comment: Dr mosher is an outstanding teacher and mentor he got me to my ba his class in research is incredible if you want to succeed in this profession you need to take one of his classes!!!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Ronald Gage-Mosher PHSY101
Comment: The tests were way too hard. They were tricky. Besides, the classroom is always cold hahaa

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Mark Hall CPS245

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Mark Hall CPS245
Comment: He doesn't teach you what you need to know just techniques.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - John Planer ETA
Comment: Incredibly tough, but the amount you learn and the sense of accomplishment is worth the effort.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - John Planer ETA
Comment: I think he takes pride in failing his students.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - John Planer ARTS120
Comment: great !!

Teacher Name: Manchester University - John Planer REL131

Teacher Name: Manchester University - John Planer FYS1FSH

Teacher Name: Manchester University - John Planer FYS1FSH

Teacher Name: Manchester University - John Planer FYS1FSH
Comment: Professor Planer was and still is the nicest person I have ever met in my life.  He truly cares about his students and wants to help them with any problem they have, whether it is school related or personal.  He is always there to talk to you when you need it.  His classes are definitely hard, but it is worth it because he teaches you to think.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - John Planer ART201
Comment: One of the most gifted professors you will ever find, but also one of the hardest.  Interesting sense of humor and always cares about his classes.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - John Planer ETAFYC
Comment: Dr. Planer is a WONDERFUL professor.  You work very hard, but you learn SO MUCH.  He is extremely intelligent as well as quirky, funny, and very interested in getting to know his students.  Highly recommended for the unafraid!

Teacher Name: Manchester University - John Planer HUM130
Comment: This professor is one of the best, most knowledgable professor I have ever had. He will answer any questions you have and notices if you are really trying. This class can be very overwhelming but if you keep up and study, you can do good and get an A. I would suggest taking this class just to have such an awesome professor.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - John Planer MUSIC
Comment: Great

Teacher Name: Manchester University - John Planer ETA
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Manchester University - John Planer HUM130
Comment: He was a professor who was full of knowledge and very helpful when questions were asked. Yes this class can be overwhelming but if you keep up on studying you will do great! Loved this class and the professor.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Oscar Gaytan MATH105
Comment: Refuses to correct errors in his own work.  Infuriating.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Marianne Foley SEVERAL

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Marianne Foley PS324
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Marianne Foley SSP30

She cares enough to write great insightful comments on your work. She's totally willing to give you a second chance if you prove you deserve it. Overall, this has been a VERY positive experience

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Marianne Foley SSP30

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Marianne Foley 106LABTHESIS

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Marianne Foley PSYCH200

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Marianne Foley PS306

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Marianne Foley 324
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Amy Taylor BUS301
Comment: Amy is amazing! Her classes are typically really easy, but if you put the work in you will get a lot out of it. A lot of in class exercises really help you learn the material. This is a professor you want to get to know, she's great!

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Amy Taylor MARKETING
Comment: cool

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Patterson ENG100

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Patterson ENG99

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Patterson ENG100

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Patterson ENG100
Comment: This is by far the worst Professor I have had in IVC. He is very picky, and his assignments are difficult. He likes to give long assignments and wants them turned in by certain date.
