Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Patterson SPEECH
Comment: if you want to fail then i suggest you get him.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Patterson ENG100
Comment: Warning! Be prepared to work for you grade!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Patterson ENGL009
Comment: If you would like to pass your English class(es)with him, I suggest you ask for reasnoable accommodations. Once, a student was denied one. Then he accommodated the student.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Patterson ENG99
Comment: good teacher but very picky 1. be his favorite 2. learn MLA style before you get the class 3.very picky on skipping lines 4. he likes to insult you so be prepared overall he is a good teacher but watch out think twice when getting him as an english teacher

IF YOU DON'T TURN IN YOUR HW OR ATTEND CLASSES YOU DON'T EXPECT TO PASS.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Patterson ENGLISH101
Comment: Dr. Patterson asked a student to remark that he is easily distracted, he is a fun teacher, if you are mature enough to handle criticism.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Patterson ENGLI99

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Patterson ENG1B

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Patterson SPEECH1
Comment: He's a really good speech teacher just do all the stuff.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert NS101
Comment: Prof. Evert is a great professor! Her classes are always very engaging, very creative, and very entertaining. Her exams are very long and very difficult. The questions are mostly about detailed information from the textbook. If you can memorize every single thing she asks you to read from the textbook and some articles, then you should be fine.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert NEUROPSYCH
Comment: I learned a great deal. She talks pretty fast though, which is both good and bad.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert PS231
Comment: Prof. Evert hosted the single best course I've taken in my life. The subject matter was unbelievable and she taught it so well. I highly recommend taking a course with her, no matter what it is. However! I took a neuropsych course with her (which is her specialty), but I imagine neuroscience with her would be equally amazing.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert LS1
Comment: it was a horrible class (but that might just be because it's LS1). she was not a good teacher from an english-type class point of view, but she may be good at neuroscience, i don't know

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert NS100
Comment: demands alot, but worth it

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert NEUROPSYCH
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert PS231
Comment: I loved this class. I found the material to be very interesting and enjoyed every lecture. This class made me a more critical thinker and a better student. The tests required mastery with an ability to extend beyond that. A's required many extra hours of preparation. Missing a lecture would be devastating. The group project was very difficult.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert ALLNEUROCLASSES
Comment: a great teacher who puts a lot of energy into her lectures.  if you're going to take NS, take it with her!!  even if the material is scary for you, she'll make it seem okay.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert NS101
Comment: She is a good teacher, but she teaches her intro neuroscience class like its a 300 level senior seminar. She expects too much from her 100 level students. Take her neuro class if you want to go crazy and spend more time on one class then on your other 3 or 4 combined. A pain in my ass.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert PS
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert PS101
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert NS101

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert NS101
Comment: Knows a lot in her field and is willing to learn more.  Not afraid to not know an answer but that is rare.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert NEUROPSYCH
Comment: Rigorous, clear, high expectations, willing to take time to help. Great teacher / class.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert NS101
Comment: best teacher ever.  sweet, smart, clear, and enthusiastic about her work.  Take NS101 with her, definitely.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert PSYCH
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert NEUROSCIENCE
Comment: Best neuroscience professor on campus!  She's smart and clear and very helpful.  If you're going to take NS101, take it with her.  Trust me.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Denise Evert NS101
Comment: Before I took Evert's class, I thought I was a good student and that I was capable of accomplishing anything I put my mind to. Evert has me failing exams, getting frustrated, and almost dropping her class. She moves too quickly, and she provides her own notes in class so you're copying things down rather than actually processing information.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Mark Huntington BIO202
Comment: Doc is tough on who needs to be pushed...His tests are fair but if you study his notes you will do well! a lot of memorizations!  His notes are easy to understand and he goes slowly to make sure everyone understands...can be crabby sometimes... he put someone in my class in a time out once

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Mark Huntington HPE412
Comment: I loved Doc's classes. He made you learn.  Isnt that what college is all about??  Doc was always there to help me out if I needed it.  keep it up Doc.  Keep making America's youth think and learn for themselves!!

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Mark Huntington ANY
Comment: He is a nice guy as a person, but as a prof he is not the best.  He makes things harder for you if you are not an AT major.  Also if you need help, DON'T ask him, definitely find it on your own!!!!

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Mark Huntington ATH101
Comment: HATES FOOTBALL PLAYERS

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Mark Huntington ESAT325
Comment: He is very hard on those who don't seem to be interested in giving an effort, but he is very passionate and knowledgeable about what he teaches. He is preparing you to go into professional fields and tries to include you in his lectures to keep the class lively. Has become one of my favorite professor!!

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Mark Huntington HPE412
Comment: Awesome professor.  I had him many years ago and he made sure I graduated.  I appreciate his caring more than he knows.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Kevin Kurek CPS113
Comment: Average overall, a little crazy at times.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Kevin Kurek CPS110
Comment: Kevin is all talk and will not actually do what he says he is going to do. He will say he is going to update the assignment online but he is lying. He will also bring up that you needed to create the assignment in a certain way without telling you until you get the assignment back and you ask why you got the grade you did. Overall he is a pretty te

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Kevin Kurek CPS110
Comment: Great professor, truly invested in his students. Teaching at UW-FDL isn't his full time job; if I'm right, he isn't paid to do this, so you can tell he's really in it for the students' education. He knows his stuff. I didn't know a thing about programming before taking the class, now I'm passionate about computer science. Also a really funny guy.

Teacher Name: San Ignacio University - Michael Castle HUM503
Comment: Great lecturer. He asks for at least 3 project assignments.. If you work and present an outstanding project the professor is pleased. If not he is not happy and your grades are not happy either..

Teacher Name: San Ignacio University - Michael Castle MBA501
Comment: Great professor with international experience. He always shares real-life information and cases. Fun but you have to listen!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Adam Rovner ENG150
Comment: Awesome English teacher, 100 times better than Schafer.  If you have a choice, always sign up for Rovner.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Adam Rovner ENG150
Comment: It was truly a pleasure to attend all of Rovner's lectures. Best teacher I've had at DP so far.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Adam Rovner ENG150
Comment: Knows the material and how to teach.  When taking English make sure to get Rovner.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Adam Rovner 725
Comment: It's good professor

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Adam Rovner ENG150
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Adam Rovner ENG150
Comment: amazingly teacher, really knows his stuff.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Adam Rovner ENG150
Comment: Rover is an amazing, engaging professor. Improve your person-to-person skills by talking in class!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Adam Rovner ENG150
Comment: I have never really liked English classes. With that said, Professor Rover was one of the best teachers I have ever had. Overall. Not just within the realm of English teachers. He had me actually volunteering to speak up in class, and I usually never do that, ever. Knows his stuff and has some very interesting ideas to further liven up the class.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Adam Rovner ENG150
Comment: Awesome professor, he knows his stuff, makes the class interesting, and makes sure that what he's teaching is practical.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Adam Rovner ENG150
Comment: An amazing proffessor. I'm opting to not take any further english courses at DigiPen unless Rovner is teaching the class. He's engaging, challenging, and encourages the class to think about the material they are reading. It was a delight to attend his lectures.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Adam Rovner ENG150
Comment: Wow, opt for this professor, immediately.  Brilliant, engaging, and always prepared, he _is_ the professor to take.  He'll make you work for your grade, but the thought processes that he invokes during the assignments more than compensates for any difficulty.  Definitely one of my favorites, hands down.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Mel Gabriel MGMT4100
Comment: Easy af but mans barely comes to class and sends his TA. I thought university was a scam but this class really takes the cake. He also plays a lot of videos and ends class an hour early. The worst part is that you have to come to class for participation but you never know if he'll actually be there or not :)

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Mel Gabriel MGMT4100
Comment: This guy really does not care. Boring, unrelated lectures with very close minded outlooks. Another cash-grab course that is made mandatory for Schulich students and Mel does not make it any better.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Mel Gabriel MGMT4100
Comment: Apparently, just about anyone can become a Schulich professor.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Mel Gabriel MGMT4100
Comment: AVOID AT ALL COSTS. Does not provide any guidance, doesn't even show up for class half the time and sends the TA. Does not care about you, dry and boring lectures that are unrelated to deliverables. When asked him for help, either ignores your emails and lies saying he didn't receive them, or gives the most vague and unhelpful answers.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENGL99
Comment: WOW, her online class is great, if you want to learn how to write effectively for college level, then take her online class.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENG009
Comment: I took her online and she's a tough cookie.She likes essays and loves to find mistakes. We had a MLA Research Paper that made me wanna pull my hair out. The good about this class is that you do learn and she's not too bad with late papers

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENG101
Comment: Her class is fun, interactive and you will definitely use the books. Read the assignmentss. You will do 4 in-class essays, 3 writing assignments and quizzes. Her class is very passable, but you have to adjust to her style of writing. ALWAYS check your grammar and structure. Minor errors will cost you big with her. There is almost no extra credit.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes 91
Comment: Great teacher, clear, helpful! love her! I took an online class, the essays were graded well, there is free tutor sessions avail as well to get your essay read before you turn it in, you can do it over the phone its super helpful. I had a hard time with structure in my english classes in high school and I got As on my essays with her.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENGL99
Comment: Great teacher, do all the assignments every week, easy online quizes, read a book and one research paper at the end of the semester and you will do fine, I passed the class with an A.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENG099
Comment: She's a really nice lady but if she doesn't like your writing style or opinions then you may fail the class, she also doesn't explain much where you went wrong. Not much Homework or school work, take at your own risk!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENG99
Comment: Great teacher! It was my first time taking an online class and I was so scared but she made me feel at ease. Her online class is great very helpful. She tries to help the students as much as possible.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENG009
Comment: She's very picky when she graded an essays, so just make sure to follow all the steps that she wants and you will do well..

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENG102
Comment: Her class is very interesting. There's a lot of assignments, but this is college. I liked the variety of assignments. Take her class instead of Mr. Rapp. There's more assignments, but she teaches way better than him so you learn more.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENGENG
Comment: Took her online course did not enjoy at all. She also ASSIGNS TOO MUCH HOMEWORK. I have never done so much homework in my life i had assignments every single day. Then to top it off she takes forever to respond to your question or concerns when you email her. THIS IS AN ONLINE COURSE EMAILING IS IMPERATIVE!!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENG221
Comment: Mrs. Dorantes is a great professor. She clearly knows her stuff and makes lectures interesting and fun. 221 is a literature class so, of course, be prepared to read A LOT. Easy A if you're willing to do every assignment. Reading, reading journal and quiz every week. Midterm, final and 10 pg research paper at the end.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENGL09
Comment: Took her class online and it did require a lot of work on the students behalf. She is very picky on your writing. You keep her alive by making mistakes. And when it come to research paper cite your sources within the essay. It is hard but if you ace the final like I did you can scim by and pass.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENG009
Comment: Not the best teacher, relies to much on giving too much tests, homework, and papers and is very stressful and hard at times. makes you truely work for it and doesn't care about your problems

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENG99
Comment: best teacher I have ever had!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENG009
Comment: I took her online class and found it easy. Just do all the work and just turn it in before she grades. She is very understanding and helpful.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENGL99
Comment: Not easy and not hard, but you really learn how to write effectively on the essays and the online class is very helpful regarding grammar and writing essays. Actually you can learn a lot.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENG97
Comment: Hard class . She gives you a little quiz every class and she makes fun of you if you wrote something wrong. If English is your second language it wiil be a hard class because she wants everything perfect. I hate eng 97 class

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENGL100
Comment: Oh she was awesome. I had her when English 099 was English 100. I took her hybrid class and it was so easy and enjoyable. She's gives easy class work, and is really helpful with questions and writing papers. I really want to take her again for English 101, but she doesn't teach 101 every semester.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENG102
Comment: Great lady, loved her. Did not give very much work besides reflections, one research essay, and poetry explication. We did not read plays, instead watched the movie. Very helpful and overall an enjoyable class. Choose her instead of Rapp for Eng 102 she is easier and you will learn more!!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Kathleen Dorantes ENGL99
Comment: very helpfull regarding grading essays and you can learn a lot in her online class.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Julie Shores COCP1220
Comment: Julie is basically the most useless professor I've ever had in my life. Protip: Don't ask a question that takes some intelligence to answer about Access, she doesn't know the answer. If you like doing the same thing, three times, for every exercise, I recommend her, however, if you want to learn Access, buy a book and read it yourself.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Julie Shores ACCT1200
Comment: Julie needs to dumb it down and slow it down for those that have no experience in accounting. The class work was very difficult to understand and follow.  A test after each chapter a lot of memorizing terms.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Julie Shores ACCT1200
Comment: Julie has a tendency to pick favorites. If you are lucky to be chosen, any question you have will be answered. If you aren't, then good luck figuring out the class work.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Julie Shores ACCT1252
Comment: Julie is very willing to accomodate her students. She creates a welcoming environment where students are not afraid to ask questions.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Sue Hart PSY388
Comment: Dr. Hart is an amazing professor. I'd take another class with her in a heartbeat.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Sue Hart PSY388
Comment: One of my favorite college professors. Blessed to have been a student. Superb at what she does, and is very sociable. Will coach you on how to study and do assignments. Top notch professor. All the exams are from class lectures and the book, so if you study and take notes, it's simple. Very enthusiastic. I enjoyed my time in her classes.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Sue Hart PSY133
Comment: Awesome teacher.  The tests are really easy, the only way to fail is to not try.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos ETHIC111
Comment: I had Professor Boos for three classes when I attended UW Fond du Lac. On A daily basis I run into situations where I still apply the logic he taught me. He stands up for what he thinks is right and says things how they really are. He's super helpful and is basically doing Fond du Lac A service by teaching. I HIGHLY RECOMEND!

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHIL101
Comment: This man has been of the greatest importance in my academic journey. After taking him I was inspired. I ended up going on two learn 3 other languages and now I have to decide whether to get a Ph.D in philosophy or classical philology from some of the top english speaking universities. If you ever have a chance, take a class with him.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHI240
Comment: Professor Boos cares about liberal learning; he put effort into bring all students alone for a learning experience.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHI258
Comment: He kind of wanders around between a lot of different topics, but it's interesting and weekly assignment is less than one page.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHI101
Comment: Very helpful in answering questions. Very interesting lectures. Will take his classes again. Assignments were once a week, and thats it. No text books. Very awesome professor

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHI101
Comment: Dr. B is a great teacher. Awesome guy. He'll stay after class and talk to you about questions you have regarding anything. Very helpful always willing to help out. Many people feel he is unstructed in class because he is trying to get you to grab concepts in a way that is not generally used by most professors. Great guy.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHI243
Comment: Great professor! You'll have a fun time in class. As long as you attend lecture and are proactive with your homework it will be great!

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHIL101
Comment: Awesome professor!

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos REL101
Comment: Dr. Boos is an extremely fascinating professor who made coming to class and discussing not always interesting subject matter very exciting.  I'd HIGHLY recommend his classes to anybody.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHI
Comment: This professor was very engaging and offered many opportunities for critical thinking. Wish there were most Professors like this.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHI240
Comment: He put effort into bring all students alone for a learning experience.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHIL101
Comment: Excellent professor and the reason why I majored in philosophy. Even if you dont care for this subject take this class and you will learn a great deal. Apply yourself and try in this class and you will get an A I promise.  UW-Fond du lac has a Diamond in Boos, could easily be a professor at Harvard or any prestigious school. Great professor.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHI101
Comment: He ignored the curriculum(You still had to do it on your own time), and instead taught the class his own extremest liberal ideology.  He is also a conspiracy theorist. But he is VERY persuasive, even though he often used blatantly incorrect info. Scary because I saw him succeed at pursuading students. Unethical for him to be targeting these people.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHILO101
Comment: Get teacher. Easy to understand.  He really makes the class fun.  Very little homework.  Nothing is really required.  You do what you want. No textbooks for all his classes except for bio ethics.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHIL101
Comment: He's a great guy and he really cares about his students. He's a cool guy and really seems to respect his students.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHI101
Comment: Easily one of the best Professor's I've ever had. UW Fond du Lac doesn't deserve him. Take his philosophy class! Great great great open discussion lectures that make you think about what this life is about. Not a hardcore assignment giver. Honestly put in an effort and he'all give you a good grade. It's not about grades it's about actually thinking

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Eric Boos PHILO210
Comment: I had him for two classes; Intro. to Philosophy (101), and thinking critically (210).  He is the best professor I've ever had.  He is very opinionated but he loves teaching and it shows.  He has taught me many life lessons along the way as well. Gets you to think in a different way than normal and will answer literally any question.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff EN105
Comment: Monotone voice is the only downside. Great prof. Cute comments on papers.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff HF101
Comment: Taught the Honors Colloquium when he was director of the honors forum. Class was mostly projects with others to bond and some interesting assignments. Got to know him as I was also on Honors Council and HF Executive Committee with him. Cool guy.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff CS666
Comment: the class i took was a Scribner Seminar, therefor didn't have a proper number. The class was also filled with people who knew nothing about computer science, so for me, it was a little boring, and i'm not too sure she did a good job of explaining things to the others. The lectures were boring, but that's probably because i knew the stuff already.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff FICTION211
Comment: While yes, his voice may be monotonous, he is a brilliant professor with a wonderful sense of humor.  He also happens to be my advisor and I highly recommend him.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff EN303H
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff ENTUTORPREP
Comment: He may seem dull at first, but has a very random and wonderful sense of humor.  He is very intelligent and very willing to help out students.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff EN110
Comment: Boshoff is an incredible teacher. He's a little odd, but he's brilliant and ridiculously interesting. Not an easy class, but definitely worth taking. He doesn't give tests, so the papers are important.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff ENMANY
Comment: Phil is tops. Even when his classes get boring, he will dish out life advice like it's his job, and cares about his students more than any professor on campus I've encountered. If I was an EN major he'd be my advisor for sure. Such a yoda.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff HF101
Comment: Dull, but maybe it's just the class.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff EN305
Comment: he is a genius

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff ENG303H
Comment: Phil is rad.  Dry sense of humor, face made of stone, you could hear a pin drop in his class, but you learn enough, if not directly from him then from the stuff he has you do.  Get to know him, and he'll grow on you.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff HONORS
Comment: SOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO BORING!!!!!!!!!!!

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff ENGEN11
Comment: My favorite professor by far. He cares deeply about each and every one of his students, is very very funny (in an extremely dry way) and is incredibly helpful with papers. Very kind man

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff EN211
Comment: He's a nice enough guy and he really knows his subject. He can definitely be boring, but if you can force yourself to pay attention, he comes out with some of the funniest and most random comments you will ever hear.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff ENGLISH
Comment: What a great human being!  He has a dry sense of humor, and he cares a great deal about his students.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff HF10101
Comment: If i can force myself to stay awake in this class and not focus on his montone voice, he is a wonderful, humorous guy. He really tries to befriend his students and tries hard to interest us and expand our horizons.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff EN110
Comment: best professor I've had! fantastic human being, great sense of humor, and sharp sharp wits.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Phil Boshoff EN303H
Comment: Quotes of him at his most random: "This is what I find incredibly academically sexy: simbiotic structure. Ah" "Action...oozing out a glob of mucus.  I'll erase this before Golden's class, don't worry" "He surely never met an LSD tablet he didn't like" "He's cooked! Haha! Tis the season, ho ho ho!"

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Brad Johnson ENGLISH105
Comment: He was cool at first, then disappeared and wouldn't update my grade.  Cost me an A-.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo HIST101
Comment: He's easily the best professor at Crown. He's passionate, engaging, and seems to truly care about his students. That last bit is unusual given my class with him had over 100 students. I found myself taking as many of his classes as I could, and I was an English major. Good for him that he's pursuing more education in Scotland. It's a loss for Crown

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo HIST101
Comment: Great teacher overall.  You must read and study from the book for every class. Although the test were not for the book but from the lecture so keep up in class, which could be hard because he talked so fast.  I do have to say that I learned a lot in his classes and enjoyed them.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo HI102
Comment: Lessons are interesting with plenty of humor.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo WORLDGEOGRAPHY
Comment: Mr. Ylitalo is my favorite teacher! He knows almost everything about his subjects, knows his students, has traveled the world, has a great sense of humor, and is excellent at what he does =)

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo HIS101
Comment: My absolute favorite professor!

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo HI101
Comment: Great teacher, a lot of fun, but teaches history like no other can.  If you are willing to allot enough time to preparation for his quizzes/tests, you will do well in any of his classes

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo HI101
Comment: Mr Ylitalo has the best classes hands down. I would love to go back just to listen to him teach. He's an amazing teacher who cares and always keeps his classes interesting.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo HISTORYOFWWII
Comment: Good teacher. Funny. Learned a lot.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo HI101
Comment: Best. Instructor. Ever. He is the Bruce Lee of Crown College (Mike Fox being Chuck Norris, but I think Mr. Fox is a little overrated). His classes might not be the easiest in the college, but the guy is just plain fun.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo HOCB
Comment: Dude, Mr. Y. is the bomb diggity. I flippin' love Mr. Ylitalo. He is the coolest teacher ever. He made up like 70% of my qoutes last year.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo HISTORICALBOOK
Comment: Just got out of his class.  He always makes me laugh and he is super enthusiastic.  Not the easiest class, but you definitely learn something.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo HIA
Comment: Best teacher ever! Great mentor in and out of the classroom. He knows his stuff and is great at teaching it. He has a great family too!I wasn't too interested in history until he made it come alive. I highly recommend taking any of his classes!

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo HISTORYOFCIV
Comment: Mr. Ylitalo is one of the most interesting teachers at Crown. I guarantee you won't fall asleep in his History of Civ classes. He knows EVERYTHING. The only problem that he has is every once in a while he becomes ADD, and he changes subjects or topics and can't focus. It is still hilarious though. Great guy.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo BIGEOBI12
Comment: Bro. Ylitalo makes it very interesting to learn the geography of the middle east! He has a great attitude at all times and is always willing to help. I have alot of good teachers but he is the best!

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Matt Ylitalo MI210
Comment: Truly cares about his students. That means more to me than anything. My fav class with him was Muslim Evan. GREAT class. He's never boring. Let him be your friend and bro in the Lord. *Missions major

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Bob Bowman REL101
Comment: Great teacher and storyteller. He makes religion a fascinating subject from a theological perspective. Very educated, informed and passionate about religion of all faiths.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Bob Bowman ALL
Comment: Bowman rocks!  He's my favorite professor and the reason i'm a religion major.  He's makes church history fun...that takes talent:)  He gets so excited when he teaches that you can't help but get excited with him.  And you gotta love the corny jokes:)

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Bob Bowman REL101
Comment: When I came to MC and found out we had to take a religion class, I was NOT looking forward to it(Having zero interest in the practice)but Bowman made it wonderful because he teaches the bible in a literary perspective keeping his personal thoughts/religious beliefs completely out of it. He's funny, informative and gives many new insights.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Bob Bowman REL385
Comment: I love Bowman:)  He's the reason I came to Manchester and his classes have made me glad that I'm here!

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Bob Bowman RELIGION
Comment: Bowman is the best!!! He's one of my favorite professors.  He's hilarious and always available to help you out if you are having trouble. He hates tests so don't except them to be hard, but except to learn a lot. :)

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENG201
Comment: Mr. Rapp is one of the best professors I've ever had. Took him for the winter session and it was tough, but he will schedule appointments with you to make sure you get it right. He gives unlimited tries on homework to get full credit as long as you do it on time and he offers extra credit. And his lectures are fun.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENGL201
Comment: If you want to take an easy class, don't take this class. If u actually want to learn he is an amazing teacher. He explains everything clearly and u will know exactly what to expect. If you pay attention you will  get so much out of his class. He is always available when you need help too. Great teacher!!!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENG010
Comment: Best English teacher out there. Class may be considered tough by others but this teacher inspires you to learn, he focuses more on your content and what you have to say.  Too bad he retired :(

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENG201
Comment: Dropped him and I love English classses.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENG201
Comment: Took a class with him and learned a lot from him. Class could not be that bad, but since I was still learning english, it was challenging. I would recommend him if you really want to learn. He is a helpful professor who knows the material and responds emails promptly. He cares for his students and help me transfer to a 4 year college.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENGL101
Comment: Very picky teacher; wants homework and assignments a certain way or he'll take away points but not very helpful when asking for help on assignments. Made some interesting remarks but his teaching style was terrible in comparison. I worked hard on the course but barely managed to get a C; he retired 2 years ago, though, so he's not an option now.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENG110
Comment: Mr. Rapp is very passionate teacher and encourages the best out of his students. But  assigns homework very often and if not done correctly he will return it for you to work on it again until done right. This overflowed me with work because i had to work on new assignments AND correct my old ones before the two week limit he gives to redo are up.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENG201
Comment: worse teacher ever! he thinks hes funny but is really boring!! his material is so difficult to understand due to him not knowing how to explain also, when you ask for help he tells you the exact same thing you didn't understand! I hated his class

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENG110
Comment: Weekly quizzes on a short reading. Gives you a chance to re-do work. Easy A if you're willing to work hard.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENGL201
Comment: Makes u challenge urself to be a better writer. Yes u have to work for ur grade but every essay I wrote after taking his class I get A+ on them and even won an essay scholarship because of him. Amazing Amazing teacher. Wish all teachers at IVC cared about students like him!!!!!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENGL201
Comment: He kind of reminds me of my younger days... Some parts of it.  I was able to connect with him.  He does a good job; I don't see much need for improvement or anything.  I failed his class because I kept being lazy.  I don't like the subject of English.  Overall, there's nothing wrong with him.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENGLISH201
Comment: There is a quiz every week about the book we were supposed to read. The book was hard to understand (old English).  When someone turns in homework, and it is not how he wants it to be, he will return you the homework and you have to do it again. I had to do the same homework like 5 times before getting credit for it.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp 20303
Comment: Great instructor. Really focused on students learning overall. Was generous in redoing failed assignments and gave great feedback on the written assignments. If you expect an easy grade, take another course. If you want to learn and increase your ability to write, then this course is for you.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENG201
Comment: He's a great teacher.  He  will explain assignments and then review the next class meeting. Quizzes are weekly on the reading and you have to be specific . He gives extra credit. He really cares about his students and is always available through email and in his office. You have to work for your grade but he truly cares about his students and funny

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENGLISH201
Comment: He talks a lot, but it helps because he will explain things in great detail so you are not confused on assignments. He cares about his students. He is very funny and will make you laugh a few times a class. It is a refreshing class to take because other professors are just reading lectures all day. Great teacher!!!! Easy class

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENG110
Comment: One of, if not THE, best teacher I have ever had. So inspirational, and cares so much about his students and their learning. Yes expect homework, but gives 2 weeks to redo work that was done wrong or did not meet expectations. You really will get so much out of his class, even if you dont pass you will become much more knowledgeable. Very smart man

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENG110
Comment: Mr. Rapp is the best teacher at IVC. He challenges you, but it makes u a better writer. He really cares about his students. He taught me so much. He explains everything that u need to do to pass the class. He is always available through email or office. Amazing teacher, Amazing person. Take his class u will gain so much from it.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENG201
Comment: This was my last English class and I thought I would be able to learn more about the English language, but ohh surprise he had us read a really boring book that I didn't even understand. Then we had to a ten page essay which he does give a lot of time to write, but if you can look for another teacher.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENG110
Comment: mr rapp is an amazing teacher and you honestly will get an A if you worked for it. yes his class is a little hard at times but you will learn and benefit from it.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Frank Rapp ENG101
Comment: Mr. Rapp is a good professor.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Chris York ENGLISH127621
Comment: Great professor and class. My first class in many years and was able to nail it! Very helpful and fun assignments.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Chris York ENGL1276
Comment: Don't take a class with him. Extremely hard grader!!! I tried and tried to get an A, but it was always 8/10, 8/10, 9/10. Nothing was ever perfect.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Chris York ENGL1276
Comment: He dresses kind of weird, but has a great personality and loves to talk. He is a very interesting professor but loves to have a teacher-student relationship. You pretty much just have to listen in class and then you have the worksheets and you'll be good.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Chris York ENGL101
Comment: Great professor, great class. He's so cool, unique, funny.  Can be sort of hard but not too bad.  He makes it fun. A+

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Chris York COMP101
Comment: He is a very straight forward, easy going teacher. As long as you put some effort into your papers and you go to class and engage in conversation the class will fly by. It was a great fast semester!!!!

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Chris York ENGL101
Comment: The work was a challenge but going to class wasn't. I was disappointed to see the class end.  Chris is funny and entertaining and I wish I needed to take more english credits.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Chris York ENGLISH127621
Comment: Great online class. Don't let the use of the comic book scare you away. I am not a comic book fan and it was great! Helpful professor and fair grader. Would take another class with this professor if I could.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Chris York ENGL1276
Comment: I would have gotten a better grade, but missed a few classes and didn't give my all on the last paper as I had a baby. Hes super helpful and funny! If he can tell your trying he will pass you.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Chris York ENGL2102
Comment: He is an intersting teacher and keeps you engaged in calss.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Chuck Wood BIO200
Comment: Wonderful guy. Knows way too much! His teaching methods are boring and lack any motivation so if you want to learn anatomy you have to really discipline yourself. Ask questions and pay attention because he is a genius and just doesn't know how or what to convey to his students.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Chuck Wood BIO100
Comment: He's very knowledgeable, but can't seem to teach whatever he has in his brain. Overall, his class was "catch up on other homework" class.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Chuck Wood BIO151
Comment: Extremely smart guy, but has a hard time conveying what he wants to say. He's an amazing artist and knows a huge amount of anatomy on probably every animal. If you want to learn from him you need to discipline yourself to do so.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Chuck Wood BIO150
Comment: Chuck's awesome. He brought a cow's leg to class and dissected it. 'Nuff said.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Chuck Wood ART400
Comment: Chuck is a very nice guy but it was obvious that he became frustrated with the students since they had little to no interest in class.  Over time the class was reduced to a 5-10 minute question session between Wood and the students and then everyone was excused and the class was over.  Great person, but too lenient with his classes and deadlines.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Chuck Wood BIO100
Comment: Has a vast amount of knowledge, but has no idea how to present it in a clear manner. I thought he might improve, but after three classes I lost all respect I had for him. His class is great for dozing off or doing other work.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Chuck Wood BIO
Comment: He gives us fun and interesting assignments, but the lectures seem unprepared for and unclear. I heard he used to teach at the UW but this doesn't seem to ring true.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Chuck Wood BIO100
Comment: weird class. he has a lot of knowledge about medical stuff... and in all of his assignments he will always explain things as if he was talking to a doctor. in fact i think he should be a doctor... hes really good at art. heh i don't get this class at all.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Chuck Wood BIO100
Comment: Wood tend to get everyone confused in bio100. I have talked to him out of class before and he seem to be able to give advices much better 1 to 1. He is really helpful if you put in the effort to go clarify your questions with him.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Chuck Wood BIO100
Comment: Wood seems to be clearer in our Bio 100 class than others, according to the upperclassmen. He gives us class outlines and stuff. I love this class, although wood is unclear only sometimes, he really knows his stuff and he's an awesome guy in general. He's gotten much better than he was in the past on clarity.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Matt Bamber ACTG2020
Comment: Best prof in Schulich hands down. Always has interesting stories (course relevant and general) to tell and has the best marking criteria for exams. Very engaging and doesn't waste time with participation and reinforcement modules.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Matt Bamber ACTG2020
Comment: Matt is literally the only professor at Schulich that I feel truly cares about the well-being of his students. He always sends pleasant emails to tell us when he's in his office, he's very clear about grading criteria + what's going to be on midterms, and he's just hilarious to listen to. His teaching style is very easy to follow.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Matt Bamber ACTG2020
Comment: Took his ACTG2020 class last fall. Matt has a great personality, makes class very entertaining and makes potentially complicated concepts easy to understand. Generous with grading and accessible outside class.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Matt Bamber ACTG2020
Comment: Matt was such a great prof, he is easily accessible in office hours and genuinely will do anything to help you get better. He doesn't like it if you skip class though, and honestly his lectures are very good so I wouldn't skip anyways, he actually TEACHES and never makes class boring. Even though I have no interest in actg, Matt's class was great!

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Matt Bamber ACTG2020
Comment: Great Prof

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Billy Carver BIO311
Comment: Dr Carver isn't a bad teacher but he is mean and rude. He picks fun at his students of they don't know everything like he expects. He doesn't prepare us for the tests he just says here 4 chapters and you are responsible for the chapters i don't go over.  A friend of mine asked him a question  on a test and he said "you're kidding me right".

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Billy Carver BIO425
Comment: This is my second class with Dr. Carver and I enjoy his classes. I admit to not being the strongest student but I enjoy his classes. This class does have quizzes each week, but it is a Tuesday and Thursday class. I enjoyed both classes with Dr. Carver. Yes his test are hard, but simply study.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Billy Carver BIO114
Comment: hard class but hes pretty funny.  take notes and read the book!

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Billy Carver BIO115
Comment: Great professor and great person in general. Carver is sarcastic and likes to joke with students, so if you are easily offended you should not take his class because you will get your feelings hurt. On the other hand, this is college, suck it up.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Billy Carver BIO114
Comment: I had Dr. Carver for BIO114 and 115. He was always there to help me out after class whether it was about something in class or ideas about career fields. Hes a sarcastic, but friendly professor. He will answer all your questions and go over topics until you understand the material.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Billy Carver BIO114
Comment: Hardest teacher I have ever had. But is honest about the students and their ability to succeed in their future field and if they should stay in that major.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Billy Carver BIO114
Comment: He is a sweet guy, sarcastic and funny. I have him for Bio 114 this semester, but had him for college algebra and wasn't too bad.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim EC345
Comment: It takes time to appreciate Professor Rotheim's genius. I hated the first 2 weeks of the class. But now as the semester comes to an end his class is the one I will miss most. He explains concepts simply and concisely. I rediscovered my love for economics because of him.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim EC103
Comment: Had him for Intro to Macro. He was terrible. Bounced all over the place and didn't teach us anything. He'd be much better for higher level courses probably.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim EC103
Comment: instead of boring**** that most intro classes deal with, we actually analyzed bush's economic policy- much more interesting, but a lot of work.  i liked the professor, hated the other students in the class.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim ECON300
Comment: Rotheim is extremely intelligent, reasonable, and fun. The biggest problem I had was a lack of defined guidelines (which some might not call a problem). He is a professor who allows a lot of room for creative thinking and coursework improvement. However, he may not be the right one for someone who is expecting a standard, cut-and-dry course.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim EC355
Comment: You will probably hate him through the course of the semester.  At the end, however, you will realize that he is probably one of the best professors you will ever have.  I have become a much better writer because of him.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim HF203
Comment: Roy is one of the most polarizing professors i have ever had. Personally, i loved him, as well as the class i took with him, however others may not agree with me. I learned so much from this class, and experienced things that i had not ever done before, and i hope i will bring those experiences with me in life. Take a class with him.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim SSP100
Comment: Worst class I have ever taken.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim HD001
Comment: Roy is an amazing professor. Very laid back and extremely smart. You can easily have an engaging conversation with him about anything because of how experienced he is. He is also extremely helpful and will be there whenever you need help. Take any class with him! You won't regret it!

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim SSP100
Comment: Needs a good lesson in how to talk to people b/c he's arrogant & inconsiderate.  I have no respect for him b/c of his general rudeness & holier-than-thou attitude.  Avoid taking a class w/ him at all costs.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim EC103
Comment: He's a wise man and he knows his stuff. He's really funny and always approachable! Double cherry on top his class is worth it!!!!

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim MACRO101
Comment: one word- concieted

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim ECXXX
Comment: Amazing professor. He is brilliant and motivating.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim LS101
Comment: It's amazing to see how many folks consider him a conceited tool. I had him back in the early 90's and even then, he had that 'holier than thou' attitude towards students. It's truly a shame so many students feel that way about him. Roy is truly a smart guy. But his openness towards emerging minds apparently leaves a lot to be desired.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim EC300
Comment: he is so nice and helpful - a great great teacher and most definitely not arrogant or lazy. so dont believe the other responses

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim MONETARY
Comment: Roy was awesome. He genuinely cares about students and it appears as if he really loves teaching. His class was one of the only classes that I could apply the material to real world situations. Everything was relevant to current news and you were not reading out of a dumpy old text book. Have even kept in touch since graduation. Great man.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim SSP100
Comment: He's conceited & lazy. Doesnt know what he's talking about so skirts around direct questions instead of answering them. As a prof & advisor, terrible. Not intelligent, doesnt have real lesson plans, doesnt run classes well, tries to force community service on students. If you have a choice, do NOT take a class with him.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim EC300
Comment: Definitely a polarizing professor.  He's super intelligent, sometimes to his own detriment.  You can learn a lot from him if you keep an open mind and trust him.  Accept that he's crazy, once you get this out of the way the class will become more enjoyable.  Oh, and he hates teaching intro and 200 level courses, so wait until 300 level

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim ECON300
Comment: Passion is not there. More of an LS teacher.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim SEP300
Comment: Extremely motivational.  Knowledgeabl and inspiring.  Roy Rotheim was the sponsor of my independent studies at Skidmore and he shaped my entire college career.  I'm grateful and indebted.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Roy Rotheim HD001
Comment: Roy is a great professor, and he is not conceited whatsoever. Roy has high expectations for student, but will help you reach his standards. I think there are negative comments about him because of tough grading practices.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Frances Perkins INTROFILM
Comment: I had Frances for two classes and in each of those classes, she was nothing but amazing! Extremely helpful and very clear as what she wanted done! Awesome teacher!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH110
Comment: She is the best ever.  And a Great God Mommy!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH090
Comment: Mrs. Nilson is by far and way the best teacher I have ever had.  She takes the time to explain everything thoroughly and has a great sense of humor.  She is also without a doubt one of the sweetest teacher at IVC.  So if you struggle with Math, then you should definitely take her class.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH
Comment: all up on the nuts! haaahaa.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH114
Comment: easy and coolclass disscusions shes just the best :)

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH112
Comment: I told you I'd do it Mrs. Nilson!!  Damn, I'd be $100 richer if we'd sealed that bet.  But anyway, I loved your class, and I was so thankful for your help with everything.  Oh and btw, I still can't go through the mountains without looking for "Frog Rock".  I curse you.  Just kidding.  Thanks for being a wonderful teacher!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH91
Comment: Excellent teacher. Makes it easy to understand, allows to make corrections on test.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH110
Comment: shes so cool she explain everything in full detail, she very helpful, take all the classes u can with her.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH90
Comment: She is a great teacher. I took her class because I knew her in the past. Her class was easy and it was fun. I didn't need the book for the class so if you have some what of an understanding of math then you shouldn't need it either. The only tip I have is to keep on top of your homework. I always did it a day or two before the test. Great teacher.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH110
Comment: Never stops talking - never stops talking - never stops talking.....

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH80
Comment: Truly wonderful teacher, who loves teaching and helping all that walk into her classroom. I would definetly recommend her to everyone who feels intimidated by math and to all the nerds too.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH114
Comment: She is such a great teacher!!I recommend taking her because she gives a better understanding on children's way of thinking.Without a question, she's the best!!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH90
Comment: Hated math prior to this class but was able to understand and hold on throughout the semester. recommend.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH91
Comment: Amazing Professor,she is crystal clear in explaining her subject, if you don't understand it she will take the time to help you after class, her tests are fair and easy(if you pay attention), I received an A in this class and I mean it when I say I'm awful at math. She is a great character and and goes easy on grading tests and her homework is easy

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH091
Comment: I Really dislike math and was not expecting to get anything until I took it with this teacher,  I took her for a summer course and even though it was fast pace She was amazingly helpful and just a blast,she's really random and funny,she understands people who are afraid of math and works with them.I would definitely recommend!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH112
Comment: the class is good, you will know what to say to children

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH114
Comment: Funny entertaining, sometimes she like the students to get students attention.  Likes class participation

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH110
Comment: Super sweet lady! Gives a lot of opportunities for extra credit, and she's very thorough when explaining something new or different. Very easy class.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH
Comment: She kicks ass! And she gives you candy! Hehehehehe!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH90
Comment: great teacher clear lectures fun

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Barbara Nilson MATH91
Comment: I really hated math and after i took Mrs. Nilson's class, i enjoy it! She explain very clear and makes sure you guys know what you are doing. Her tests are very easy and you can do some corrections when you get it back. Shes an amazing professor! I was sad that i heard she was retiring after the semester was over. One of the best professors at IVC!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS225
Comment: All of the lectures seem to cover review from other classes. New material gets hidden in the online notes. His humor is great, it breaks the monotony of boring CS theory.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS225
Comment: Very very hard to understand, if you don't sit in the first three rows you won't understand much if anything. Assignments are unclear and don't help inforce curriculum much. Avoid him at all cost!!!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS225
Comment: Volper is awesome. Some people have a hard time understanding his speech, but I don't even with my hearing loss. It helps if you pay attention to what he's actually saying during the lectures. Nowhere else will you find a teacher discussing zombie reprodution, or algorithms that keep track of the future.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS225
Comment: This is a good class to take if you want some time to work on other projects. He doesn't care what you're doing, so 95% of the class (myself included) surfed the Internet or did other things while he lectured. It helped I already knew most of the material. Assignments were a bit unclear and he makes you test your programs on 3 different compilers.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS225
Comment: Volper always held my interest in this class. Though he's not always easy to understand, if there was anything I didn't understand, he made it clear that I was free to ask, and he was very helpful whenever anyone had trouble. Though I understand he wasn't always so good, he's certainly an excellent professor, and one of my favorites.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS280
Comment: Language barrier can be difficult, he gets lost in thought a lot but usually it's in an attempt to explain things better. He is insanely intelligent and kind, and assigns a ton of work. He drops a couple of the lowest assignments and offers a lot of extra credit that can push you above 100%.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS525
Comment: As a master's degree student, it's been my privilege to be a student of Prof. Volper. You need to spend enough time and effort to be successful at his classes but that's the only way to be a proper computer scientist anyway so I don't understand all the hate he gets from those reviews. He improved me and taught me so much, it was the best course.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS280
Comment: Volper is hilarious and engaging. He won't always cover all details of every topic so you should be prepared to ask other students for help completing assignments and understanding concepts, as with any other class. He gives extra assignments and drops the lowest scores, so you have lots of flexibility and he's always willing to accomodate you.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS0
Comment: He will run off at a tanget all the time. reads off the slides and would often say something that you may think is important but say its not important so forget it. 30 mins waisted there and he will say "i think thats what im doing there" Very hard to keep interest when your teacher doesnt really know how to teach.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS520
Comment: Presented the subject matter in a pretty fun and accessible way.  It would help if it were less abstract and more applicable in general (or we had assignments or something for the more theoretical stuff), but that's basically par for the course when dealing with higher level AI.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS0
Comment: The Professor does a great job given there is so much material to go over. he does a great job periodically giving some sort of break as he knows how exhausting the quantity of material is.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS225
Comment: Volper was very difficult to understand at first, but after a week or so it wasn't so bad. Other than that, he seemed to be a pretty decent teacher. It was very hard for me to pay attention, but it's not easy to make a C class entertaining.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS225
Comment: Can't understand a damn word he says, it's like he has a russian accent and a lisp at the same time. Assignments are unclear, although he does help with any questions. Avoid him.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS381
Comment: There's definitely a bit of a language barrier with Volper. But the man at least tries to be there. He has taken time away from his free time to meet with my class on more than one occasion to clear things up. I have found him tough to get into office hours with since I don't recall him ever posting them. You're going to learn how to teach yourself

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS225
Comment: Professor reads from the slides and never really goes into detail except for a few select times.  You may find yourself being distracted or falling asleep.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS525
Comment: unorganized lectures and assignments

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS525
Comment: People rating him low are the students that repeatedly failed in his class. Just because you are dumb doesn't mean the professor is bad.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS225
Comment: Appears to be absent minded and disorganized. He is extremely intelligent but unfortunately this is inversely proportionate to his teaching ability.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS381
Comment: He's a pretty good professor.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Dmitri Volper CS330
Comment: Unorganized. Instructions are never very clear. Sometimes he will sort of figure out the specifications for a programming assignment as he is assigning it with no clear printed instructions available. If you do not understand the meandering explanations the first time, good luck.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Young Lee COMP
Comment: Professor clearly cared about her students and used fair methods for evaluation

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Young Lee MATH101
Comment: Hard to understand in class and she evaluates problems very weird. watching the online ebook tutorials helped me tons more

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Young Lee MATH251
Comment: Not the easiest prof to understand in the beginning but you get used to it after a couple classes. She is the most helpful prof that i have ever had she will bend her schedule most of the time if you need help out of business hours. Everyone that gave her a bad rating is prob because they didnt seek the help they needed and thus got a bad grade.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Young Lee MATH
Comment: Hard to understand, but get past the accent and... still hard work and a pretty fast schedule.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Young Lee MATH421
Comment: Very funny and caring. I had a great time in her class.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Young Lee MATH105
Comment: She is a good teacher but make sure you turn homework in before class starts. If you have computer problems or get to class too late and don't get the assignment turned in then she will not take it. That being said, she is easy to find outside of class if a problem does arise.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Young Lee MATH122
Comment: She is not very clear and does not give great examples, but she will help you if you ask for it.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Mike Fox PM341
Comment: Mr. Fox is a fantastic teacher. He is very opinionated, but will listen to your opinion as well and not condemn you. His classes are easy as long as you can keep up and take good notes. He is extremely helpful, especially when it comes to asking questions about any of the material.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Mike Fox ED322
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Mike Fox ED322
Comment: Mike Fox is probably Crown College's best instructor.  Has requirements that must be met for passing his classes, and does not take excuses, but overall He is an excellent teacher, great sense of humor.  Learned a lot from him

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Mike Fox PREMILLENIALISM
Comment: Awesome class.  Great textbook.  Easy teacher if you do the work.  Always has exactly what he says he will have on the midterms and finals.  Enthusiastic and fun teacher.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Laura Pogue ECN151
Comment: The course ECN151 was hard, but with the teachers lecture notes and tests it was interesting.  I would take the course again.  Good feedbacks.      eText used:  Mankiw, N. G. (2015).  Principles of macroeconomics (7th ed.).  Mason, OH: Cengage Learning.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Larry Hendry PHIL01
Comment: He's straightforward and an excellent teacher

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Lilia Sham SGMT6050
Comment: Professors like Lilia are rare. She is the type of person that will challenge you and make sure you step out into the 'real world' with tangible skills and concrete life lessons. Although M&A with Lilia is a lot of work, you'll get a lot out of taking the course with her as compared to other profs. Give her a chance, she'll surprise you.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Lilia Sham SGMT6050
Comment: Lilia is a veteran of corporate M&A transactions. She is humble and genuine to help her students to learn. She offered outside class coaching. The assignments are challenging as she expects the highest quality when presenting to a Board. Her guest speakers added lots of value to this course. Highly recommended if you want some M&A exposure. ��

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Erin  Wallace ARTSMANAGEMENT
Comment: Erin is very knowledgable about the subject and knows what is expected from everyone!

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Sarah Goodwin EN201
Comment: I was not a fan of her work.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Sarah Goodwin EN110
Comment: Wonderful class, great Prof.  Highly suggested

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Sarah Goodwin EN3
Comment: Goodwin is really a great teacher and a kind person. She's also really funny in class. If you're interested in the Romantics... take a class with her - you'll be glad you did.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Sarah Goodwin EN229
Comment: I love Sarah Goodwin!  She is a wonderfully kind person, and genuinely interested in her students.  She has high expectations, but is willing to go over papers with you and gives excellent feedback.  She has a great sense of humor about class too- no objections to a class wide mutiny when we decided to hold class outside in response to a text.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Sarah Goodwin EC
Comment: Honestly Sarah, get an assistant so you can teach classes again--as an administrator you deprive your students of your glory!

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Sarah Goodwin ROMANTICPOETRY
Comment: She is the best professor I ever had.  And it is to her I owe the success of my thesis.  She is fantastic.  Yes, she should continue to teach as a Dean.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Sarah Goodwin EN213
Comment: Sweet, but way loopy. She waves her hands around a lot and says things like "So...is the poem alive...or dead? That's really the question...isn't it?" She also doesn't like it if you talk too much in class.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Sarah Goodwin ENG
Comment: she's fantastic..loves romantic stories and is a sweet person. incredibly bright.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Sarah Goodwin EN110
Comment: She was a really nice person and was always willing to help outside of class.  But everytime I went to see her about a paper, she did not help me at all.  It was useless going to her as I felt even more confused when I left.  She also makes you write a first draft and a revision for each paper and graded them both with equal weight.. which I hated.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: All of these reviews are about the in-person class. Online with her, there was a LOT of work and no extra credit. Prepare to use the book for some works. Good class and straightforward lectures just demands time. It was also fun to learn what she put. Sometimes, she took away points with bad reasons why but didn't affect me much. Recommended! :)

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: Her classes are so interesting, she makes time go by fast. Easy A if you pay attention to her powerpoints. And you will need your book some times.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: I love Mrs. Kelly! Her lectures are not boring at all if anything theyre super interesting she makes class go by fast sometimes you dont even want to leave. Honestly I dont know how someone can fail this class. Its SUPER easy. All you have is a midterm, one paper, and a final. It cant get easier than that. Easiest A Ive ever had in my life!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: If you have a pulse, then you can pass this class. You don't have to do much other than a few exams and a relatively short essay.  To pass the exams, memorize the various names and dates of the art, and a couple of other specific facts about art in general.  The essay is just a critique on a work of art of your choice.  Good class overall.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART101AND102
Comment: Awesome class sweet lady she loves to talk. Show up on time take notes BUY THE BOOKS there it an essay in 102 not 101 follow the study guides no homework

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: shes really nice, super easy class. didnt have to put a lot of brain work into it. Txtbk only needed for pictures, & its online pdf! just read her readings & assignments are so easy & midterm & final mult. choice. Really learned a lot about art & i dont think it was boring but it was online so i wasnt like falling asleep or anything. Easiest A!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: Finally rating the Best professor in the campus. I honestly have only these things to say: It's an easy A! Show up and you'll pass! Her tests are literally the same as her lectures and she provides study guides. A brain dead monkey can pass her class! Write a paper or two, as she requires it, but its really easy! Controposto pose! rate her a 99/10!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART102
Comment: I took ART100 & 102 with Dr. Kelly. Her class is a breeze as long as you show up & pay attention. She tends to drag on lectures so it's easy to doze off & she takes attendance everyday. Offers 1-2 extra credit assignments. You only need to do the midterm, final, and an essay on your choice of art from the book. Class is COLD & often smells weird.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: Shes the sweetest and one of the only professors Ill truly miss. Shes open to talk to and is very understanding of different situations and will work with you. She loves her job and art so her lectures are always interesting and funny. She gives study guides for her mid term and final. Attendance is counted towards your grade so dont skip.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART102
Comment: Boring class unless you're into history off art. Only lectures, offers extra credit . No homework . Grade determined by one essay , midterm and final -goodluck

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: Very good class. Although her lectures can be long and sometimes get boring, she makes it enjoyable with her humor. Not much homework. Try not to miss class, take notes, and study and that will help a lot for the tests.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART102
Comment: Her lectures are never boring and she lectures with actual interest. She grades based on 3 things: Midterm, Art Essay, and Final. And the Midterm and Final are solely based on her lectures so take hella notes. You basically only need your book for picking an artwork from the book to write your essay on.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART102
Comment: Dr. Kelly is so funny and cool, her class is long and sometimes gets boring but she will always say something funny that will get your attention immediately. The tests are not hard at all if you do the study guide and there is no homework. I learned lots of interesting things in this class so I totally recommend it.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: She is a good teacher who does her best to teach the class. You don't really need the book as she just wants you to have access to the pictures in the book, so if you know someone who is going to have the book it would be better to share it. The tests are easy as she gives you a study guide that tells you exactly what is on the tests.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: Dr. Kelly's class is really easy. She is very passionate about what she lectures. You do not need the book, but you have to pay attention to what she says about the pictures and sculptures because all of that will come out on the midterm/final. There is no homework and you can easily take a picture of the slides.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: AMAZING TEACHER AND BEST ONLINE CLASS I HAD EVER TAKEN.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: Kelly is a great teacher. Very easy class. As long as you are not talking or using your phone, the class is maybe the most chill there is, with her turning off the lights in a comfy auditorium and you just listen to her. Go everyday, write down notes,kind of listen to what she says, study like an hour for her tests, and you should ace the class.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART102
Comment: She's extremely nice and a great teacher. Her passion for art is palpable in her lectures. Your grade is dependent on a midterm, final, and an essay. She allows for extra credit and provides a study guide.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: I took ART 100 online and it was a great decision. I have heard from other students that were lectures would feel dragged on a bit. When online, students can go on their own pace. Discussions and assignments were on very interesting topics. Would take me about 30 mins-1hr to do one module, very easy.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Nannette Kelly ART100
Comment: Dr. Kelly is amazing she loves what she does. She clearly has a passion for teaching art. She is very nice and accessible after class or before. You need to attend to class because attendance is graded! She also gives extra credit!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MATH140
Comment: Dr. Boerkoel is an outstanding professor. The people in the class that complain about him being difficult are really just saying that they were expecting to be given answers rather than taught how to find answers. Dr. Boerkoel is the kind of professor that arms his students with the weapons needed to wage war with a problem and win.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT140
Comment: Probably my favorite teacher in the school. I took this class as an elective, and though it was tough it was definitely a worthwhile experience. If you try, if you improve, and if you're not afraid to speak up you will earn Boerkoel's respect.  There may be a lot, but always do the homework.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel CALCIII
Comment: I didnt like this man. He as a good eacher but difficult to approach after class. I though he was arrogant and a bully. He put on a show as caring during class.
