Try and walk into his office for help while he's playing chess with himself and you'll see for yourslf. He'll throw you out. I did not like him...

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT355
Comment: Good quality instruction. Easy to understand and learn from. Well informed and obviously experienced. Able to answer questions posed in class with clarity and "plain English". He helped make the class easy to understand. Great professor, and good guy.  Funny too!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT140
Comment: His lectures are very repetitive and dry. He also has an arrogant attitude, which makes it hard to approach him with questions. The online notes are also sub-par - I usually turned to Khan Academy for help. He likes to talk about how bad high school is, and then acts like a high school teacher, calling on students and giving pop-quizzes.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT2XX
Comment: Best math teacher at DIT! Extremely smart, and very good at actually teaching math. I generally dislike math classes, but I'm considering taking another one of his as an elective - he's that damn good!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT140
Comment: Boerkoel is one amazing math teacher. He is straight forward and knows the material without any shadow of a doubt. If you work hard, which he EXPECTS you to, you WILL learn just about everything MAT140 has to teach you. His class is invaluable. I'm so glad I had Boerkoel for MAT140. DO ALL THE HOMEWORK!!! It teaches you SO MUCH.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT140
Comment: Thick accent makes it hard to understand during lectures if you sit near the back.  Learn to program your calculator and tests become a breeze.  Online notes can be unintuitive but Kahn Academy covers most topics

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT200
Comment: If you already know the material then you will be just fine. Prefers to criticize you, rather than to teach you the material. Terrible lectures. Retook with a different professor and got an A.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT140
Comment: He explains everything clearly and concisely, proofs EVERYTHING, and answers every question.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT140
Comment: I actually failed his class, but retook it a second time. He is the sweetest of all professors at DigiPen.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT200
Comment: He focuses entirely on theory in an application-based school. His homework load is ridiculous and _will_ significantly screw your time available for other classes. He spends at least half of each class telling you how bad your high school was. He explains the theory of things well, but not application.  I had passed 3 semesters of calc before this.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT140
Comment: You will love Boerkoel one day, and despise him the next, but when it's all said and done, there's no better professor for these topics than the Dutch king of math. His no-nonsense lectures have no frills. Boerkoel can seem difficult to approach, but his demeanor outside of the lecture is a complete 180 from what you would expect.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT140
Comment: Very good lectures.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT140
Comment: BOERKOEL RULES!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT2XX
Comment: I don't understand why he's respected so much at this school. He certainly knows his stuff, but he is impatient with students who do not understand something. He has outright left his office during office hours when you require teaching. He likes to tell you how your previous teachers suck, but doesn't like to teach. Expect PLENTY of homework.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT140
Comment: His way of teaching work well with me and most of my classmates. He was accessible when we want a postponement in an assignment, or when someone had a problem.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT140
Comment: Boerkoel knows his stuff but doesn't have the patience or humility to actually teach it. If you're the student who never has clarifying questions, never approaches teachers asking for help, and never wants to push themselves, then you two will get along splendidly. But the second you raise your hand, chances are, he'll publicly humiliate you.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MAT140
Comment: He knows his stuff, but doesn't know how to teach it in an engaging way.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Ton Boerkoel MATA
Comment: the greatest, he even rivals his grandma

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Mark Fowler SEERITE
Comment: I don't have the course number for Christian Church Epistles, but anyway... He's a nice guy. Not the best teacher in the college, but by no means horrible.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Mark Fowler ANY
Comment: Extremely boring while at the same time extremely easy - if you can read his mind before the tests.  Does not build good student/teacher relationships and is not approachable.  Avoid classes with him at all costs or take them in interims.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Mark Fowler RELIG101
Comment: I had three or four classes with him, and he was bad. Oh, to think of the money I spent on those credit hours!!!! He was the reason I didnt do masters. Nice guy though.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Mark Fowler BI121
Comment: Personally insulted he was chosen and continues to be a "college level" professor.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Mark Fowler BI212
Comment: In Content and delivery, his lectures are very good, but is very fond of the "gotcha" game.  If his classes were my only ones, it would be easy to keep up, but he never mentions homework or tests/quizzes in class, but expects his students to know when they are due.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Mark Fowler BI325
Comment: Very boring. Can be funny but can be very insulting and annoying. Fairly easy just do what he says.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Paul Sager ENG98
Comment: Will help you on things but will still give you a terrible grade

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Paul Sager ENG98
Comment: he is a great professor. The last paper is very tough. extremely helpful if you ask he will help

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Paul Sager COMMUNIC108011
Comment: One of my favorite teachers, hands down. Took his class at FVTC in Spring 2014. I learned quite a bit in his class last semester. He's a tough grader, but he is fair and has a great sense of humor. He will most definitely help you to improve your writing skills!

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Paul Sager ENG98
Comment: Paul is all around a very good teacher and makes class interesting and fun. Extremely easy class, but his grading is pretty tough for most of the essays that we had to do. I would recommend taking a class with Paul.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Robert Pettit SOC101
Comment: Really enjoyed this class because of the engaging lectures.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Robert Pettit SOC101
Comment: informative and understanding. MUST go to class. lecture based exams and lots of reading

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Robert Pettit SOC101
Comment: Pettit was by far my FAVORITE professor at MC, it almost made me sad to transfer because I intended to make many more his classes. He's funny, intelligent, and can keep you entertained all class. Only possible downsides: Very hard tests and if you tend to lean right-winged politically he may say things you'd disagree with.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Robert Pettit SOC101
Comment: I hated this class. it was extremely hard.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Robert Pettit SOC101
Comment: robert is an awesome professor and very funny. class was never boring.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Robert Pettit SOC101
Comment: Dr. Pettit is an awesome teacher!  He really cares about his students.  He makes learning sociology fun and interesting.  Dr. Pettit is definitely an asset to the department and to our college.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Robert Pettit SOC101
Comment: Excellent class taught by a real gem.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Robert Pettit SOC101
Comment: Pettit is an amazing professor! He is willing to help you with anything and he makes the material clear and easy to learn. I am so glad that I took his class because I feel as though I have a better knowledge of Sociology now.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Robert Pettit SOCS161
Comment: Lectures are great, but no classrom discussion. Exams cover handouts, book, and lecutre... so there's a lot to know. But I still got an "A" because his study guides cover everything on the test. You do have to work hard in this class. He's very funny, but classes get long when you spend 2.5 hours listening.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Robert Pettit SOC101
Comment: Pettit is AWESOME! Although, sometimes he lets his political views shine a little too much during lecture, he's still the bomb.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Robert Pettit SOC101
Comment: Never on campus.  Entertains us but doesn't teach.  Thinks he's hard because it's hard to pass his exams which he doesn't even write himself.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Robert Pettit SOC110
Comment: Very funny, very interesting....Robert Pettit is definitely a great professor who puts a lot of thought and energy into making his lessons fun. He lectures, and doesn't ask for a lot of class input, but he's so funny and engaging that you don't really mind that he's lecturing.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Robert Pettit SOC101
Comment: He wants to be popular with students so he tries to be like a young person which he isn't.  He thinks if he swears a lot, students will like him.  He's an interesting lecturer but no discussions at all.  He is very behind the times with technology even when it would help us learn.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - John Hannon ENERGY154
Comment: Great knowledgeable Professor who really likes the material.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Janice Hofschulte MGMT1200
Comment: Great class, very helpful

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Janice Hofschulte CHILD04
Comment: Janice made doing well easy. She gave clear instructions, responded to questions right away, and graded within 24-48 hours. I have been going to college part-time for 4 years, and Janice is the first professor who answered questions thoroughly and quickly. If you stay current and do your homework, you will do well!

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Janice Hofschulte CDEV1200
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Mark Vinci SAXSTUDY
Comment: He has problems controlling his temper. He will launch into a tirade if you don't tell him exactly what he wants to hear. Just remember that Mark is always right and you are always wrong, and you'll do fine.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Mark Vinci SAXBIGBAND
Comment: Mark is phenomnal and I don't think people realize what a genius he is.  He's wise and talented beyond just music.  He has helped me to realize a lot of things about life and music.  He can be scary when he's angry, but it's always justified.  If you ****

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Mark Vinci MU272
Comment: Mark is so cool I can't stand it. He's brilliant, and he has the most amazing teaching style. He's inspiring and knowledgeable and encouraging. I'm just happy to be in the same room with him.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Mark Vinci ENG101
Comment: Mark is the greatest sax player ever! pretty cool person too.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Mark Vinci JAZZ
Comment: Absolutly awesome sax player. Great jazz teacher, for those he deems worthy. Patronizing to all others. Not as smart as he thinks he is, yet still a decent guy.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Mark Vinci 3CLASSES
Comment: Great teacher.  Sometimes likes to tell stories, but will work with you afterwards.  I think any tirades are more bark then bite.  Great guy, but very easy to get on tangents.  Staying on one subject isn't his forte, but he's a blast to study with.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Mark Vinci MP297
Comment: He talks a lot, but he deserves to.  He's pretty much been everywhere and done everything, so he has a lot to say.  Don't be surprised if he repeats stories, though.  He will push you to be the best you can possibly be, and then drive you a little bit crazy.  If you like Benny Carter, this man is for you.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Mark Vinci M
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Mark Vinci MU281
Comment: He's a bit crazy but I adore him. Also learned a great deal and can perform jazz well now.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Mark Vinci JZZ200
Comment: He's completely crazy. Not very intelligent. Not a very good teacher and not a nice guy.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Tom Paine CIS
Comment: very cool teacher. fun class. study for test and you'll get an A.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Tom Paine CIS107
Comment: This class is hard and it should be hard. Skaters ain't gonna last.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Tom Paine CISVB
Comment: Really nice guy, great class. Only complaint- not his fault- college used an old version of VB.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Tom Paine CIS202
Comment: You better keep up. If you stop doing work for a week you are dead.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Tom Paine CIS107
Comment: awesome teacher, definitely my favorite of all of them, easy going and knows how to joke around and he is always willing to learn from students and their knowledge NOT a stuck up "i know it all and you dont" type of guy

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Tom Paine CIS202
Comment: I took VB 2008 with him in Fall 08. It was an interesting, helpful class, but slow according to my standards. He sometimes waits too much for students who for some reason struggle with programming. DO YOUR HOMEWORK and read the text. Practice! Don't expect to learn everything right before the final.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Tom Paine CIS202
Comment: Nice teacher who is always willing to help you or work with you if need to. Lectures can sometimes be dull but still interesting non the less. Homework is a big part of your grade which in the end will have more of an impact on your grade than the actual tests.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Tom Paine CIS106
Comment: Easy guy, like grandpa, very helpful.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Tom Paine CSI
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Michael Iauch ART151
Comment: He is an amazing artist and is clearly passionate about making art, but he expects his students to come out the gate with perfect skills and grades accordingly. He expects large projects, but doesn't give adequate time for them. He doesn't seem to understand that students work too which makes it hard to get the "money shot."

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Michael Iauch COM111
Comment: I took this class because it was a prerequisite for my major and hated every minute of it. This was Iauch's first semester at LMC and it was a hard adjustment for all of us. Overly involved projects for an intro class with minimal instruction and crazy tough grading. The only positive is that our class really bonded while trying to survive. Avoid!

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Bob Dalton HISTBAPT
Comment: The man! In a college full of bad teachers, he rose above them all.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Bob Dalton BAPTISTHIST
Comment: Take in an interim.  He was hard, but if you follow his guidelines you'll make it.  Finals aren't as hard as you think they are, and he likes authors, names of works, and places on quizzing.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Bob Dalton HIST301
Comment: Excellent teacher!

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Bob Dalton HISTORY
Comment: Challenging teacher. Lots of study time, but learned more from him than any other. He knows his stuff! Funny if you are paying attention enough to catch his humor. Though my most difficult teacher, my favorite, too.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Bob Dalton HIST101
Comment: Challenging teacher because he stretched your abilities, and made you think harder and learn more.  He expected you to do your best, because he knew you were capable. He well equipped each student who was willing to learn to be able to go out and do their best for the Lord.  I wish I could be as good of a teacher!

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Bob Dalton TOOMANY
Comment: Great educator.  Very difficult, but taught a lot of useful information.  Humorous, but only if you paid close attention.  The more you have him, the more you will love him.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Bob Dalton HIST101
Comment: great teacher

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Bob Dalton HIST501
Comment: Good

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAM150
Comment: Prof Grace is the BEST! She helped us way more than any teacher I've ever had. Because of her our game was awesome. I'm really looking forward to my next game class!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAM150
Comment: Best game development professor there is!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAT305
Comment: Her class is easy and you can learn more by reading the Supreme Commander Wiki that she will teach you in class.  She doesn't konw how to use the technology given to her to allow for students to see their grades.  Incompetent grader; she looses grades and looses projects.  She is also very lazy and doesn't grade until the class is over.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAM150
Comment: Haven't learned anything useful all year. When it comes to her class, it's best to ignore the lecture and just work on your game. Get better use out of your time.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAM100
Comment: Her class is lots of fun and easy to understand. Highly recommended!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAT310
Comment: Professor Grace has a masterful command of Game Design. Her ability to simplify complex game design elements down to fundamental levels allows students the ability to synthesize, and more importantly, THINK before implementing any facet of game design. Professor Brandii Grace invests heavily in the success and competency of her students.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAM100
Comment: Brilliant! I've never had an instructor that knew more about the subject than professor Brandii! Her class is the favorite of most of the students and for good reason! I hope everyone in the industry is as cool as her.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAT320
Comment: Excellent teacher. Has a great background with lots of experience in Game Design. Only thing I would have wished is we had the pro scripters come in and lecture us.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAM100
Comment: Her teaching lacks direction. We mostly played elementary school games such as 7 Up Heads Up... or Nintendo trivia based jeopardy. Shouts like a YMCA camp counselor, and doesn't understand what she says. Knows the lingo of the industry, but consistently mixes up her facts. Final had a question of when was she born..... very unprofessional.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAT310
Comment: FANTASTIC teacher! Her design lectures are really insightful and she really knows the subject. You'll learn a lot! This one idiot kept trying to ruin it for the rest of us, she laid the smack-down on him! Everyone else agreed this class was da ****!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAM350
Comment: This professor came to class late nearly everyday, gave no more than 3 actual lectures and did not provide constructive criticism for class projects. Her best teaching happened when she was on camera for one of DigiPen?s possible advertisements.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAM300
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAM100
Comment: I wish she would come back and teach again. She was the best.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAT305
Comment: This class is great! She really understands game design and level design. I'm impressed how well she handled the class since we had so many problems with the IT department screwing stuff up for us. Grading was a little slow, but that is to be expected when someone is teaching 5 classes all at once.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Brandii Grace GAM150
Comment: No syllabus until mid-way through the year, not helpful in many ways, mixes up her facts, only knows about the industry and the people in it.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Kristy Nelson SOC135
Comment: I started class with a different professor, who I didn't like and I struggled with; then Dr. N came and took the class over and helped me pass with a decent grade while being encouraging; I thought I was going to fail this class until she stepped in. I am so glad I finished the class with her; like others already said she really cares.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Kristy Nelson ENG105
Comment: Dr. N was very professional and helpful. She helped me a lot with my grammar. Feel more confident now about writing.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Kristy Nelson ENG160
Comment: Great professor; she really helped me with my writing. Very dedicated. Willing to spend extra time assisting students like myself become better writers. She gave me confidence.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Kristy Nelson SOC135
Comment: I really enjoyed this class and this professor. She reaches out to you and really helps you; wants her students to do well. It's refreshing. She responded to questions quickly and asked great discussion questions. The class was interesting and it was nice to have a professor that really wanted her students to do well.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Kristy Nelson ENG170
Comment: Excellent professor. Very prompt, responded to Emails quickly, provided cell number to text and call, and Skyped. Really cares about student success. Had excellent discussions for an online class. I really enjoyed her and her class.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Kristy Nelson ENG160
Comment: Very helpful professor. Prompt and good.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Debra Lynn MUS131
Comment: if u can sing, this class is an easy 1 hr credit

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Debra Lynn MUSANY
Comment: Debra is easygoing and very approachable which are two things that Music majors and non-majors alike can appreciate. Always willing to spend extra time on subjects that are difficult whether it is in the classroom or in choir practice!

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Debra Lynn MUS130
Comment: A Capella Choir is awesome

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Lisa Schreibersdorf ENG101
Comment: I loved Prof Schreibersorf's personality! She always seemed so light and go with the flow. Definitely enjoyed the lectures and the way she taught us how to talk to one another about agreements and disagreements as a way to form opinions.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Lisa Schreibersdorf ENG278
Comment: Took this class online. All expectations were pretty clear. My only problem with her was timeliness. 6 days after grades were due I still didn't have my grades for the semester. In the beginning of the semester she was pretty good at getting all the grades back but halfway through she started lacking. I expect better from an online class.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Lisa Schreibersdorf ENG278
Comment: She had good ideas, but is kind of spacey in relaying them.  She is not very helpful in trying to help you succeed or do better and does not respond to emails from all students, just some of them.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann GO103225319
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann GO103
Comment: incredibly easy, and very intelligent though extremely, how do i put it...aloof.  in fact, he's the most aloof man you'll ever meet. he's still a good guy and a good professor if you put energy into the class

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann POLITICS
Comment: cool guy, very much into what hes teaching, i learned a whole lot from him.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann ALL
Comment: I took every course he taught and had him as my advisor and he still couldn't remember my name.  That said, you learn a LOT, can get away with murder, and the workload is very reasonable.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann POLYSCI
Comment: A GREAT PROF.  VERY KNOWLEDGEABLE ON HIS SUBJECT.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann PS
Comment: Any reasonably informed student could have skipped every day of his intro class and still gotten an A--except for his pesky attendance policy :)  He should have a little more faith in our intellectual drive and abilities.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann GOV225
Comment: Hoffmann has to be the most knowledgeable professor about military history in the country, he guest lectures at many military universities.  His class is very interesting and engaging, I strongly recommend this professor and this class to anyone

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann GO239GO319
Comment: Just going to his class convinced me to be a government minor. I try to take all of his classes, even if the subject doesn't appeal 100% to me. Honestly, I'd like to major in Hoffmann.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann INTRO
Comment: His class is worth taking if only to hear an old man who looks like a hobbit use the phrase  from sperm to worm  over and over throughout the semester.  otherwise...eh...

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann VARIOUSGOV
Comment: Great guy, great professor. Very helpful and nice, kind of quirky but fun in class. Clearly enjoys what he does, he's been doing it for 30+ years. Incredibly knowledgeable about his field.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann INDIAJAPAN
Comment: A prime example of when tenure goes bad. Appaerntly at one time he was good.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann GO2XX
Comment: He doesn't overload you with busy work.  Good guy.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann VARIOUSGOVT
Comment: The greatest professor I have ever had.  I am still using what he taught me today.  He will open your mind and expand your thinking to a critical level that was previously unattained.  With his classes, you get out what you put in.  If you come in with a lackadaisical attitude, he won't waste his time with you.  If you come in ready to be challenged and to truly learn, he'll be an invaluable mentor-like resource.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann GO103
Comment: He is incredibly knowledgeable. While the lectures can be "boring" as others have put it, if you pay attention they're very interesting. He engages with the students if asked questions, but definitely prefers lecturing. I recommend him-he's not a hard grader but that's because he teaches to those who want to learn.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann GO225
Comment: easy. really really really easy. worth taking if you don't mind him forgetting your name and showing you the same part of the same video over and over again.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann GO239
Comment: Dull, dry, and boring lectures.  Sucks all the life and interest out of the subject.  Tells lame jokes to boot. Avoid him if you can.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann CRITISSUE
Comment: Interesting, Informative, REC

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Steven Hoffmann SSP100
Comment: He's a good guy that cares about his subject a lot.  If you ever have any problems with the class, he'll help you.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Gilbertson PAINTING
Comment: Weird!! Wants everyone to paint like him.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Gilbertson ART102
Comment: Quiz are super easy, powerpoint lectures, interesting class. Do reccomend.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Gilbertson ART790
Comment: The best class

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Gilbertson PAINTING
Comment: Great Teacher.  He knows what he is doing.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Gilbertson ART3B
Comment: Very Very easy class. very interesting and fun. not boring at all. test and quizzes are easy. i highly recommend

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Gilbertson ART104
Comment: I took his online class and he only have 5 assignments plus midterm and final. I dont know if he forgot about us or what but it sucked. I missed one assignment and had a D, the midterm was easy as long as you study. I would not take this class unless i needed to and on campus. Goodluck!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Gilbertson PAINTING
Comment: He is very talented as an artist.  He was someone that inspired me to continue my education in the field and contingue my education in Art School.  As a person he is a kind and respectful man.  I also think that the level of ignorance in students is very evident in that they underestimate his knowledge.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Gilbertson ART102
Comment: Great class!!!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - . Gilbertson ART102
Comment: Prof. Gilbertson has been one of my favorite teachers, he's very kind and easy to understand. Very talented individual too. Study the notes and you'll be just fine

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE3100
Comment: Definitely not a full sender, hasn't sent it once in his life. On a positive note, you can use class time to study for other courses cuz you definitely won't learn anything in this class.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE3100
Comment: He is not a good professor. Does not respond to emails.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE3100
Comment: WORST prof ever!!! This is by far the hardest prof at Schulich. DO NOT TAKE HIS CLASS. you will fail. He does everything different enough to make you fail and hate him.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE3100
Comment: Students: Fam bless us with a light midterm yeeerd me Ambrus: Nyeah Ehhh, say less Also Ambrus: *Gives exam with no formula sheet and also gives things we didn't learn* Students: *Fail* Ambrus: *surprised pikachu face meme*

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE3100
Comment: Whatever the antonym of sweeterman is, that's what this guy is. Man is an actual Cyattie ting.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE3100
Comment: I find that he's a decent prof. Definitely knows his stuff, but a bit lacking on the teaching side. Exams can be difficult so go to the lectures and read the text (esp for calculations); but as long as you show that you understand the concept, he will give you marks even if the answer's not perfect. No assignments, just midterm and final.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE3100
Comment: This man once said the Apple watch was a total flop and that Tesla doesn't know what they're doing. LMAOOOOOOOOOOOOO

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE3100
Comment: First of all I don't know how I got an A when bare mans got decked, but I would never take this merked mandem ever again. nuff said.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE3100
Comment: Gives lots of interesting examples to support class content. The lectures are heavy and require a decent amount of time outside of class to digest. Professor is enthusiastic with answering questions. Grading is heavily weighted on midterm and final, but exam content is not too difficult.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE3100
Comment: I feel bad this man is getting roasted cuz he seems like a nice guy and definitely knows what he's talking about, but he really is terrible.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE3100
Comment: I have attended his course as an exchange student from an European target uni studying Finance and it wasn't too bad. I don't understand how the other commentators found the exams particularly challenging. I would say it's quite different from other Schulich courses since there are no assignments but I definitely enjoyed it.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE3100
Comment: The other reviews are hunnet percent accurate.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE6100
Comment: Instructor knowledge: great Teaching: poor Exam difficulty: medium/hard

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Ambrus Kecskes FINE6100
Comment: OKAY So, first off --  Ambrus is the sweetest prof ever.If you attend his class, participate, and actually read the slides (not EVEN the textbook)... you will do well in the course. I just took notes in his class, and did super well because the questions on the exam resembled EXACTLY what he talked about in class.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger CS
Comment: ive heard hes a good math teacher (being a math professor) but he had no idea what he was doing teaching computer science.  i wish i had a more solid foundation of programming but dont due to him.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger MA112
Comment: best math teacher i've ever had

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger MA111
Comment: Was a good professor.  Explained things well and lets you use 1 sheet of paper for the 2nd test and 2 sheets for the final.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger MA113
Comment: Everything you want in a professor: brilliant, teaches things well, available if you need help, friendly, the list goes on.  Really wants you to succeed, and makes the effort to make that possible.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger CALCCALC
Comment: Good math teacher, forgiving about tests (gives points for test corrections), jokes not funny. I liked how he allowed you to bring reference sheets to class and he was good at relating mathematical ideas to real world situations.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger ALGEBRA
Comment: Def. one of the toughest profs here.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger MA111
Comment: Gove is an awesome professor that loves what he does. Take his class, his jokes are amazing and his method of teaching is easy to follow. <3 him!

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger MA111
Comment: smart guy, doesn't know how to teach. gives out powerpoint presentations every class you get new info, but he doesn't fully get the point across, and the book blows

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger MA111
Comment: Professor Effinger is AMAZING. If you put the effort in, he will do everything in his power to help you. Obviously if you don't go to office hours and review sessions he can't help you, but he really does everything in his power. He also does not make you feel dumb, no matter how base your question is. I would recommend him to nervous students.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger CALCII
Comment: this guy rules hard. one of my fav profs

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger CALCIANDII
Comment: not a bad guy at all, just has trouble relating the harder topics to non-math minds, but you can get by with an A with minimal work if you study hard for the exams!

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger MA113
Comment: Awesome professor!  His was the only class I enjoyed going to.  Very clear and always ready to answer questions.  Great guy!

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger CS101
Comment: comp sci rules

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger MA214
Comment: He's a good professor in general.  My only grievance is that some of the lectures come straight out of the textbook--the most interesting times in class are when he breaks away and presents more advanced theories and applications.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Gove Effinger CS106
Comment: When I had him, apparently it was his first time teaching C++.  All I can say is: it better have been, he had no idea what he was doing.  It was kind of empathetically embarrassing.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Polly Deeringer 1STYRENGGR
Comment: Easy teacher, but not a lot of fun.  She isn't very clear for those who are confused.  Gives a lot of homework and assignments.  Take Mandy Aldmon if you have the choice.  If not, grin and bear it.  Speech is the same way.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CS116
Comment: Elie is one of my favorite teachers. I had learned ActionScript a few years ago but hadn't worked with it since so I forgot everything. I literally feel like I'm learning it all over and truly understanding it for the first time. If you mess up on an assignment, there are always plenty of bonus points for turning in your work early and extra credit

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CS116
Comment: Elie is an asset to Digipen and quite honestly one of the main reasons I'm still here. He's the first teacher who has been able to make computer science make sense to me and that's saying a lot. It doesn't hurt that he works extremely hard and goes out of his way to help people. Very down to earth and wants everyone to succeed.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CS116
Comment: Pretty helpful teacher. He will reply to e-mails timely and is usually available during his office hours. Will always ask if anyone has questions and will stay after class to help you with your code.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CS185
Comment: The best thing the BAGD program has going for it is professor Elie. You'll get vital technical knowledge from someone who not only UNDERSTANDS how to teach, but is more than fair when it comes to understanding your workload. Do not skip on any class he offers, his classes are the reason to stick with DigiPen. He's hands down the best teacher.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CS116
Comment: Elie is an awesome teacher. He is incredibly helpful and will stay late after class to help you no matter how far behind you are. He admits he's going easy on us because this class was spur-of-the-moment and we are BAGD, but he still wants us to learn. Sometimes he is hard to hear even while yelling, and he's got a sense of humor to keep us sane.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CSA
Comment: Elie was always willing to help and go over things students didn't get or didn't understand. He wasn't always perfectly clear, but I generally attribute that to the language barrier.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CS116
Comment: The best teacher I had my Freshman year at Digipen. He not only knows the material well, but knows how to teach it, too. This is something lacking at Digipen, so it was refreshing to take his class. Probably the best programming class I've ever had, and I've taken several from different schools. He's very helpful so ASK QUESTIONS!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CS175
Comment: Elie is a great professor who is willing to help any student who needs it. All of his assignments have clear guidelines that are easy to understand and follow.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CS116
Comment: Elie is cool professor. Sometimes I feel that he tried hard to sound funny and keep the class focused on what he's saying. I think he's very helpful to us and I wish all the professors are as helpful as him!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CS120
Comment: A very fair and helpful teacher (which also comes from him being an advisor). His instructions are laid out clear for students, and he has high expectations of his students (as do all teachers at DigiPen). I had a little trouble with his accent at first, but within a week I was perfectly understanding him.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CS170
Comment: good lecturer and clear grader - even if promptness of grading can be lacking at times

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CS176
Comment: Elie is both extremely knowledgeable and extremely helpful. I have learned a lot from him, and it's fun working on his assignments.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CS116
Comment: Very knowledgeable and is able to simplify and teach the course (ActionScript in this case) from the ground up very effectively.  Gives plenty of opportunity for extra credit and making up, and is very easy going during class in regards to answering questions and helping out any problems encountered during lab.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Elie Abi-Chahine CS116
Comment: All hail Elie! Most awesome and fair Prof ever! If you have the option, ALWAYS GO FOR HIM!

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Richard Klein COM150
Comment: Very good professor, very knowledgeable about the material and a very friendly guy who is always willing to help students.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Richard Klein ENG101
Comment: He covered topics fully until everyone in the class understood it.  He's really understanding on other things going on in life.  Often held group revising sessions before a paper was due (which was very helpful).  Overall I felt it was an easy class.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Richard Klein ENG101
Comment: Helpful and fun

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Richard Klein ENG102
Comment: Get papers done early and have him look them over for a better grade. Group revising sessions are awesome. He is lenient and will allow things to be turned in later than the due date but do not abuse that privilege as he will take off some points. Great teacher.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Richard Klein ENG110
Comment: This teacher is very difficult. i would recommend finding another professor. Does not accept late assignments.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Louisa Krueger HEOP1231
Comment: Some worksheets are easier than others. I did not like how you have to interview some people for assignments. Some assignments you cannot save until the last minute for that reason.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Louisa Krueger HEOP1231
Comment: She is very quick to respond to her email and questions you ask. Also very open with meeting with you if need be.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Louisa Krueger COS126
Comment: She is tough on grading, cares less about students efforts. I will never recommend anyone to take her class

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Louisa Krueger HEOP1231
Comment: Loved her.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Brian Steinberg GEO207
Comment: Professor gave good feedback during each module in class. The Professor Participated by asking another question or followups to other class students. Very interesting subject. I was able to locate areas that were in the news.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Katherine Tinsely GST100
Comment: Worst professor at Manchester. Don't ever take a class with her if you can avoid it.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HIST120
Comment: not cool :(

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HIS102
Comment: I don't recommend this teacher to anyone his class is a total waste of time. I went to every class meeting did my homework I would do all the extra credit and tried very hard on the test and I didn't pass his class I failed it and ended up with a "F" it was just a waste of time DONT TAKE IT WITH HIM his lectures are boring

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres 2004
Comment: Mr. Andrees is the best theacher aroun campus, who said that hisory is fun? it is not, but he made it seem easy and clear to comprehend, i liked his class very much... besides of teaching you interesting stuff, punctuality was an everyday value to practice....      I really really recommend his class only if you want to learn something...

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HIST121
Comment: Dr. Andres while very knowledgeable in the subjects is hard to follow.  I often found him rushing through some sections of the class because he spent too much time on his pet subject (civil rights/race issues, especially with Mexican-American).  If you disagree with him or are late he will hold it against you.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HISTORY
Comment: Whatever... he thinks he's**** now that he has his PhD. Not Helpful.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HISTBHIST
Comment: I felt compelled to chime in because I thought he was one of the best professors I've ever had! Yes, he's a goofball, but he's only trying to liven it up. If you pay attention, take good notes, get to class on time and practice your essays for your final you will ace the class...but if you're lazy and don't care then you will definately fail!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HIST4000
Comment: Dr. Andres, while a nice guy, is pretty difficult to follow. He gets frustrated when certain students show no improvement and takes it out on the whole class with hour-long rants on how important it is to strive to improve.  If you genuinely try and show interest, and attend his office hours in addition to class, it is passible.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres LBST2101
Comment: His lectures are very interesting. His passion for the subject makes listening to him lecture not so boring. I never really zoned out much during the class. Beware of tons of readings. Also, if you don't read, you will definitely fail every quiz he gives you. He's very nice and humble as well. He's very willing to help all of his students.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HISTORY
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HIST121
Comment: He's Funny and Cool!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HISTORY121
Comment: His class was very intereting and he always made these lame jokes that he laughed at, which made them funny. The assignments were pretty easy and the tests were okay.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HISTY120
Comment: DON'T TAKE THE CLASS WITH HIM!!!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HISTORY63
Comment: This teacher has a HUGE attitude problem. He is beyond unhelpful and obnoxiously rude. And the "jokes"...LAME! Afterall he IS the only one laughung @ them. After taking this class with him I wonder how he's even still a proffesor here!!!!!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HISTO120
Comment: he hates people that are tardy and kicks you out if late. He is a really hard teacher but will do OK if you read the assigned material he only requires a mid term the final and a essay report from a book you have to read. He makes bad jokes and always laughs by himself.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres AA
Comment: Dr. Benny is History machine!  This well lubed latin engine will drive you to the edge of recorded time and back again.  Fasten your seatbelts my fellow time buffs, you are in for the ride of your life.  If this cadillac of crusades doesn't blow your hair back then its you who are missing out, not Dr. Benigan.  The future of History is NOW!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres SOMEHISTCLAS
Comment: i have to agree on the whole tardy nazi, but the thing that makes him a terrible professor is that he's a total scatterbrain that stammers all the time. His lectures do not follow his notes 93% of the time. There's not a whole lot you can do for absences and extra credit... but at least he's not as boring as Mr. Jacobson...

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HIST121
Comment: The guy was worthless, he would walk around class like a crazy person ranting about history and how he knew so much about it and never gave you one assignment. The only assignments you have are the Midterm, an essay, and the Final. Not a fun class at all. Do not take this teacher!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HISTORY
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres HIST121
Comment: its all lies. he's a great teacher, but i'd suggest getting his courses in the summer. the material is all compressed but easier. there ARE chances to get extra credit. yeah, he doesn't like tardiness but why waste his and your time.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Benny Andres OK
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Paul Adamson THEA113
Comment: He is a very kind teacher. Learning to read music can be difficult but he makes the process seem easy. If students don't understand what he's teaching he always tries to find a way to help everyone understand the material. He pushes you to become a better musician but respects student's limits. He is an awesome teacher to learn from!

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Paul Adamson THEA113
Comment: Paul's personality can take a bit of getting used to, but he truly cares and has a good heart. He is extremely knowledgeable in his area of expertise and has done well in teaching the students. He is essentially the voice teacher for the guy students.

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Paul Adamson THEA224
Comment: A good teacher. Talks a lot because he knows a lot. 10/10 appreciate the effort he puts into helping his students.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs FPOLICY
Comment: Great teacher

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs GO103
Comment: Really good guy, extremely easy grader, but a talker for sure, rambles quite a bit.  Knows a lot, but kind of unclear.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs GOV
Comment: Extremely nice, extremely helpful. Difficult to understand at times, has a bad habit of talking incessently for the entire class and thereby quashing any kind of discussion possibilities. Class was fairly easy.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs GO001
Comment: He is the most intelligent guy I've met. He is like a living encyclopedia. However, he does talk alot. His preferred mode of teaching is lecture. In 300 level classes he incorporates more discussions though. He is always available for help. Very nice & funny. Definitely recommend his Latin America classes to anyone.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs GO228
Comment: if you want someone to teach you the subject, dont take this class. he knows his stuff but its impossible to learn in his endless lectures.the only hard part is the midterm and final when you want to kill yourself. he asks for way too much info for the length of the papers leaving you lost as to what is important.really nice guy, nota great teacher

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs GO103
Comment: I would avoid him at all costs for an intro level. He is clearly knowledgable and helpful, but I imagine that matters when you are in more advanced classes with him. For the intro level, he simply lectures and there is no space for class discussion. It's unbelievably boring and he managed to turn off a very engaged, interested student in politics.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs GO229
Comment: He knows his stuff.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs GO103
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs VARIOUSGOVT
Comment: The good news is that I caught up on a lot of sleep when I actually went to the class.  I think I understood about 3 words the man said during the course of a semester.  He sort of had a bad habit of slipping back and forth between English and Spanish, and as anyone who read my rating for Rangil can gather, that didn't work well for me.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs LATINAMER
Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs FPOLICY
Comment: Professor Vacs is EXTREMELY friendly and a very easy grader.  However, I've taken two courses with (received A's) and learned absolutely nothing.  Sitting in his class is painfully boring, and his exams (although easy to BS on) have very little to do with anything covered in class.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs VARIOUS
Comment: You can get away with a lot in this class if you know your stuff.  He's smart, talks a bit too much, but gives fairly easy assignments and is flexible.  Great guy.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs GO103
Comment: He once spent a full 55 minute class period exploring the concept that you can't judge a democracy without defining the word democracy. He would be worth taking for the unintentional comedy even if he wasn't so easy.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs GOV103
Comment: Easiest class I've taken at Skidmore. Has a heavy accent but you get used to it after a while. Puts all notes ahead of time on board so not too much additional note taking needed. Not getting an A in this class means you're not that bright.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs GO
Comment: He knows everything about Latin America. But he can't teach.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs FOREIGNPOLICY
Comment: I'm sick of people whining about his accent.  They are ethnocentric barbie dolls that can't think outside their ipods.   You just have to listen, attentively, and by the third class there is no problem understanding him. Prof. Vacs is a little slow to get papers back, but he's really helpful and I learned a lot.  Don't plagiarize:  he'll catch you

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs GO309
Comment: words like greatest teacher of all time get thrown around a lot, but in aldo vacs case, it is totally deserved. take him if you're ready to sit at the feet of the master.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs GO103
Comment: Professor Vacs is extremely boring.  I have class at 10:10 in the morning which isn't really that early for me and I find myself wanting to fall asleep all the time in his class.  He rambles and does not teach and if you ask a question his answers are not that clear.  He knows a lot just can't teach

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs GO209
Comment: Knows all u need to know

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Aldo Vacs TX202
Comment: If you ever want to take a class on Latin America or international relations, Vacs is your professor.  People will complain he's boring and lectures for too long but Vacs knows his subject like the back of his hand and has been to nearly every Latin American country and has worked for the U.N.  He does have an accent because English is his second or third language but you'll be able to fully understand him by the fourth class.  Vacs sympathizes with his students and can be a great guy if you get to know him outside of class.  I had problems writing the term paper for his class so he found articles and photocopied them for me.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Kristi Sexton ENGLISH
Comment: Has high expectations but will work with you to give you the help you need to meet them. Always there to help. Kind and caring. Super smart but teaches in a way that is easy to understand.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Kristi Sexton ENG101
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Kristi Sexton ENG101
Comment: Amazing teacher. She made English great.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Kristi Sexton ADVCOMP
Comment: Great teacher, really nice and very funny.  She really connects with her students.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Kristi Sexton BRITISHLIT
Comment: Awesome teacher.  Makes English come alive.  Guaranteed to make you love English even if you hate it.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Kristi Sexton EN302
Comment: Mrs. Sexton is absolutely the best because she makes you work and she cares about you. I love her!!! Also, she is super smart, classy, and really passionate about literature.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Kristi Sexton FHGEN120
Comment: I had her for a genealogy class at BYUI this past semester. She is very nice and encouraging. She doesn't accept any late work.

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Kristi Sexton AMERICANLIT
Comment: She is very helpful and easy to get along with.  The class can be hard, but if you stay on top of things, you'll be fine.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT301
Comment: Very knowledgeable and approachable.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi TLMT400
Comment: The best professor ever, very understanding and professional about his work.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT4001
Comment: This was the second course I have taken with Dr. Hachi! He was an excellent instructor! He helped me to grasp all learning objectives. He also shared his wealth of knowledge and experience with everyone in the course! Would highly recommend his courses.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT304
Comment: Professor habchi is the right choice for Reverse Logistics, he is Fai and extremely knowledgeable, and I would love to work with him in a Reverse logistics Company. It allowed me to express my thoughts and beliefs about a subject. I hope I have the opportunity to have another class. A professional I truly admire.Scott A

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT400
Comment: This professor has been one of the best Professors I have met at AMU.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT304
Comment: G4REAT PROFFESSOR! EASY GRADER. A FEW 2 PAGE PAPERS THROUGHOUT THE COURSE AND A 8-10 PAGE PAPER AT THE END OF THE COURSE. WOULD TAKE THIS COURSE AGAIN! DEF RECOMMEND.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT400
Comment: Dr. Habchi is an excellent professor and I would take any of classes in the future. He leads by example and is active in the forums. There is a written assignment each week and multiple readings. However, if you have good time management skills, you will be fine.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT301
Comment: Very good class, the professor is very strict with homework and discussion. The reviews are in place and timely, and they point out the shortcomings professionally.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT304
Comment: Looking forward to have him in another class down my degree

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT495
Comment: I have had more than one class with him. I have enjoyed them both.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RMLT301
Comment: The professor was very good at presenting the information and letting the students demonstrate what was read during our discussions.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT301
Comment: Love this class and I will recommend this class to my friend.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT495
Comment: Dr. Habchi is one of the best professors I have had in all my college experience. No only is he attentive but also extremely helpful with questions I had regarding any assignment in any of his courses. He is one of the most intelligent human beings I have ever come across. I highly recommend his courses!

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT301
Comment: This Professor is a very fair grader. If you know you're not going to be able to finish an assignment on time, please give him a heads up and he will accommodate you. but don't wait until the day of the assignment to let him know.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi TLMT400
Comment: I really enjoyed his class! While sometimes homework gets tough, you just have to do your best to pull through. I was in a bad car wreck in June and I have blown away by the support each Professor and the school has given me. Granted I have enjoyed all my Professors but it is really great to learn some really exciting things from them as well!

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT306
Comment: This is my second class from this professor and he is a real value to this institution and his students. He has tons of knowledge and experience in his field and really easy to work with and provides some of the best feedback. I would definitely recommend this professor to anyone that is considering to take his class, it was a pleasure.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT4001
Comment: Great professor really available for any questions over the material!!! Thank you for the information you taught me.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT301
Comment: Very clear expectations are set and with that it was easy to understand what is required and to follow along. Great professor, would highly recommend.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT400
Comment: Very paper-heavy, once a week had a paper due which was something no other class I was in has done. Ultimately a pleasure to have as a professor.

Teacher Name: Allied American University - Jad Habchi RLMT301
Comment: Great Communication with students and good grader

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Faghya Shafiq ACTG5210
Comment: Gives really easy examples in class but extremely difficult exam questions. Night and day in terms of what is taught in class. No focus on complex problem or how to solve it.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Faghya Shafiq AKTG5210
Comment: Great classes, great resources posted, POOR EXAM DELIVERY. The reason for that is that the prof's resources posted are way easier in difficulty compared to what is tested and that the exam time is 2 hours when it requires 3 at least. Not sure if the way the course delivered is based on the prof or on the department in general. Either way BIG NO.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - Erica Strauss ENG01
Comment: Rambles for most of class. Doesn't answer questions about what you ask.

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Joy Zasadny BIOLOGY12601
Comment: She knows her stuff and teaches it a fun and easy to understand way. She has high energy and is pretty funny! The class itself is a lot of work and be prepared  to have a test every week.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta CALC
Comment: he was the most boring teacher that i have ever had... well that may be a lie but seriously... i felt bad cause i had a habit of sitting in front and falling asleep... id wake up cause i could F-in feeeeeel him dogging my ass hardcore :/

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta MATH80
Comment: good teacher, but can get a bit boring, but he helps you out if you need it. he goes kinda fast tho. but he give you plent of chances to gain extra points. and everything is multipul choice

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta ALGANDTRIG
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta PHY200
Comment: Super intelligent, just starts equating the whole board w / no previous warm up.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta PHYSICS
Comment: cool guy, class is very interesting.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta PHYSICS
Comment: bad teaching

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta PHYS196
Comment: great teacher, really knows what he is doing if you study and like what your doing you'll pass this and any of his classes. best math teacher ever

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta MATHMATH

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta MATH190
Comment: he teaches what you need to know(might have to go read the book once in a while)tip:do the suggested practice problems and work out every problem 'til you get it right(don't give up and wait for the next class meeting for him to work it out)Another thing, long classes are always a bit tiring after 2 1/2 hours. Quizes and tests are multiple choice.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta PHYSICS
Comment: Very boring, sometimes started working out problems on the board and screwed up, disruptive for those copying from the board. Only offering physics at 7 AM doesn't help his score.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta MATH90
Comment: Dry lectures

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta PRECALC
Comment: I thought his class was so effin boring ... he has to be one of the worst teachers at school!!! Do not take this guy ... unless you like boring, not so helpful teachers ...

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta MATHB1
Comment: he is so nice he is awesom If you study you can get easy A in this class he gives you a bonus 5 point quiz he is very helpful teacher

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Joe Archuleta PRECALC
Comment: Loved not having to waste my time on homework, but having it available when practice was needed.

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Abby Fuller SOC215
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Manchester University - Abby Fuller SOC311
Comment: All exams are open book and open note. If you go to class and take good notes, you'll have most of the exam material there. The textbook is good for definitions and such. Other class materials can be used, so take notes as you read them.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Pat Ferraioli MANYMANY
Comment: Professor Ferraioli is a fantastic Professor. Just watch out--she has a high standard of excellence and she'll hold you to it.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Pat Ferraioli GO311
Comment: she is the best! she is soo into what she is teaching and an enthusiastic teacher always makes a great class!

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Pat Ferraioli GO224
Comment: Great teacher.  Knows Native American politics and history well.  She's the teacher you've always wanted to avoid, because she's intimidating, but she is really always ready to help

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Pat Ferraioli WS001
Comment: Pat Ferraioli is one of the smartest professors I know at Skidmore, and in my opinion the best professor in the gender studies department. While she often gives vague assignments and expects you to fill in the blanks, she has taught me through this technique to do very good work.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Pat Ferraioli GO101
Comment: Amazing professor! She is very into the material she teaches. She has an extensive knowledge of law and government and has such an interesting array of experiences to share. I highly recommend taking a class with her. She's a rather hard grader but the work you put into the class and what you learn is so worth it!

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Pat Ferraioli GO101
Comment: Not quite sure what everybody else is talking about...I got a B+ using knowledge i gained my freshman year of high school.  It was the same thing everyday, the three branches of congress and native americans.  Didn't teach me anything.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Pat Ferraioli GO300S
Comment: BEST.PROFESSOR.AT.SKIDMORE. HANDS DOWN.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Pat Ferraioli GO212
Comment: She was cool

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - Pat Ferraioli 2000
Comment: best teacher ever!!!!

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Melissa Ball-Martin COM110
Comment: She is honestly the best teacher I had at LMC. She is passionate about the communications department and making sure the students (no matter what department they are in) feel like the Communication Arts department is a safe place to explore their creativity and ideas. She cares for everyone like the quirky aunt that makes her own jewelry. Love her!

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Julian Evans DOSA
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Julian Evans HOMESCHOOLSEM
Comment: Was very opinionated but was great in listening to our arguments in favor of our views.  Homework was easy.  Tests are easy if you know your notes word for word - which most of us didn't.  Grades easily though so all pass the class.  smile

Teacher Name: The Crown College of the Bible - Julian Evans BI360
Comment: Excellent teacher, very accommadating, not a lot of "busy work"  Covers large amounts of material very well in a short amount of time.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS101
Comment: Pretty bland class, it's computers. You have to read the book, and use the online supplements, it really helps for tests. Some projects on another book. TWO books required for the course. VERY small class size, almost got canceled.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS101
Comment: This Professor  was clear on requirements,  and was offered clarification  on assignments. This Professor really cares about his students.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS202
Comment: Teacher not so helpful just used the book.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS101
Comment: It was my first time taking an online class; definitely you have to read the book, there are so many concepts to learn but you can use your book for quizzes and tests.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim 20656
Comment: JUST BECAUSE YOU HAVE THE CREDENTIALS DOES NOT MEAN YOU SHOULD BE TEACHING. HORRIBLE TEACHER!!! If you do end up with him as a teacher make sure you complete all the work assignments, it will help your overall grade :(

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS101
Comment: If you do your work you will pass! Tests are open book, even final is open book. Just make sure homework is done & you dont miss any quizzes.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS101
Comment: He is pretty cool teacher he lets u use the book for test which is good. Cause remembering all the parts of computers, software's, websites,etc it is difficult. So thanks teacher for helping us students to learn

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS202
Comment: Mr. Ghanim is a good instructor, he gives you the tools and points out the important info to take notes on, in order to study for his tests which I was not really fond of. He does give homework and it does impact your grade big time. Overall if you do study the material and keep up with most of the homework you should be fine. Strongly Recommended

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS210
Comment: Learning a programming language is not an easy task, without commitment. You're gonna have to read every week to keep up with the class. If you do read and try your best at coding the hw you're assigned each week, this class isn't all that hard.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS101
Comment: Although Professor Ghanim is a very monotone person, this was probably the easiest class I've ever taken. Ever. Book is used very often, as all tests are open book. If you pass with anything less than an A, then shame on you, honestly.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS210
Comment: There is no extra credit and he doesn't give points for attendance so make sure to do all the homework projects and take all the tests.  The tests are not too hard. The teacher sends email reminders before the homework projects are due and before the tests.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS210
Comment: GET INTERESTED IN HIS CLASS. Prof. Ghanim is a good teacher and regardless of all the reminders and helpful suggestions, people seem to tune out the positive with what they think is bad. Remember, your responsible for studying, your responsible for submitting the files through Blackboard at the right time, and if you need help, ASK!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CS210
Comment: Class gets boring, but it's relatively easy if you follow the homework assignments plus the end of chapter resources.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS101
Comment: Awesome instructer

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS101
Comment: Teacher is fair and explains everything. The class is not hard.  The projects from the books are very important.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CISPROGRAM
Comment: HORRIBLE TEACHER DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASSES.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS101
Comment: ok so, his grading scores are like this: 40% homework, 40% Tests, 20% Final. homeork is so easy, but the tests, oh god, they are really tough, study, A LOT, both the book and the page he tells u to log in, and even then u will barely pass the test or even pass it with flying colors, good teacher but his tests are hard, His Final was easy tho.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS101
Comment: Hes an alright fellow. His lectures are pretty good as well as caring. Hes also very helpful when you need require his assistance with your weekly assignments. Just do good on all the test and turn in the assignments and you'll be fine.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS101
Comment: Pulls up a lot of articals that are biased to use in class doesnt use articals with different opinions, very opinionated. I fact check what he says and what the articals say, sometimes not all correct or very controversial. Easy to pass class, I just wouldnt take it again.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Walid Ghanim CIS101
Comment: Professor Walid is a very caring professor. He enjoys helping students who need help on assignments and is easy to get a hold of outside of class. ALL test even the final are open book. I recommend taking this class if you have trouble understanding computers and modern technology!

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Bill Morrison GAT251
Comment: Honestly, Morrison is fantastic. He really cares about his students, and works tirelessly to help them get to where they want to. I've taken several classes with him, and he's been just as fantastic in every. single. class.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Bill Morrison GAT251
Comment: Bill has come a long way in his time at DigiPen and is continually improving his pedagogy. One of the nicest teachers at DigiPen... extremely fair and always helpful. I would take any course with him again, though his tendency to arrive to class unprepared is a bit annoying I must say.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Bill Morrison GAT315
Comment: He's really a sweetheart. If you've managed to get through sophomore year with him, 315 and above are nearly a "family gathering" where you hang out and show your progress. His slides/lectures are pretty boring, but once you get past that, passing the class is up to you.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Bill Morrison GAT210
Comment: Morrison is a controversial teacher; students will say that he is easy to fail, and has a bad grading scheme. However, if you follow instructions and his rubrics, it is extremely hard to fail a project. Your grade on a project reflects the amount of work you put into it, and if you're in trouble TALK TO HIM. He is extremely helpful and underrated.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Bill Morrison GAT210
Comment: Fun and interesting, he has a lot of great information to share.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Bill Morrison GAT251
Comment: Morrison is a great guy who will definitely help you if you ask for it. He's there to give feedback but do not expect him to perform in-class examples. He's got a lot of design knowledge and he's funny, but my biggest concern is he needs more "how-to accomplish this/theory" beyond showing us games on the computer.

Teacher Name: DigiPen Institute of Technology - Bill Morrison GAT110
Comment: Ridiculous. Morrison reads directly off his power point slides and has little to no additional information to contribute. The lectures last about half the duration of the class time; it digresses into an open forum for discussing how poorly designed his quizzes and papers are and how everyone's failing. We pay for this?

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - John McDowell MATH091
Comment: he's a great professor. his class was super fun and i learned so much from him. i hated math and now i love it and really enjoy learning. wish he was teaching my next math class. i will miss him!

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - John McDowell MATH093
Comment: The entire class loved him. Down to earth. NEVER makes you feel stupid for not understanding. I was TERRIBLE at math before I took his class, now I am confident in my ability to understand. Exams represent what was covered in class perfectly. Grading was more than fair.

Teacher Name: University of Wisconsin - Fond du Lac - John McDowell MAT090
Comment: I'm awful at math and he really helped, he had a good sense of humor and is genuinely there for his students. Great teacher, made the course a lot more fun.

Teacher Name: The Schulich School of Business - York - Laurence Mussio SGMT6720
Comment: One of the best professors, great sense of humour, practical material and lots of historic and contemporary examples. Took Managing Globally - Past, Present, and Future and do not regret. Prepare to read and write but also have fun.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox SO226
Comment: Everybody loves bill fox

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox S
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox SO101
Comment: Great Teacher. Enthusiastic, Funny, Clear about the materials and discussions, and entirely off the wall.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox SO226
Comment: This guy is just old man cool. I like how he makes jokes and gets really excited about what he is teaching. This man knows his statistics.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox SEMINAR
Comment: It's hard to pay attention... really boring.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox SO101
Comment: Sure, he's funny and anecdotal. But classes are hard to get through and he often falls behind, leaving you responsible for everything he neglected to cover because of his "two second" side stories.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox SO226
Comment: Crazy guy

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox SO101
Comment: Crazy cool of a guy.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox SO101SO226
