Comment: Just a really cool casual guy and loves to joke around. If you're looking for a professor who isn't afraid to crack a joke, and wants you to make jokes too, this guys for you. Relatively difficult grader but too cool of a guy to put down.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox SOC101
Comment: Excellent, enthusiastic, and fun courses

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox SO226
Comment: One of the best teachers at Skidmore. Great teacher and funny guy.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox LS1
Comment: knows a lot about everything

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox SO226
Comment: I'm amazed Fox is getting such good ratings. True, he's crazy, hilarious, and IS a genius. But 90% of our class was falling asleep everyday, and even when asked to clarify something, he just used crazy analogies to make no sense at all.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox SOCIOLOGY
Comment: What a great guy!  I totally dig him!  Funny, smart, nice, helpful.  If you're a sociology major, and even if you're not, you should try to take at least one class with him.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox STATS
Comment: He's the quinticential absant minded professor, but he's awesome.  Made stats fun.

Teacher Name: Skidmore College - William Fox S0226
Comment: CRAZY.  random guy, does a lot of **** to amuse us and himself.  But also a pretty clear teacher and he always gives out copies of his powerpoint presentations.  Hard grader though... unexpectedly.

Teacher Name: Notre Dame College - Dr.Audrey Curran PY201
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Notre Dame College - Dr.Audrey Curran PSYCH202
Comment: One of the best teachers I ever had!!  She was so interesting and insightful and made the class fun. She communicated clearly and had a great sense of humor!

Teacher Name: Notre Dame College - Dr.Audrey Curran PY201
Comment: Great prof hard class

Teacher Name: Pine Technical College - Pamela Munkberg HPPC1002
Comment: Great professor, she is funny and a straight shooter. I read this textbook front to back and studied the given criteria for test vigilantly. Tests every week but she gives a good warning of what will be included on the test - pay attention and STUDY!!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH80
Comment: I don't think anyone not good with math should ever take a class with her. She is no good for slow learners in fact condecending most of the time.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH192
Comment: Let me state that I'm not a mathematician (but a computer girl), but as a serious student, you will need time for homework and projects. Tests are EASY if you do the work. Don't hesitate to go to her office. She's friendly and caring --plus funny. She makes math interesting. I'm glad I took the class with her. Ask questions! Read ahead of time!

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH110
Comment: She is a lot of fun.  This class is very helpful for future teachers.  Just do your homework, and ask questions when it starts to get too confusing, she will help you.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH192
Comment: She gives real life examples of how math would be used in everyday life. She is a nice and caring teacher. The only drawback was: If you are planning to take this class make sure you have a lot of time on your hands because her projects require spending A LOT of TIME at the math lab and going to her office to ask questions.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH194
Comment: Great teacher, makes us work and teaches pretty well, even if she is condescending sometimes. She's also pretty funny sometimes.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH230
Comment: she is really helpful and in her class you get to learn alot anybody who is considerng the math major this is a good way to star

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH210
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH90
Comment: Would never take here for another math class. She acts as though you are already supposed to know everything before the class even starts.Whats the point of the class then? A bad teacher all around.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH210
Comment: this class is a lot of fun, she explains everything in detail, she is a very helpful teacher a real friend of the students

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH80
Comment: Unless you are in Math 90- or higher with HER she acts like you dont exsist in the Math Lab. She is fine for upper leve math but lower level forget it unless you like unclear tests and her formulas proven wrong by other instructors

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH240
Comment: this class is a bit hard but she is a great teacher that is willing to help out the students I have taken her for others classes and they are all tough very good :)

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH140
Comment: The class was OK.  You had to do homework online which is good and bad. I thought her tests were really easy. As others have stated, she expects you to know how to do a lot going into each lesson so don't fall behind. I didn't like the projects because of how time consuming they were.  And there's 4 of them!  Add that to all the homework required.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH140
Comment: She was a decent teacher. I think she expected too much out of us and that didn't help. Taking the class once a week was really annoying and hard. Although it's not her fault, she was gone 3 times.  Doesn't sound like much, but the class only meets up once a week.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell TRIGMATH
Comment: Zobie was fun and made you learn.  But she's not teaching anymore.  Retired.  Good luck Zobie

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH192194
Comment: EXCELLENT TEACHER!! TAKE IT FROM ME...I'VE TAKEN TONS OF MATH COURSES AND ALL OTHER TEACHERS HAVE SUCKED..SHE'S GREAT IN EXPLAINING THE MATERIAL AND SHE MAKES MATH LOOK EASY...VERY EASY GOING AND HAS A GREAT ATTITUDE...IF YOU'RE CONSIDERING A MATH OR EG MAJOR, SHE'S THE RIGHT WAY TO GO..

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH090
Comment: Not a very good teacher. She does not hand out homework, and though that sounds great...You fail the quizzes she gives you. How you suppose to learn the stuff esp. when your an online class. You need homework. Not clarity really, but she gives you a chance to redo some quizes. Don't take if you have a hard time with Math because you will fail.

Teacher Name: Imperial Valley College - Sherry Zobell MATH
Comment: BEST teacher for CALCULUS 1,2,3 . very nice, test are o.k. gives extra credit. the only bad thing is you have to do some really hard projects. they can be tedious at times. stressful. overall. good teacher

Teacher Name: Lees-McRae College - Kristin Ivey SOC220
Comment: I started this class failing the first few weeks. I took the Intro to Sociology class as a Soph. in 2010. I thought it would be an interesting class, and it was. I was raised very conservative, and this professor is my # 1 reason for who I am today. She questioned and confronted every illogical ideology I had and helped me be a more caring person.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON2467
Comment: Best professor I've ever had, he is the guy that got me into economics as a major, and I found myself recording his lectures. I went into economics of the oceans with low expectations and came out amazed.  Also the fact that he gave us the textbook for free was a nice bonus!  Highly recommended, even as an elective for outside majors.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON1202
Comment: No homework, exams are easy as long as you pay attention in class and take notes. Great professor!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON2467
Comment: Professor Hallwood wrote the textbook and the powerponts for this class - Economics of the Oceans. Both the book and the lectures are easy to use. He makes the class interesting because he is really into the subject matter; and he likes to tell jokes and asides. Definitely I recommend this class

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON1201
Comment: Paul is the guy. Probably one of the best in Avery Point. He is so passionate in classes. He never uses PPT and gives a full lecture by writing graphs on board. He never counts attendance but don't expect to get an A by only reading textbooks and not coming to class. Because exams cover things in classes. A little British accent, but that's cool.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON1201
Comment: Paul Hallwood is one of the best professors for ECON, I took all his classes. His class is lecture heavy, but he gives a lot of personal examples and tells funny stories about his experience and that of people he knows. His grading is fair, but you will have to take good notes in class and study for the exam. Exams are usually MCQ and Short Answer.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON3422
Comment: Amazing professor and really nice guy. He repeats the issues multiple times to make sure everyone understands whats going on (which is great if you're like me and have ADD). He uploads a PDF of the textbook and it makes a great resource if you don't understand the material. Gives an outline of the exam questions. Write test answers verbatim to him

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood HUM1A
Comment: Clark talks more about the historical aspect of Huckleberry Finn, Rowlandson, and Crevecour. He's not a bad lecturer but he's not outstanding either.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON2440
Comment: I'm taking this class online and honestly, I love both this professor and his class's content. He is so passionate about what he teaches and his class is made up of just exams (which he gives the questions to beforehand) and essays (but simple). I'm only halfway through there semester but I already wanted to come on here and say take this class!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON12011202
Comment: Professor Hallwood is a wonderful professor. Having completed both 1201 and 1202, I can attest to his ability as an educator. He is passionate about the study of economics and makes the subject interesting and even funny! Whether you choose to take an Economics course as an elective or required course, I would recommend taking it with Hallwood.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON1202
Comment: Excellent class.  All of his lectures are handwritten, and he is enthusiastic about the content that he teaches.  There is no homework or required attendance.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON2467
Comment: Paul is the MAN. Not only is he extremely knowledgeable in the real world of economics, he is HILARIOUS. Take any of his econ classes. His lectures are extremely straight forwards, and tests&quizzes are based off lectures. I have taken 3 classes with him and have not bought any of the books and got an A in each of the 3 classes.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON2467
Comment: Study guide gives you all the questions for the exams.  Interesting subject.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood HUMANITIES
Comment: Ughh, he's got to be THE MOST boring lecturer in the whole humanities series.  I couldn't stand the way he kept repeating his thesis (like a million times) Hello! enough is enough!  We get the message!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood CRIT100B
Comment: The reading list for the course was interesting and texts were compelling, though he did not inspire, and discussions were often dry when they could have been engaging.  A bit too ivory-towerish.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON2467
Comment: Helps gain a stronger economic background as it relates to commercial banking and resource economics

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON3421
Comment: I am a senior at Uconn majoring in finance. I have never learned nor enjoyed any other class at the University more than Prof Hallwood's. He is extremely intelligent, but he also cares about the kids. I feel very fortunate having this class (international trade). If UConn had more Profs like him the students be better educated.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON1201
Comment: I took his online course and I highly recommend taking any classes with him. Exams were not hard at all and he would tell you the essay questions before hand with the answers. Definitely take him if you can.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON1202
Comment: Excellent prof, best I've had at UConn. Really passionate about economics.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood HUMCORE
Comment: His lectures were clear and usually concise.  His use of artwork to explain the themes of the book was at the least helpful, at the least innovative.  An excellent teacher, I only wish he could replace the three weeks of Van Sant.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood HUMCORE1B
Comment: i don't sleep in class and i could not for the life of me keep my eyes open.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON3422
Comment: Paul is great, he wrote the textbook himself, which he also gives to every student for free. he has so much knowledge, he tends to deviate a lot from the book which makes going to class KEY. he give short exams every two weeks, but he gives a study guide for every exam, not hard at all, just pay attention to class, do the study guide, Ace the exams

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON1201
Comment: Great class and excellent professor. Hallwood is a very knowledgable man and gives great lectures. I learned more about microeconomics this semester past than I ever have in any other class. He is very nice and prepares you for each exam. If you ever need help, he's there for you. Also funny guy and a very enjoyable class.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON1202
Comment: Great professor. really knows what he is talking about

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON2467
Comment: Hallwood is a great professor, he literally wrote the textbook on this class. He lectures best when not using powerpoints, although for this class he went used ppts and it was a little dry at times (a decent amount of maritime law if thats your thing.). Prepare for the quizzes the night before and youll be all set. A great guy to chat with as well.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Paul Hallwood ECON12011202
Comment: Paul is the every reason I want to go to this boring school. Funny British accent. Easy tests. Economics getting hard in the end. But this is a hard course so you have to study. He has great passion to every lecture and really knows the world of economics. Doesn't take attendance. He has books written by himself. Best professor ever.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC401
Comment: Lectures basically consist of going through the figures from the book and having her explain it to the best of her ability.  To prepare for tests you have to read through the book and memorize every part of every slide.  If you can do that you will do well... its not easy. Final Group project helps bring grade up by a bit since she grades it easily

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg 205
Comment: Worst class I ever took. Tests are impossible, lectures are confusing and put you to sleep. She is extremely unclear on her PBL assignments and just excepts the students to read her mind. Never done as bad in a course in my life as I did in her bio 205, and I am a health science major.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg 205
Comment: Hard class but if you took AP Bio you are set. Be prepared to teach yourself after each lecture. You  have to knit together bits and pieces of her lecture and make connections she doesn't point out in class.  Tests were easy for me but very hard for others. She gives practice tests but you really need to understand the material thoroughly.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC401
Comment: Absolutely terrible. I could've (and have) learned more from prudent use of wikipedia than from enduring this class. Obviously taught for pre-meds who live by rote memorization. She is not at all gracious when answering questions, which really makes me question how competent she is to be teaching this material in the first place.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC207
Comment: Dr. Schmieg is a nice lady, but she is really boring. She sounds very monotone and everything she teaches is directly from the textbook. She also has a really good curve which helped boost my grade. If you want to do well, read the textbook and try your best in lab (there's a lab final at the end of the semester).

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC207
Comment: The class is all memorization, and not nearly as difficult as everyone makes it seem. If you have background in bio already, then it will be a piece of cake. Otherwise, if you just skim the chapters the night before the exams, then you can get an A pretty easily with minimal effort. 84 and up was an A. Not the best prof, but it's an intro course

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg 205
Comment: I really liked Dr. Schmieg as a person, she was really nice but a confusing professor. Although her tests are hard everything is curved and the labs really helped with grades so don't worry! Taking ap bio in high school was a big help.  The textbook helped me a lot.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC205
Comment: terrible teacher, reads straight off of power points and isn't clear with information

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC205
Comment: You could study for 30 hours for Florence's exams and still only get a 44. But don't worry, group PBL's and Bio Lab and her curve will boost your grade to at least a C! Don't bother showing up, getting the textbook, or even studying for that matter.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC205
Comment: Her lectures are incredibly confusing. It is sometimes more beneficial to read the book alongside the powerpoint than to try to understand her confusing lectures. If you try to follow along to her lectures, be sure to bring your laptop, or you'll oftentimes be scrambling to write a full slide of notes in 20 seconds.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC207
Comment: Lectures are scattered and very confusing- sometimes she throws in unnecessary details. Use the textbook and her PPTs on sakai for clarity. Despite her confusing lectures she is such a nice lady and is willing to help her students as long as they ask. Go to her office hours if you're confused about a topic and she will likely help you!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC205
Comment: Doesn't know what she's talking about, doesn't help students at all in class. When questions are asked, she rarely responds without a question as an answer. She steals her powerpoints from the book and claims that her slides are better than the book.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC207
Comment: Lectures go in circles and powerpoints are just pictures from the textbook. You dont have to go to class unless its a PBL day (which she says in advance). If your PBLs are extremely detailed, you will do well. Tests are MC& very hard. I didnt go to class,but studied for hours&read the book and got an A. She has a hugeee curve at the end (84 & upA)

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC207
Comment: She is terrible. her teaching style is very monotone, she's probably the most boring person I've ever had to talk to. She's no where near helpful and has a really bad attitude. Her tests are impossible to pass with higher than a 69.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC205
Comment: This was one of the worst classes I have ever taken.  The powerpoints were unclear, and she talked in circles the whole time.  She gave maybe 30 seconds to write down all of the information on a slide, which never made sense anyway.  It's better to just skip class and watch Khan Academy videos and then rely on the curve for your final grade.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BIO205
Comment: She really knows her stuff but she is not clear at all. If you do attend class, bring your computer to take notes and just listen to what she says. She bounces around slides a lot but atleast she uses pictures. She has a huge curve cause she doesn't want us to fail. Make sure you get all the easy points you can! She's nice but unorganized.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC205
Comment: Very bad professor. if you took AP Biology in high school you should be fine but if you didn't youre out of luck. She goes so fast and just reads off her power points. Tests very hard, 3 and a final(not cumulative). Relied on labs, group projects and the curve.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC205
Comment: She was not a great professor. She was very hard to understand and her tests are nearly impossible. Most of us got Ds and Fs on the tests, but she adds a huge curve at the end of the semester.. Group projects and lab will bring your grade up. Don't buy the textbook. Good luck!!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg BISC207
Comment: She is absolutely terrible. she talks in circles the entire class and her exams are impossible. the class average is usually a 58 and I would rather stay home and read through the book than go sit through class.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - Florence Schmieg MOLECULAR
Comment: Love this class!! 10/10

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins HCC1A
Comment: Okay, what was with the maps? Half of his lectures were dedicated to unnecessary historical and geographical background. He was an okay lecturer, but not really interesting. At all.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins GRCALL
Comment: One of the best teachers I've had. Mike has always encouraged me and helped me to do better. As long as you do the work, you will get along with him.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins HUM1A
Comment: Not as clear as the other lecturers, didn't talk directly about the texts as much.  Lectures were pretty easy to follow.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins GRC101
Comment: Mike has been a great teacher and mentor. He prepares you for the real world and if you have it in you- you will do well- period. He is one of the best in the field!

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins HUMCORE1A
Comment: His lectures were a little harder to follow, but he still presented good points. He also got creative with interpreting pictures and relating it to the books. A lot of people favored him over Hart and Van Sant.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins HUMCORE
Comment: An engaging and interesting lecturer. His lectures were coherent, creative, and memorable.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins GRC131
Comment: This teacher was absolutely horrible.  He expected you to just KNOW how to do everything, he never taught you anything and was hardly ever in the room. Also he graded on whether he liked you or not instead of how well you did on the assignment.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins GRAPHICCOMM
Comment: He is a terrible teacher. He expects you to learn everything on your own and he's never in the classroom.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins GRC131
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins HUMCO1A
Comment: He was more helpful than Van Sant, however still boring, sometimes unclear, but very very intelligent. With his lectures I think its best to bring a recorder then play it back! He brings up interesting points , but honestly iin the morning its hard to follow.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins HUMCORE1A
Comment: He was an okay lecturer, he spoke loadly and knew his material, even though at times he could be a bit boring.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins HUMCORE
Comment: Professor Clark's lectures were the most interesting this quarter. He used a lot of visuals and had great connections between the three books he covered. He was very interesting and I would definitely recommend him.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins GRCCLASS
Comment: I enjoy Mike's classes.  He works you hard, but only because you need to KNOW the material.  He expects you to perform at a high standard, which is what your future employee will expect as well.  He's a great guy!  Love to hear him rant about the slackers

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins GRC411
Comment: Mike is brilliant. He always offers professional and caring guidance.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins GRC121
Comment: He is a good teacher and gives assignments that prepare you for the future. However, when it comes to having to use a program for the first time, such as learning how to use InDesign(GRC 121), he treats the class like everyone knows how to use it already. You basically have to learn it on your own. Also, he doesn't like to use the books very much.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins HUMCO1A
Comment: He really knows his stuff but can be pretty boring at times. He's not the relaxed type and always starts lectures a couple of mins early so get there early! He always gives a lot of background to what is being read and is into studying art related to the work. He also likes to read from the book...aloud in class....a lot.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins GRC121
Comment: Mike is great teacher and a great guy.  I really enjoyed taking his class.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins HUMCO1A
Comment: Excellent lecturer. Clear and doesn't beat around the bush when getting his point across. Though it can get boring at times because of the material, he's still a really good professor.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins HUMCORE1ALECT
Comment: Professor Clark was helpful even though lectures were a bit dry.  He gives a good background to the work he is covering and helps you understand the history of the time.  Worth going to lecture for sure!  He is a very knowledgeable instructor.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Mike Watkins PHDEXAMS
Comment: Can make your blood freeze during the orals but definitely motivates you to know your stuff.  An expert on both colonial and 20c American lit.  Good to have on your dissertation committee b/c he's so well-connected professionally.

Teacher Name: ITT Technical Institute - Bothell - Steven Bredeson CJ200
Comment: Steve is easy to listen to and has a lot of knowledge to share. I look forward to taking more classes from him.

Teacher Name: ITT Technical Institute - Bothell - Steven Bredeson HUMH1B
Comment: Very clear and concise lecturer. He improved my comprehension and understanding of the texts in HumCore.

Teacher Name: ITT Technical Institute - Bothell - Steven Bredeson ENG102B
Comment: I recommend Professor Clark- not only does he teach an interesting topic, but he has a sense of humor which pairs well with his extensive knowledge on American history. He gives most people B's. Only about 10/90 students received an A. Lectures are easy to follow even if you haven't read.

Teacher Name: ITT Technical Institute - Bothell - Steven Bredeson TBTECH
Comment: Made a boring class exciting,  Good instructor and fun

Teacher Name: ITT Technical Institute - Bothell - Steven Bredeson CJCJ
Comment: Steve is an awesome teacher!!! Lucky students get Steve.

Teacher Name: ITT Technical Institute - Bothell - Steven Bredeson CJCJ
Comment: My favorite teacher of all time! He's fun, professional, makes class fun and interesting and treats all his students like family!

Teacher Name: ITT Technical Institute - Bothell - Steven Bredeson CJ261
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: ITT Technical Institute - Bothell - Steven Bredeson HCORE1A
Comment: you reallyyyy have to pay attention in his lectures because his outline for his notes are very minimalist. he uses a LOT of pictures and he seems like a way chill person. overall, a pretty good lecturer

Teacher Name: ITT Technical Institute - Bothell - Steven Bredeson CJ241
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Barbara Lachenbruch FOR331
Comment: Really cares about us

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Barbara Lachenbruch FOR331
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Barbara Lachenbruch WSESECT
Comment: Not very helpful. Can't trust her about her suggested reading topics for the exams.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Barbara Lachenbruch FES240
Comment: Barb cares a lot about her student success and will bend over backwards to create opportunities to pass. If you put in the work it will pay off. She allowed like 50 points extra credit, which is enough to bump a letter grade or maybe two.  She is a little on the ditsy side, and often goes on tangents. Overall though, you should get A's if you try

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Barbara Lachenbruch FES240
Comment: Very understanding and helpful

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Barbara Lachenbruch FES240
Comment: Great lectures that cover a lot of the material found on the quizzes, and exams. Attendance is taken, but she is lenient on it. She really wants to teach you something she is passionate about, and it really shows in the material she puts together for the classes. Will always answer any questions in class or outside of.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Barbara Lachenbruch FES240
Comment: This class was really challenging for a non-major. It was advertised as being a Baccore class but without previous forestry knowledge it was very difficult. Ended up SUing it because there was so much material we were expected to know in such a short period of time.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Barbara Lachenbruch WSE312
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Barbara Lachenbruch FES240
Comment: Barb is great. She really cares that you learn the material instead of just lecturing and expecting you to get it. She'll clarify anything you ask and  appreciates the effort put into class. Plus, your labs are in the forest! Way cool class and very interesting. Just pay attention and come to class and you'll do well. And ask for help if its needed

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Barbara Lachenbruch FES240
Comment: She's kind of funny in lectures. Get the most out of the class if you interact in lectures

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Barbara Lachenbruch WSE470
Comment: Fascinating class.  She cares about us learning the material.  Assignments make sense & are part of the learning process.  Had to do a group presentation which I hate (who doesnt') but overall, a great class with pertinent, timely information based on the latest research.  Fabulous guest speaker.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Barbara Lachenbruch FES240
Comment: I love Barb, but to tell you the truth, she is extremely scatterbrained, while her lectures are informative and the material is there, if she didn't distract herself or go on a little tangent, she would be gold.   She is really really nice and easy to talk to as well.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Vlad Hartman COLOR3
Comment: Excellent

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Vlad Hartman ADLAB3E
Comment: I absolutely loved Vlad's Class. He really knows what he is talking about and I love how he doesn't baby anyone. I learned so much about color correcting and printing. Best class by far. 5 Stars!!! So helpful if you actually ask him. Overall you define your own success. If you don't like him its because he doesn't baby you or your hipster photos.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Vlad Hartman PHOTO
Comment: hard

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Vlad Hartman PHO101
Comment: He sux

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Vlad Hartman 4X5CAMERA
Comment: hard grader but I'm learning tons

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Vlad Hartman PHOTO
Comment: This teacher says horrible things about people. Though he is good with phtography he has other issues.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Vlad Hartman PROPHOTOIII
Comment: Vlad will come to be your favorite teacher because he pushes you so hard to be excellent.  He is a bit intimidating at first, but he is incredibly helpful when asked.  Do the work and have it in on time and you're set.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Vlad Hartman PROPHOTOIILAB
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Vlad Hartman COLOR
Comment: He is very intimadating but excellent teacher!

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Vlad Hartman PRINTING
Comment: Very discouraging

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Vlad Hartman COLOR3
Comment: hard grader but learning so much

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Tom Castle MKT208
Comment: Great teacher - excellent real world examples. Explains things very clearly.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Tom Castle MRK101
Comment: Excellent professor.  Was always my favorite.  Very helpful and uses lots of real world material to make it more applicable.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Tom Castle ENG100
Comment: you really have to do the reading and go to lecture to get a good grade. grade is based on two exams and the final, attendance and participation are not considered, he's a tough grader, he explains a lot of the readings in class but at the end of his sentences, he lowers his voice, so you really have to listen. boring class, but informative.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Tom Castle MARKETING
Comment: He is awesome.  One of the best teachers I have ever had.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Tom Castle BUS201
Comment: Not as great as everyone seems to think.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Tom Castle ENG100
Comment: Prof Clark is wonderful! You have to read, attend class and use your brain! If you make the effort, Clark will work with you. Attend office hours and introduce yourself to him. He is extremely helpful and understanding if you have any issues with the material or the class in general. Read the material, Show up, take notes, and you will do fine!

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - Peter Van Dyck DR204
Comment: Ive taken over 10 drawing classes at three colleges, Peters was by far the best. He somehow manages to be both the best painter and the most humble person at PAFA. General consensus among students is that he is an excellent teacher, and that checks out with my experience.

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - Peter Van Dyck ENG100
Comment: English 100 is the worst English course I have ever taken.Theory is something you either love or hate (I hated it).You might as well take this professor because he's better than Warminski. You must attend class and you have to take very detailed notes. I'm an A/B student and I studied my ass off for this class, but still got a B-

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - Peter Van Dyck PT200
Comment: I took his figure painting classes. He definitely lacked racial awareness; if he did, he enjoyed exploiting them (slick). He sometimes make jokes that were racially insensitive and biased which were uncomfortable. This is sad, I signed up for his class because I looked up to his painting talents and perhaps I thought he was gonna be cool.

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - Peter Van Dyck DR100
Comment: I took his perspective drawing class. I did all the assigned works and somehow my sketchbook was lost so I couldn't show him the works I did which he have seen throughout the SEMESTER and he gave me a C for that. This dude is racist. Also, this is suppose to be college level but his contents are superficial, HS geometry has more substance then this

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Ed Hughes EDUC349
Comment: Mr. Hughes is very, very, VERY knowledgeable. I think that I learned more in his class alone than the rest of my time at ULV. He is a wonderful teacher. The only downfall is that he likes to repeat himself and this wastes time and you stay until 9:30 or 10:00.

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Ed Hughes EDUC348
Comment: There is no reason NOT to get an A. He's a great teacher. His assignments take effort, but they are not difficult. We would also spend time, drawing, singing, acting, and dancing. It was fun!

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Ed Hughes EDU349
Comment: this class was extremely easy! he is such a nice guy. Not much hw, just some notes from the book, easy easy easy quiz and final couple of papers but nothing big you could do them in your sleep! only bad thing is that he goes tell 9-930 :(

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft SOCI1001
Comment: Really sweet lady! Shes very helpful, just show up to class and you will pass.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft SOC107
Comment: She gives you every chance she can to excel.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft WS1124
Comment: I LOVE NANCY CROFTS. She's not your average WS instructor- Far better. She's so great! Take this for a GenEd if you can!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft SOCI1100
Comment: Easy class. Wild teacher, she is always telling strange stories, but easily the nicest person you will ever meet. She gives ample opportunity for extra credit. Great Gen Ed class.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft WS
Comment: great teacher and role model

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft WS
Comment: Professor Croft is really nice and helpful and if you pay attention in class you will do well.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft SOCI115
Comment: awesome teacher and person. her stories are nuts. ive taken every class she teacher and they're fun and interesting. take as many with her as you can!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft WS1168
Comment: Great instructor.  Very helpful and loves what she teaches

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft SOCI105
Comment: Such a cutie! Love her, she even brought us cookies.  Very knowledgable.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft SOC1251
Comment: Nice lady but a terrible professor. Her lectures jump all over the place with no flow to them. She rarely writes things on the board but still expects you to know the terms. The textbook is useless. No organization at all to her course, so far this was one of the worst courses I've taken.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft SOCI1001
Comment: Extremely nice lady - classes are kind of random but the work is not hard at all. She shows good movies in class.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft SOCI1001
Comment: Mrs. Croft is a very very sweet lady. She offers many classes and I highly recommend taking them. As long as you show up and put effort in, it should be an easy A

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft SOCI1251
Comment: Took her WGSS and Soci course spring 2020 and loved it. As long as you pay attention and go to class you should pass her course with flying colors

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft WOMENSSTUDIES
Comment: good teacher, really easy

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft SOCI115
Comment: easy overall and good to have her...interesting way of teaching....and her stories..

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft WS1124
Comment: Great teacher! She has an upbeat personality, and the class is easy!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft SOCIOLOGY
Comment: Shes a great teacher, very enthusiastic and helpful.  Her classes arent that hard either, i recommend taking any of her classes.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft SOCI1001
Comment: Great professor who really cares about her students succeeding. She is very helpful and passionate about what she teaches.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft WGSS1124
Comment: I recommend taking this gen ed because she is a great professor who is helpful and passionate. Her classes are not hard if you show up and take notes.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Nancy Ellen Croft SOCIOLOGYWS
Comment: Best teacher I've ever had. Funny, sweet, intelligent, she rules. She knows tons about movies and comedy, too, which is a bonus. Oh, and she lived in Africa and worked in the Peace Corps, which kicks ass.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: At first, Bellamy seems awful. Discrete is a pretty tough subject and he is unorganized as can be. He writes out long boring proofs that you can pretty much space out and ignore a lot of the time. However, even though his grading scales seem super weird, if you put in a decent amount of effort in it is actually fairly easy to get an A.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: The class is not tough like people talked about, but this professor is not good one to take. In the class, he just follow his thoughts to talk in spite of whether students can follow or not. handwriting is confusing.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH230
Comment: Professor Bellamy is not a good professor at all. His grading system consists of a homework grade and a test grade, and whichever is lower is your average. 2 of the tests are kind of easy, but one is very hard and it will ruin your average. He is also not good at explaining anything.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH245
Comment: I think Bellamy is great. You don't have a textbook in this class. I love the way he grades his students. Basically if you work hard enough you will get an A in the class, and it doesn't matter how you do on exams. He's a nice guy, terrible with names. Still doesn't know mine. Taking him again next semester.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: His lectures are so frustrating: he just stands at the board and rambles on without actually checking if you understand it or not.  He gives a normal amount of homework which are pretty hard, but the test questions are always easier than the homework.  You have to put in a lot of individual effort in order to do well.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH245
Comment: He uses a point-based grading system for all of his classes, so if you put the work in early, you don't have to take the final or show up for the last few weeks of class. Get up to the board to do some proofs as soon as possible.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy FRE2241
Comment: He is very unorganized but he focuses on the grammar and making sure you understand how to use each word and conjugation properly. You do get graded on your attendance but if you still turn in your work and show an understanding of the material he will cut you some slack. He gives you until the end of the semester to make up any written or online.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: Bellamy is one of the worst professors I've ever had.  He really doesnt care if you understand the material or if you pass the class.  He tells you to ask questions but then makes you feel stupid for asking that question.  Seriously, dont take him unless you want to fail

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH243
Comment: he's not exactly a good professor. If you have to take him, don't sweat it but I wouldn't choose to have him. Nobody really knows what he's talking about, but he usually gives an overall feeling of what the exams look like. Grade is based on the lower of your test grade and hw grade, so it's important that you do your hw. Not impossible to get A/B

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: I'm taking this class now, and it's most likely the most difficult class I have ever taken. Don't expect to learn too much from the lectures as the notation can be quite confusing. If you don't understand one little detail, it's unlikely you'll be able to fully comprehend the proof or theorem he's writing on the board. READ the text and do the HW.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH241
Comment: The teacher is nice. Grading system is great. It is easy to get a good grade if you work hard. Calculus teacher can not teach you every single algebra. This teacher can give students a good start. You need to work on them after class. He does not care about the antecedence and texting during class. Just a little homework will be provided.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH241
Comment: Easy class if you've already taken calculus. If you haven't, you're going to have to study a lot. He teaches through sample problems, then assigns very similar ones for homework. Tests are pretty easy, he gives 5 questions on each test where each problem is worth 25 points but the test is graded out of 100 points. Overall, easy class.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH245
Comment: He isn't always the most clear and doesn't necessarily get up to teach this course. He makes you learn proofs by presenting them. Its pretty easy to rack up points and he has a unique grading scale that pretty much gaurentees you to pass if you come to class

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH241
Comment: A great professor.  A litter home+not required participation. It's easy to gain A. I got 100+ in all three exams.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: I took him when i had no other options. He's the easiest of the professors, just the class material is somewhat confusing. His grading system is weird but makes it easy. His Exams are easier than homeworks by far, and you can study with friends for the homework. Would recommend him.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH230
Comment: Professor Bellamy is not as bad as he seems the first week of class. He doesn't have a Sakai or Canvas page so you must keep track of your grades yourself, but he is a great professor. Homework is hard, but you do not have to complete all of them to get an A. Exams are the easiest part of the class, which is a nice change of pace for a math class.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH210
Comment: You should avoid Bellamy..Not a good professor at all. Tests are very hard, and he doesn't care about his students' grades at all. AVOID

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH245
Comment: 150 points is an A and you get points for asking questions, going to class, and doing proofs. If you put the work in you'll get an A.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH230
Comment: This class is really dumb and easy. The grading system seems hard but he is very generous with points. Half the class didn't take the final because he said it couldn't hurt your grade and we already had A's.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Bellamy MATH241
Comment: He is a very good professor. I can get a pretty good grade on his exam. He just give a little homework a week and no on-line homework.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MANAGEMENT
Comment: His classroom policies are similar to those of elementary school

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT212
Comment: This man treats students like they are morons and like second class citizens. This man does not care about anyone. Real harsh. This man should retire for good. Shame on baker for hiring this man.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas BUS101
Comment: You can tell he is not a teacher - only experienced in the business of GM and bragging that he knows it all. He is a "good old boy" and thinks less of females. He makes unnecessary and inappropriate comments about females and someone should report him to the dean. Teaching is way out of his league.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT212
Comment: Doesn't get much worse than this...absolutely no teaching skills, and poor personality.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT301
Comment: I learned a lot from taking Mr. Dumas's class. He likes to crack jokes, but is serious at the same time. Come in with a willingness to learn and, you will do fine.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT301
Comment: Great teacher. Challenges you and, makes the class interesting . Will be taking another class with him again in the spring

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT212
Comment: Mr. Dumas was a very helpful teacher. He is pretty laid back with students but he means business as well. He was very nice and liked to crack jokes. He made the class very interesting.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT101
Comment: Grades hard on the term papers and you need to study for the test half of the test is fill in the blanks

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT101
Comment: Do your assignments, sit up front, laugh at his jokes, and you will do just fine.  He is very nice.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT211
Comment: Was only a class of 6 people. Definitely was more student based, but I didn't mind. Made me open up the book and read it, which I didn't do much in other classes. Leaves comments to show you what you could do better on and helps when he can. Do the work, show up, and pay attention and you will be fine.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT101
Comment: I've had Mr. Dumas for several management classes. He is a fun teacher and I find his classes very informative. He is strict, but fair. If you're a serious student, and make an effort in his class, you will not have any problems

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT211
Comment: Very useless teacher. First day of class announced that it would be taught via student based learning. AKA the students are expected to assemble the weekly presentations on what they determine to be relevant information to the class. Usually not the same as what is on the test. Which are primarily open ended essay questions that aren't covered.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas INTROTOBUS
Comment: He's a nice guy but he talks about his life WAY to much.  Also, he makes a lot of **** jokes that just are rude and unfunny.  You can tell he thinks women are 2nd class citizens.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT101
Comment: he is not a teacher that stays on task. If you wear Michigan clothing he downs you. In group project a black girl did most of the work and got the lowest grade in the class. He is just straight wrong how he does his classes and does not need to be teaching.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas BUSBUS
Comment: Assigns tons of busywork and has students teach portions of the class. Lectures are usually not focused and based around GM. Loves MSU and General Motors. Don't argue with him, he doesn't like to be wrong. Nice guy, boring, but means well. No patience for young or new students. Easy grading if you finish the work. Don't be late.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT101
Comment: Dumas is an ok teacher. I have had better teachers, but he definitely  isnt the worst. His class is on the dull side but it's pretty easy.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGMTSMNR
Comment: Class of 8 people, was ok. Got let out ~ 1 hour early per class. overall a fun class.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas HRMGT212
Comment: Not very helpful, does not keep the class discusions on task.

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT212
Comment: Superbly vague, but then is overlycritical of your assignments.  He talks to you like you're little kids and you can just tell he's ****.  I am an all A student who reads exactly what is expected of me, and I could never figure it out in his class.  He deducted just enough points on my last assignment to give me a B in the class; which I believe

Teacher Name: Baker College - F Dumas MGT212
Comment: Was a real stickler for people who are late, locks the door, was not an issue but communicate and be real with him and he will treat you well.  Has mini assignments during class, and attendance is crucial for every class, assignments are due every week, mostly no late assignments!

Teacher Name: Career Point Institute - Chris Shillingford ENG100
Comment: This picture is hilarious. He's really nasally and his lectures are boring and dry like his personality. I think he's approach to grading is out of whack.

Teacher Name: Career Point Institute - Chris Shillingford ENG100
Comment: AWESOME LECTURER, just PAY ATTENTION and you don't even need to read the text. He's amazing. In Eng 100, the text is heavy and hard to understand, but if you take good notes in class and talk to Clark about things you don't understand, you'll do ok. BUT YOU GOTTA STUDY: seriously, it's not easy, but you can gain so much knowledge from this class.

Teacher Name: Career Point Institute - Chris Shillingford FONCLINICAL1902
Comment: Mr. Shillingford is one of the best professors I ever had, he cares about the students success. Also, he's very dedicated to his job as Educator. A lot of work and material to study but very worth it. Mr. Shillingford motivates me to continue my career as a nurse. Thumbs up!!!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harrison Branch ART341
Comment: Nice guy, teaches you alot, but he is a very hard grader. No one gets A's.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harrison Branch ART342
Comment: the class is "titalating" and of course it's very zippy, but it needs a nude

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harrison Branch ART261
Comment: Awesome professor. Funny, challenging, and very helpful. Has decades of photography experience and clearly knows what he's talking about. Critiques are merciless but extremely helpful and not rude at all. Very time consuming class, so be ready. Only drawback is unclear grading - you will not have any real idea of your grade until the term is over.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harrison Branch ART261
Comment: Good professor but don't take his classes "for fun or enjoyment" because he takes photography very seriously.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harrison Branch ART341
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harrison Branch ART441
Comment: Harrison is, without a doubt, the absolute funniest, toughest, most challenging of professors I have ever had. He pushed me to grow in ways I didn't know I could.. and I'm better for it as an artist, as a person, and as a student of life. If you have the opportunity to be in one of his classes -- TAKE IT! In the meantime.. Let's get it on!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harrison Branch ART441
Comment: awesome teacher, can teach you A LOT if you go in during the work classes.  he isn't just going to offer info if you aren't really interested.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harrison Branch PHOTOGRAPHY
Comment: You rock Harrison!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harrison Branch ART341
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harrison Branch PHOTO
Comment: great guy. great teacher.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harrison Branch ART341
Comment: Every piece of advice he gives you is beyond helpful. He has saved my photography. An Excellent professor.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Robert Golding PORTFSECT
Comment: Willing to help. Makes class interesting.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Robert Golding WHEAT101
Comment: Oh Sugar.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Robert Golding PRDEV3E
Comment: First of all, let me start by saying what an honor it was to learn from someone with such admirable experience. Robert Golding is an incredible teacher, and a photographic icon. I learned so much just by our conversations out of class. His stories are great, and his experience is so valid. He is a true asset and Antonelli is blessed to have him.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Robert Golding CAMERAWORK
Comment: Bob always go out of his way to help students. Passion for Photography and Students.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Robert Golding 4X5INTRO
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Robert Golding PHO101
Comment: I miss you Bobby Get! May you watch over us in peace!

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Robert Golding PHOTOLAB
Comment: i'm learning so much in lab this semester

Teacher Name: ITT Technical Institute - Bothell - Tanya Fuller PROG101
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: ITT Technical Institute - Bothell - Tanya Fuller CP133
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: I had heard that this class was hard, but it is very easy. If you know how to read, you will do well. If you do not know how to read, you will do well.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: Had him for genetics/micro. BEST professor, absolutely love him! Very helpful, go to him for help during office hours. Any bio class is challenging, but put in the work and you can do well. Make sure you look at old tests. For micro, outline why wrong answers are wrong (test qs are usually re-worded, be careful tho!). Genetics-go to study sessions!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: Dr. Smith is somehow able to take an 8am class about bacteria and make it interesting enough to stay awake for! His lectures are very interesting, and he is very easy to find outside of class if you have questions. Exams are tough, but he gives you old exams to practice off of.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: Very interesting lectures, I didn't fall asleep once and I had him for an 8am. Knows what he teaches and makes it interesting by default somehow. Very easy to want to learn in his class, highly recommended.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: The man came off very distant, cranky, and rude. Can recall when he actually kicked me out of his office for asking too many question.  Regardless, the guy is still the best BISC403 prof in UD. His lectures are typically clear, and his exams are hard but doable if you put in time with notes, the book, and the practice exams. Scored a B. So can you.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: Amazing professor. Never fell asleep for a lecture - presents material very well. Difficult class (all BISC classes 400+ are) unless you keep up with the readings and go to his office hours. Beware the 1st Exam in Genetics - use the practice exams he gives you. You WILL learn Genetics in this class.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: best prof at delaware. hes tough but all 400 bio classes are. study old tests. go to him for help. attend review sessions. study the book. hardest bio class ive taken but id take this prof again any day. ive taken 3 classes with him cuz hes the best.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: Liked him so much for 300 I took him again! Wants his students to do well, holds study sessions @library the night before exams. Gets along with students and is very helpful to them. Enthusiastic about what he teaches, tests are very fair, easy to do well if you study. Will clarify anything you ask. Good teacher, smart prof, great guy.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: TAKE SMITH!!! This class is a difficult class, but an A is possible. Dr. Smith is extremely helpful and for an 8 AM keeps everyone wide awake. One of the best biology teachers I've ever had I recommend him!! Take Notes on everything, study practice exams, read book and you will get a A or B

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: Dr. Smith is extremely knowledgeable and enthusiastic about his area of study and it clearly shows in his teaching. The material is challenging, but you should do okay if you pay attention and take good notes. The lab section of this class is horrendous, but you just have to grit your teeth and do it. Smith makes 8am class not entirely terrible.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: tough class, no curve. i feel that he is prob good to have for multiple classes, but i just took him for micro and found him difficult and uncomfortably approachable. def study old tests and know concepts. lectures are good...if you can stay awake

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC401
Comment: BEST professor in the Bio department, Its a challenging class, but all 400 level bio classes are, if you do the work, he's more than happy to help you. GO TO STUDY SESSIONS, make sure you study the old exams he gives you a week before the test, they help A LOT. Overall, a hard class but worth it and there is no better professor to take it with.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: Take really good notes in this class, the exams come right out of lectures. Also, study the old test really well (understand all the questions). Overall, he explains things well and is willing to help you. Not too hard of a class, but make sure you study and UNDERSTAND concepts. Read over the assigned readings, it may help clear up some concepts.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC645
Comment: Great class, except the middle third on taxonomy which is very tedious. Not as hard as in micro and genetics. 3 tests, all essays, based on lectures and assigned articles. Most of the class got A's and B's. Take it if you wanna learn something different and interesting and not the usual classical stuff

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: I was excited for this class, but the first few months were dedicated to punnett squares and simple mathematical calculation. Then suddenly everything became route memorization. Tough. Note: Do not do the difficult book problems he assigns for the first exam. There will generally only be easy ones on it. -READ THE BOOK-STUDY OLD EXAMS LIKE WOAH-

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: Dr. Smith is very enthusiastic and knowledgeable about genetics. However, is exams are very tough. Be sure to thoroughly understand his notes and previous exams.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: The best professor by far! He knows his stuff & is very passionate about Genetics. He really wants you to learn. Exams are tough!! Not an easy class but he makes an 8am class very exciting every time. He does NOT curve!! I learned a lot in this class. Make sure you do the assigned homework questions. Do practice exam. He is always ready to help!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC403
Comment: Great professor, he's been teaching for over 30 years. He really knows the subject material, but carefully emphasizes the important information. He makes sure his instruction is very clear, because the subject can get pretty murky. He's great to talk to and he makes himself very available for help, especially right before exams.

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: Dr. Smith is very passionate about what he teaches and usually willing to help. Make sure you go to class and take good notes because tests come straight form the notes. You won't even need to read the book. He is very good at explaining things so that they make sense too. If you have to take this class, definitely take it with Smith!

Teacher Name: University of Delaware - David Smith BISC300
Comment: i had him for genetics, micro, and bacterial evolution and he is by far my favorite prof here. very personable and knowledgeable. excellent at teaching the material. must study, go to class, and read tho to get a good grade

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon PSY101
Comment: Mrs. Simon is a fantastic person. If human relations is an intro to future psyc classes, might as well find another teacher that will be more through and get past chapter 5. If all you need is just the one class, it will be easy but she hardly ever stays on topic.

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon HUS
Comment: I have had her for many classes and most importantly I have learned from every class.  She is very educated in her field.  Some people says she tends to get off topic but I feel that your students are willing to learn more when they are able to talk and ask questions.  She is one of the best teachers at Baker!

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon PSY101
Comment: Simon is one of the worst instructors I have ever had.  I would study for the test, but when the test was given the questions were not worded in a way to understand them.  She would allow the class to sidetrack her and not get the material finished.  I advise anyone to take a different instructor!!!

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon PSY101
Comment: This class was crazy easy. I just went online to the companion web site for practice test/flashcards never read the book and got 100's on all tests...and she gives no finals...way cool.Ised class to study for other classes.

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon PSY301
Comment: You might as well just read the book yourself and take any practice test you can find. Her lectures are all over the place and she never stays on topic. The only thing good about her class is she grades easy.

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon HR
Comment: Class is easy she is nice, understands that you have a life other than school

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon PSYCOLOGY
Comment: she does wander off the topic but she so how finds her way back. She is always willing to answer any questions. Shes understanding and realizes that life happens.

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon BEHAVORIALTHER
Comment: A teacher I thought who was going to be very interesting turn out to be oh so very boring

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon HUMANRELATIONS
Comment: She's so cool!  She's like a female Eddie Izzard!  She tells funny sotires and uses wacky examples.  She realizes we have lives outside class and never overloads you with work.  Fun times!

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon PSY101
Comment: A total waste of money, was this class. Unbelievable the things she talked about, almost nothing to do with psychology and all her boyfriends or lack there of.

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon PSY101
Comment: Horrible instructor, never organized or focused. Did not learn a thing.  Don't know how I got an "A".

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon HR
Comment: Sometimes the class can be a little boring because all she does is lecture - but she's a funny person and you can get her off the topic at hand so easily, it's great!

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon PSY101
Comment: She is CRAZY!!! I didn't learn one thing about Pychology from her mouth, only from reading the book myself. She gets off of topic ALOT!! We weren't able to finish our class in time for finals so we had take home tests... do not take her class. You will lose your mind.

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon PSY101
Comment: This class is a waste of money. She let students talk on their phones during class, students came in 45 minutes late stayed for 10 minutes and left and still got full credit for being there. She talked more about her personal life and cut down certain religions rather than teach the class.Only 3 open book tests.

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon PSYCHOLOGY
Comment: she is a horrible teacher. she teaches you nothing at all

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon GENERALPSYCH
Comment: Wonders a bit, but hey who doesnt?  I retained almost everything she taught me, so she is a great instructor to me.  (always chewing gum) :)

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon HUMANSEXUALITY
Comment: This woman is a freaking hoot! The sense of humor she brought to this class made it much easier to be comfortable.  She is an awesome professor!

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon PSY101
Comment: i absolutly hate her psychology class. she has no control over the class and lets her students talk wayyy too much. plus, we barely even discuss what's going to be on the tests, and spend more time talking about random topics. she's a cool person but not as a teacher.

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon PSY101
Comment: Wanders totally!!  Skipped chapters and had take home tests to try to get through most of the syllabus.  Great lady but don't expect her on time to class, or to be prepared when she gets there.

Teacher Name: Baker College - P Simon PSYC111
Comment: I enjoyed this class and thought the material was very interesting. Ms. Simon is easy going and has a great sense of humor. Don't let it fool you though, you will need to study a lot to do very well on the tests. I found lecture notes,handouts and studying the chapters thoroughly most helpful. The online companion to the textbook was not much help.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Julia Pavone ART135
Comment: she's terrible; requires group work with other lazy kids

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Julia Pavone ARTAPPR
Comment: Terrible professor. Very very rude and overwhelmingly sarcastic. She also favors students and does not help ones she doesnt like. If you say something she doesnt like you are perminately on her bad side. Her art is awful and if you do not say it is good, expect a bad grade. Shoul not be teaching, plain and simple.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Julia Pavone ART1000
Comment: I really don't understand why everyone appears to hate her so much. I read these reviews before entering the class and was expecting someone awful, but she turned out to be very helpful, and her class is not difficult at all. Her class turned out to be one of my favorites of the semester.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Julia Pavone ART135
Comment: She has the WORST attitude and is extremely unhelpful.  You don't dare ask a question because all you will get is a sarcastic remark.  If at all possible avoid this professor!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Julia Pavone ARTAPPRECIATIO
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Julia Pavone ART1000
Comment: Professor Pavone was an amazing Professor! She was a lot of fun and I actually learned more than i expected to learn. The class was very easy going and Dr. Pavone is very enthusiastic and inspiring. The Projects were a lot of fun and weren't time consuming or stressful.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Julia Pavone ART1000
Comment: She's an awful teacher. Thank god she's Adjunct and not Full Faculty.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Julia Pavone PAINTING
Comment: julia is awesome, i hope she continues to inspire the masses. wonderful professor. wonderful person. serioulsy, you wont regret having her as your professor.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Julia Pavone 3D
Comment: She let us do Tae-Bo during art class. That should say it all.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Julia Pavone ART101
Comment: This teacher is ridiculous. She absolutely plays favorites, and if you're not hers, she refuses to help you. She is extremely rude, opinionated, and overall not only a bad teacher, but a bad person. Unless the Wicked Witch is you're favorite movie character, STAY AWAY FROM THIS..."PERSON"!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Julia Pavone ARTAPP
Comment: Sarcastic, intimidating, rude, and unless your into her nonrepresentational form of art, you will only receive average scores on homework projects

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Julia Pavone ART1000
Comment: she is very sarcastic at times and very insensitive to beliefs (both religious and political). For a 1000 level class... there was too much expected

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Marselline Diller MATH102
Comment: If math isn't your thing, this professor is for you. She makes concepts easy to understand and helps you get through the class. Loved her!

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Marselline Diller EDUC389
Comment: This class was easy. You have around five assignments (which are really easy) through out the class. She is helpful and tries to make everyone feel comfortable with specking in front of the class.

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Marselline Diller MTH104
Comment: i love math so this class was a breez i got like an 98% make sure you do ur hw the test questions come right from the book. midterm and final isnt hard. just make sure u do the hw

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - Emily Abendroth ENG300
Comment: Quite passionate, seem nice but very opinionated from time to time. Very good at dodging and derailing. Writing assignments are gobbledygook. She thinks truth is subjective yet the apple fall down the tree and hit Newton's head.

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - Emily Abendroth ENGW200
Comment: She taught the class using They Say I Say which is suppose to be about effective conversation among academics. However when she' also tries to sell her clearly biased beliefs to us and yet if we try to ask her to specify what she meant she would simply dodge any curiosity or critical thought. Anyway, I don't recommend her classes.

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - Emily Abendroth ENG200
Comment: While she is a very passionate and nice person, when it comes to her ideological beliefs you can see that she is being completely intellectually dishonest. If you call her out or make her explain something, she will dodge the question. I wouldn't waste my time with her classes.

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - Emily Abendroth ENG200
Comment: A absolute scuuum who social engineer her students into nonsense and ridiculous belief. She needs a lesson on intellectual honesty and stop manipulating her students.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri SOCIALSCI102
Comment: He is a really great teacher. One of the easiest class to pass. No need to buy text book. Everything is on Blackboard. His tests are his lectures. Know the lectures u know the exams.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri HIST112
Comment: great teacher,well educated

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri SS102
Comment: This professor is great!! His lectures are very interesting. As long as you take good notes from his lectures you should have no problem passing with an A. I recommend to take this professor! :)

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri SOCSCI102
Comment: Great teacher. Take any or all of his classes

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri SOSCI202
Comment: wasted of money, time & energy

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri SOC102
Comment: This class isn't for those who are bad at taking notes, trust me your notes will be your best friend, learn them like the back of your hand, be able to recall them and write them cause that will be your final. As long as you can do that, its an easy A. I still remember a lot of what he taught.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri HIST247
Comment: most ppl either dislike him or like him & i don't like his teaching style.  my tip,he talks the whole session. no discussion, hw, or quizzes, just 4 exams. u don't get the relevant points bc he doesn't write foreign sounding names/concepts down or give outlines to prepare for the freestyle, unlimited scoped, purposeless tests he give,too stressful!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri HIST112
Comment: if every professor is like him, i will absolutely not want to take anymore classes at all & pay clep $60 to get my credit.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri HIST112
Comment: If you can't show up or take notes, do not take a class with him.  If you are capable of taking notes and coming to class, its an easy A.  Anyone who says otherwise is very lazy, plain and simple.  He gives you the test a week before you have to take it.  If you can't write an essay with points he gives you don;t take him.  Easy A if you can write

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri SOCSCI102
Comment: great

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri HIST2471
Comment: he bs a lot.  many of the stuff he says during lecture is contradictory to things i've learned from other teachers/professors I've had who are experienced, well-educated & well-traveled.  i am suspicious of what he says bc there are no facts to back them.  he does not use a text either & this makes his super long essay exams difficult.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri SOCIALSCIENCE
Comment: He's a very smart professor, easy and interesting to learn from.  If you take notes in his class and study them for exams you should have no problem passing his class.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri SOCSCI102
Comment: this teacher was a pompous jerk who offered no support. i'm no dummy - but he treated me like i was an idiot any time i asked a question. napoleon-complex for sure!!!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri SOCSCI102
Comment: No textbook-lectures instead. Exams are 2-3 in class essays per exam. Gives hints for the exam. Notes are important-they are the exam. Knows his information and keeps your interest. Very approachable and helpful. If you take good notes/ voice recordings and study (not cram) you will earn your A.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri HIST112
Comment: you will learn a lot, just go on time to the class and take alot of notes and you will pass

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri HIS
