Comment: Took his summer course on American History and it was absolutly great! I hate history and I still remember everything he taught me. He made study guides and posted them on the internet for us. Great teacher-really knows his stuff -  excited bout teaching!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri HIST215
Comment: more arrogant than educated, if you have a little accent, he will blame all the problems you have for the class on it, not recommended

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri HIST215
Comment: poor quality. take the class somewhere else if you really want to take this this course.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri HIST210
Comment: Is not open to class participation. Pure timed lecture. he speaks and that's it! He claims to be "teaching Mexicans their own History", he's Italian. ****, and closed minded.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Michael Ruggeri SOC102
Comment: He is a great prof.  He Knows his materials.  It was easy to understand him.  easy A.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MTH338
Comment: I thought Dr. Parks was a good teacher. He obviously cared his students were learning and did not assign much homework - but enough to work on the skills we needed to know. I would reccommend him for a future math class.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MTH342
Comment: This guy rocks! Funny, great teacher, and is willing to help all of the time.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MATH262
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MATH
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MTH311312313
Comment: You want a teacher who's easy, actually funny, and way into you learning your math, take this guy!  This guy was the reason I actually have my math degree!  He was the dept. chair when I took him with classes!  He rocks, you can't go wrong with this guy!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MTH254H
Comment: Hal Parks was a great professor and was super funny, if you have a chance to take him for any math class do it! His exams are hard but his practice exams give you a great idea of what he expects you to know.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MTH
Comment: I was his secretary for 2 years...this is one fantastic person!  Believe me...I have seen them ALL at their worst!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MTH311312
Comment: Great teacher!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MTH254H
Comment: Easy to follow and understand. Practice exams are exactly like the exam.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MTH254H
Comment: Received an A in the class. About a 30% curve on the nasty final. A fair (perhaps liberal) grader. Funny professor, certainly knows what he is teaching. He goes over your head a lot, but he can clarify. Was often very confusing and made me feel like I was going to fail. Grade is composed of two midterms and one final, all equal weight.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MTH255
Comment: Funny as all hell...

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MTH251H
Comment: Really good professor, definitely get him if you can!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MTH311
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Harold Parks MTH254H
Comment: Nice guy, but very hard to follow.  Better-suited for higher-level math courses; lost sight of what vector calc students know.  You'll end up teaching yourself calculus, and leaving class confused. Take home exams were a bit tricky, final was in-class and impossible.  Curved.  You won't learn what you need for later, but your grade might be ok.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHYU141
Comment: He's zany and spontaneous, like a mad scientist, and usually has good stories, so it's fun to watch. He's not an effective teacher, unfortunately. His lectures are very hard to follow. The tests are pretty tricky, but he gives you a very generous curve. Do not take this course if you want to actually LEARN physics.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain ENGEVIRONMENT
Comment: Swain is a great professor. While the subject was boring, his off-topic ramblings were great. His classes are definately worth taking.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHY111
Comment: Astronomy.  Great lecture class.  Everyone shows up to class every day because he's such a good teacher.  4 multiple choice tests and throws away the worst.  It is very hard to dose off in this class.  He has so much energy, tells great stories relating to the class, and does fun experiments and stuff.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHYS141
Comment: great prof.way entertaining & really wants u to understand physics from a different perspective than you've probably ever been taught before. he goes a little slow but asks for class feedback on how "slow" he's going.. ppl just let him continue for the most part. he is probably one of the smartest guys ive ever but most impt he wants u to do well.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHYU112
Comment: Very entertaining professor. He tells great stories and keeps you awake in class for the most part. Unfortunately, his teaching method is not all that effective and the tests can be hard if you didnt understand the material. Gives very generous curves tho.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHYS1145
Comment: Great Professor: kind, understanding, need to know the basics but no trick questions. Makes the material easy to understand. Very fair and promotes real life work like collaboration

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHYS3601
Comment: Good guy, makes lectures interesting but they can get confusing so you need to pay attention. Tests come straight off the homework, as long as you take a look at the assignments before the test you'll have no problem. Highly recommend.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHY102
Comment: fun guy, class easy to get through, very smart but terrible class if you want to learn physics-had to have someone else teach me the material-he says dont worry about your grade he'll curve but his curve brought my grade down so be careful

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHYS3601
Comment: Professor Swain is the best teacher I've had at Northeastern. Ridiculously knowledgeable, hilarious, and very helpful. Lectures go off on tangents but they are always interesting, and if you don't understand something in the lecture he will gladly meet you anytime to help you. Loves the subject and genuinely wants his students to learn and do well.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain AST101
Comment: Swain is AMAZING.  he's energetic, fun, and knows what he's talking about.  He's a great teacher, doesn't use notes, tells funny/interesting stories, and you'd have to be a total sped to fail the class.  no homework. attendence isn't manditory, and he gives you take home final/midterms.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHYS1
Comment: John Swain gets it.  He presents physics in a fun, upbeat way that makes non-physics college students enjoy it.  He's a character and he's lectures are entertaining.  If you try a little bit you'll get an A.  I appreciate physics more bc he didn't shove it down my throat, he made it fun.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHYU111
Comment: Halarious guy, it's more of a physics class than astronomy though, His tests are kinda hard, he says he tries to make them easy, but he's kinda off the deep end, He means well and wil help you, and i only went to class like 6 times all semester and did well, plus he's the most entertaining person in the world.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain ENERGYENV
Comment: Great elective, easy class, great teacher, dont even need the book

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHYSICS1
Comment: Haha great guy, it prob **** for class every day, wears black shirts every day cuz he knows hes going to spill coffee on it and doesnt want it to be noticable. Not a particularly great teacher, kinda confusing, but he really wants everyone to do well so he scales everything and basically gives points away.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHY111
Comment: He is INSANE (but in a good way)...take his class if you like to laugh.  He throws chalk, electrocutes himself, ad does lots of other crazy things.  He makes class interesting (though he doesn't talk about much astronomy...it's mostly physics).  He doesn't make us do calculations though.  Also, he stops teaching after about 45 minutes of class time

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain 1145
Comment: Really great instructor. If you study from the problem sets and take good notes you are sure to pass.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHYU111
Comment: He is a nice guy and pretty strange. He says that he doesn't try to trick you but then has tests with a bunch of tricky questions. He wasn't there for either of the review sessions and I felt really unprepared for the tests. Still, a really easy class that you don't really have to go to, and believe me a lot of people skip.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHYS111
Comment: A really fantastic person who wants his students to not only do well but also enjoy the subject matter. caution: he mixes a very divergent mindset with occasional convergence to the main ideas and some analysis. If you haven't learned where to pay attention and take notes, you will only be catching about half of the information presented in class.

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHYSICS2ILS
Comment: AMAZING

Teacher Name: Northeastern University - John Swain PHYS1145
Comment: My favorite professor I've had so far! He had such enthusiasm and made a lot of things that could have been boring very interesting. He could be a bit confusing at times, but always went back to go over things we weren't clear on. His exams were very fair and easy as long as you study from the problem sets he provided. Awesome guy, learned a lot.

Comment: Ms. Nuoffer will be your friend if you let her.  She is an awesome teacher.  But she does give alot of homework.

Teacher Name: Baker College - C Nuoffer WPROC111

Teacher Name: Baker College - C Nuoffer WPG122

Teacher Name: Baker College - C Nuoffer INF112

Teacher Name: Baker College - C Nuoffer INFOSYSTHEORY

Teacher Name: Baker College - C Nuoffer INF

Teacher Name: Baker College - C Nuoffer INF112
Comment: Very helpful if you asked

Teacher Name: Baker College - C Nuoffer WPG01

Teacher Name: Baker College - C Nuoffer WORDINF
Comment: Had her for word 2007 and all i have to say is horrid. everytest the computer decided to mark me wrong one a question or 2 even though i was doing the correct thing. and she was of no help during it. i asked her to come look and watch me do it and it says wrong and she wouldnt even check.

Teacher Name: Baker College - C Nuoffer WPG098
Comment: Good personality

Teacher Name: Baker College - C Nuoffer INF114
Comment: Very boring, didnt seem to know much of the subject matter, taught straight from the book.

Teacher Name: Baker College - C Nuoffer WPG098
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Steve Jones ENG237
Comment: Great Professor!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Steve Jones ENG1059
Comment: The best professor I've ever had.  A fantastic, interesting, and thoughtful person and teacher.  Prof. Jones is also a valuable local resource with almost boundless knowledge of local history.  Rock on Prof. Jones...is the lighthouse done yet?

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Steve Jones ENGL3503
Comment: I swear he could retire and still be teaching for the hell of it. You enter his class and will have no idea what he's talking about. sit near the front, pay attention to his stories, and think outside the box. Tests are open note/book, so take notes. Take other classes with him, he'll recognize you. go to class and you wont fail.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Steve Jones ENG101
Comment: Really enjoyed Prof Jones' class in 1969. He introduced me (us) to Irish authors like J Joyce & B Behan. Learned much, and appreciate his influence on me to this day; especially my understanding the IRA & British struggle. (Gerald R Tischer - Wolcott CT)

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI211
Comment: Worthless teacher.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI211
Comment: Super great, extremely clear on what will be on final. Hes very passionate about what he teaches and is by far the funniest prof Ive ever had

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI211
Comment: Brooklyn style grit and wit. 1/3 - 1/2 of lecture is information dense, the rest is meant to help you find what interests you by showing many many many pictures of animals.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein Z350
Comment: Dr Blaustein can seem very rude and intimidating at first, but by the end of the course you can tell he actually enjoys teaching students and loves talking about his own research areas.  His lecture slides are really sparse, and what he presents doesn't match what is on canvas.  His whole portion of the class is based on the final, but is fair.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI211
Comment: Listen to lectures. I didn't open the book once and I managed to get an A. Anytime he says "this will be a test question," he isn't joking, it will be there, so LISTEN. He will repeat himself a lot, so pay attention to the things he says/pictures he shows you over and over, those will be on the test too. Test was really easy, and he's pretty funny.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BIO211
Comment: Terrible, doesn't care.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI211
Comment: The lectures were very interesting and Blaustein is hilarious. He lectures on stuff that is relevant to life and current issues.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI211
Comment: I respect him as a researcher but I was a bit disappointed in his lecture style. He spends a lot of time just showing pictures of animals. He goes too fast to take good notes. Upside- he's very clear about what will be on the exam and repeats important things incessantly. I finished feeling I should have learned more during lecture.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI211
Comment: Dr. Blaustein taught the second half of BI211. He taught the material super quick and probably spent a second or two on every slide. While the material is easy and he presents it in a funny mood, it is too quick and I feel like I didn't learn much from him. Just make sure to pay attention whenever he says "this will be on the test."

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI211
Comment: Decent teacher. Exam is pretty straight forward and covers a lot of parasites and diseases as that is his research focus, so make sure you know those well. Overall interesting and really funny guy, I was able to pull a strong A on his exam with some solid studying.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein ZO350
Comment: Easy to understand. Know the examples he uses through and through. Funny, but a little intimidating when he goes off on tangents. Best advice, attend EVERY lecture.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI350
Comment: 1 of the best teachers i've had. loved his powerpoints. he didnt just read frm the slide & they were entertaining w/ pics. he was very funny & nice. wanted his students to pass the class w/ an A or B.  Tests were not that hard. Def recommend him for Animal Behavior.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BIO211
Comment: easy class, funny and interesting guy

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BIO211
Comment: I don't understand why everyone applauded after our last lecture, but didn't do so for Dr. Fowler, who taught the first half of the class. Dr. Blaustein puts little effort into teaching. His powerpoints are poorly constructed and he generally lacks clarity. "Here's a fish, here's an amphibian, here's Rush Limbaugh." I'm not kidding, this guy stinks

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI211
Comment: When I am confident that I could teach a class better than the professor, I don't recommend them. This is the case with Dr. Blaustein. I'd like to have a beer with the gentleman, sure, but I'd like someone more straightforward and serious teaching me Biology. Learning taxonomy is no fun, and when the lecturer wastes your time it's even worse.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI211
Comment: If he wants you to know something for the test, he'll clarify it so that even a baby could remember. Very straightforward instructor, very interesting. Exam was quite easy, but you must study for it to be so.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI211
Comment: Dr. Blaustein is quite entertaining despite being the "2nd worst scientist in the world." However, he puts forth an average effort as a professor. In turn students put forth an average effort on studying for his exam. As a result they get an average grade and give him an average rating.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI211
Comment: Great professor however, you MUST go to class and pay very close attention to what he talks about.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BIO311
Comment: He's not a bad guy, maybe a little scary. But he does tell you directly what is going to be on the test. Make sure you understand all examples and listen carefully to his lectures. Book is not needed because he puts everything on slides.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Andrew Blaustein BI211
Comment: Moved too quickly through the slides, but is a funny guy. He knows a lot of information, but it is unclear what will be on the tests.

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - Al Gury PT200
Comment: Took Al's portrait painting classes. Very uninformative and uninstructional. Al finishes most of his painting in 15-30 mins and brags about that all the time. I think everyone who take his/her paintings more seriously would know Al sacrifices quality and substance with speed. So y brag about it? We aren't blind. Anyway, there are better teacher so.

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - Al Gury PT300
Comment: Seriously, I am at this point amazed by the professors' ability to extend materials to semester long classes. It is like if you can say something in an hour without losing substance, they try there best to be pedantic and empty for five months (a semester). Seriously!

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard VIDEOPROD
Comment: Riley is honest. That's why he uses the "F" word more than I do. As a teacher, he's one of the best I ever had.

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MASSCTVRN
Comment: a stud!

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC402
Comment: Riley was awesome.  Told you exactly what to expect like no other undergrad teacher I have ever had.

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC402MC333
Comment: I heard the bad stories as well however i enjoyed having him as a teacher...he taught me well and i loved it. I thank him for helping me through the department.

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC201
Comment: He made me cry the whole way home after my first day of his class. Basically he told us that in the comm. field we will be poor, and on top of that, losers! He also was more interested in talking about what he has done in life, than teaching us any material from the book. I didn't learn anything, except to never take his class again!

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC331
Comment: Best teacher ever! He really tells it like it is! He may seem stern or mean, but he really prepares you for the industry. Have to take at least one class with him!

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard VIDEO101
Comment: Took his class years ago as non-traditional student. I was 29, returning from workforce & extremely focused. Maynard knows his stuff & conveys it well. However, he curses like a sailor & talks to everyone like they were morons. It's offensive & pointless. If not for his bitterness, I'd give him an A, but gave him C, instead.

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MASS310
Comment: Great teacher if you were willing to work

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC402

Every day we listen to him tell us how miserable our lives are going to be. I'm not learning anything. The guest lectures are the only thing that save this class. He's also very unclear on assignments and the syllabus is vagu

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC402

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC

Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC202
Comment: Awesome teacher

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard VIDEOPROD
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Southern Illinois University - Edwardsville - Riley Maynard MC402

Comment: I disagree with the previous comment and want to say how very helpful she has been to me.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Todd Murray PHOTOLAB

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Todd Murray 000FILM
Comment: Great teacher, learned a lot.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Todd Murray FASH3E
Comment: I love Todds Class. I think Todd is a really great teacher and an overall sweet guy. You can come to him with anything! He is always helpful to get the creative wheels turning! He is also really fun! I loved fashion class and commercial studio. Which is saying something because I hate product work!!! Todd is very patient and very clear.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Todd Murray B3
Comment: He is amazing!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH209
Comment: I don't know why there are so many good reviews but his lectures are horrible. Does not follow the syllabus and the tests are way harder and confusing than they are supposed to be.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas CALCU209
Comment: Okay, so Adam is a fantastic person. I go to his office hours just to chill and talk about life. We've exchanged a ton a personal experiences---fantastic person to talk too. As a teacher, however, he's very difficult. Lectures are hard to follow since the material is challenging. Tests are ridiculous. If you try, you'll end up with a C.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH210
Comment: I took both Linear Equation and Differential Equation with Adam in one semester and he was a fanstatic professor even though people might see him a little funcky. His life lessons would also changed your life. He was a truely pure mathematician with knowledge of every mathematical equations .

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas 208
Comment: Most unorganized lectures ever. We'd have multiple 'breaks' throughout class, either for him to go smoke or for him to tell us about greek mythology or to hear about his life. We didn't make it through all the required material. This teacher will hold you back in the long run. Exam questions are challenging and not relevant to most majors.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH209210
Comment: When that door closed during office hours, you knew it got real. however, his lectures were hard to follow since the material was VERY hard and his tests were not easier. However, again, he is very lenient, and if he sees you legitimately trying, you will do well.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas CALC209
Comment: Great storyteller, hard exams. Impossible to get an A.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH208
Comment: If math is only a requirement for your major then Adam might be okay to take.  If you're majoring in engineering and you take Adam you will enter future physics and core engineering classes without the math skills necessary to succeed.  An easy A with Adam could be a wake up call later on.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas 207210
Comment: I took math 207 w Adam 3 years ago and he was a fantastic professor. Now after I've finished 210 it seems that he has lost his motivation to teach and has become unorganized and forgetful. Adam is a great guy that used to love what he did but unfortunately something in him has changed where I can no longer say confidently he is a good professor.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH208
Comment: Do no expect to do well on this class unless you have a strong inclination towards Mathematics. 10-20% of his students drop the class due to his grading style. I got a D, and most of the other students I talked to received C, but one girls got a B.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH209
Comment: Add. ratings 1-5: Lecture Delivery: 5 (clear and thorough), Time management: 2 (easily distracted), Test difficulty: Hardest I've taken (he uses an informal curve), Organization: 2 (forgets to post documents and homework assignments a lot),  Fun: 5 (20% of class dedicated to his stories and musings). Expect to learn more than the textbook material.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas 208
Comment: If you are concerned w/keeping your GPA decent/just don't want a C in a math class, I'd avoid taking a class with Adam. Yes ppl think he's cool&funny, but he grades based on his opinion of you as a 'math brained person.' If you're not a MBP, or even if you think you are, but actually want to learn all the material, again,I'd avoid this professor

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH209
Comment: If you are looking for a good grade don't even think of taking him. In his words, the best student receives a B, As are not given. Tests are full of surprises with over 80% of problems unique and even hard to finish. His tests are built to make you fail and to show you that you are not a capable student.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH207
Comment: Very unorganized with lectures.  He changes the topic without finishing the problem at times.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas 208
Comment: People say he's a philosopher (eh, not really).  Really, he's just very opinionated and lectures his MATH students on controversial topics. But he doesn't seem interested in listening to others perspectives. Instead he presents his opinions without ever intending to refine his thinking. He's a great math mind, but not so great in other areas.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH207
Comment: Adam is horribly unorganized and beyond politically incorrect, but he's an excellent teacher and very sincere. He teaches real math intuition and challenges students with brutally difficult problems (for instance, factoring whole numbers into radicals and quotients.) Sets a great atmosphere and is invaluable during office hours. Highly recommended.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH207
Comment: Adams is one of the best pro. I have ever take. He focus on what you earn in the class and your life, not only the grade. He always encourage students. He solves the problems step by step. Though we cannot get a good grade in the exam, he will still give us an A cause he know we try our most best already! So nice teacher!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH210
Comment: Worst teacher I've ever taken. Figured I would stay instead of drop because he assured the class to just stay with it, implying he might just pass everyone no matter what. I knew nothing, yet I received a D. Took the same class at UIC the next semester and got an A. Obviously has psychiatric problems and shouldn't have the power to teach students.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH207
Comment: He is the best professor ever. He makes Math the sweetest subject ever. His class is not boring and very knowledgeable. Highly recommended.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH209
Comment: UNBELIEVABLY HARD TEST. Really nice, funny, and wise man but his his test are TOO hard. Seriously wouldn't reccomend taking due to level of difficulty of course. Good teacher however, but again his test seem unpassable unless you are a complete math whiz.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam Bounas MATH209
Comment: He is truly one of a kind. I only regret not taking him before. He is always available during his office hours. I would recommend to work on the end of  section exercises and then to go to his office, that helped me greatly.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn MTH111
Comment: As someone who was clueless about algebra, Mr. Osborn was a GODSEND!  He was very thorough in his teaching.  By far one of the best teachers I've ever had!  His humor makes the class fun to be in, too!  Get him if you are in need of CLEAR instruction

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn MTH111
Comment: A very good teacher.  He is very funny and teaches math very well.  I hate math but I still passed this class and didn't mind going.  His assignments and tests are clear and he tries very hard to make sure everyone understands the material.  Awesome teacher!

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn MTH100
Comment: AWESOME!  Best math instructor I have ever had.  Learned more in 1st four hours than I did in four years of High School.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn MTH111
Comment: It has been a very long time since I had him, but I remember that he would go over the same topic time and again until everyone in the class understood it. He would ask questions top determine exactly where the issue was and address those issues. Very polite and courteous.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn INTMALG
Comment: I was shocked to have an instructor tell students who didn't understand his first explanation to "figure it out for yourself at home or get a tutor I don't have time in class"! I thought that was what I was paying him for, to explain it to me. I can read the book, I needed explainations I could understand. Stay away if you don't already no Im Alg!

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn COL111
Comment: Good teacher

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn MATH99
Comment: clear relate-able

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn INTROALGE
Comment: Great Teacher. Used to hate math then took his course and I love it now. He is a great teacher. He has a great sense of houmor and whats even better is he looks a bit like Yoda from Star wars.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn MATHMATH
Comment: This teacher is absolutely the best teacher I have had so far. He is there until you understand everything. He focuses on your understanding.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn ALGEBRA
Comment: Great teacher!!

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn ALGEBPRE
Comment: I had never had an algebra class before and my husband who is a math wiz could not explain it to me and Mr. Osborn made since out of it for me he is a wonderful teacher he broke it down so I could understand it. He is there for the student and there to help you succeed. He is there for the student and is excellent at his job.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn MTH101
Comment: This teacher kept it fun.  He really made me laugh and made learning simple, he was always willing to help whenever someone needed it.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn BASICMATH
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn ALGBRA
Comment: Totally awesome teacher!  I hate math but he made it as painless as possible.  He's one of the best teacher's I've ever had I would definately recommend that you sign up for his classes!

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn ALGEB99E
Comment: He is a nice guy and if you don't know any better you'll think he is an o.k. Math teacher. He doesn't stop for those that don't get it. If you want a great Math Instructor that make's Math easy and understable. Take E. Martin she is simple the best Baker has in Math.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn MATH099E
Comment: I was terrified to start college, and Mr Osborn was my first professor. He made me feel very comfortable. He also Help me undestand the math, I was able to take the exam a few weeks before the class ended and not go back to the class. I got an A on the exam and in the class. I hadn't gotten an A in math since SIXTH GRADE! He is an awesome teacher!!

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn MTH099E
Comment: Very nice teacher. always in a great mood. admits mnistakes. makes learning easy and won't move on until everyone is on the same page. gives loooong work time for homework.  tests are easy. great professor

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn MTH091
Comment: Mr Osborn helped me alot. he showed me new tricks and seems to realize students learn in different ways and allow you to do it so long as it doesnt hurt others. still HATE math but he was a very helpful teacher to work with. it is your respocibility to ask for help but he gets the job done for those who make the effort. wonderful class environment!

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn INTROALG
Comment: Excellent teacher. The type of mathmatics teacher that you can tell loves numbers and everything about them. That amkes taking his class fun because he has a passion for teaching. Like all teachers he explains things to the best of his ability (which is extremely well illistrated), if you don't understand it's up to you to raise your hand.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Jim Osborn MTH101
Comment: Very nice. He was extremely helpful! Didn't care if you left early. Joked around a lot. Super funny.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC204
Comment: If you are into memorizing, take this class. Subjective grader, on if he knows who you are or not, or if you talk to him (and openly stated it in class). Lots of "old stories" he wants you to listen to. The tests are based on how well you memorize the stuff on the board. No other points or assignments. So 3 tests determine your grade.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC204
Comment: He is a good teacher, is leactures are fun to listen to till you get to the first midterm and he hits you with all this stuff that your supposed to know. Plus all his tests are complety short answer! no mutlipial choice!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC439
Comment: If you want a entry level 400 class take this.  Skim topics only never dives deep into anything.  Half the class is him telling retarded stories of his past and listening to other students tarded stories.  Easy grade but bring something to stay awake with.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC448
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC437
Comment: It seems he is BORED of teaching. Don't bother buying text, as he rarely refers to it. ALL of his tests are directly from lectures. Just memorize everything he writes down on the board and you will get an A.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC430
Comment: Extremely passionate about race and ethnicity. He knows his stuff. Write down everything that he puts on the board and memorize it. His tests were majority based on in class notes.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC204
Comment: His class and lectures were interesting, but I found the tests to be crazily hard.  They are all short answer, which some matching.  He doesnt believe in multiple choice exams which kinda sucks.  Great professor, crappy tests.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC201
Comment: worst teacher ever. Just talks about himself and forces his liberal views upon you.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC439
Comment: Not a great prof. He's BURNED-OUT.  Kept referring to his pay cut a few years back. Can be condescending. 2 Midterms and final. No extra credit, no projects, no papers. Just show up to class, take notes, listen to his so-so stories of old hippy days.  Grade is based on memorizing lecture highlights.  Don't bother buying TEXT. Somehow I pulled an A.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC204
Comment: One of the worst teaching styles I have ever experienced. He literally required everyone to copy what he said in class word for word, memorize it, and then regurgitate it word for word on the midterms. It was not enjoyable. I can't believe that professors like this can get away with caring so little about their students' learning.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC201
Comment: Terrible. He requires a very expensive book, yet I would consider the book to be very optional. In fact I never opened it. Tests are entirely based on memorization and based off extensive notes you better hope you took. If you befriend him you get an A, if you don't expect a C or lower

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC201
Comment: Seems like a decent enough guy - if he would stop talking long enough to find out. Very opinionated, will generally hate you if you disagree with him. Also tests are a b*tch with this guy; if you aren't too hot at taking essay tests, DO NOT take his classes.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC204
Comment: I loved this class! It was very important that you attend class b/c examples are important on tests and these couldn't always be pulled from the reading.  No mult ch all short answer on but he told you exactly the format and material, you just needed to study that stuff to do very well!  He is a very passionate about sociology.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC430
Comment: Enjoyed his Sociology of Aging class a few years back. You just have to learn how to take his tests and then the class is easy, short essay answers and use examples, even if they are made up stories. He does NO want you to regurgitate definitions (which I found out on the first test). Overall interesting class and he was funny and liked to joke.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC204
Comment: Terrible professor, covers hardly anything in the time. His curriculum is basically him telling boring stories of his childhood and pushing his extremely liberal views onto you. One of the worst Professors I've had at OSU.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC430
Comment: JUVENILE DELINQUENCY & SOCIOLOGY OF AGING: This guy is ridiculous! I had to hardest time in both his classes. I could get an A, but because the tested must be his words, word for word, it was hard. Which is weird since he says that EVERYONE gets an A or B... He's VERY liberal which is fine, but hard to understand the other side of things.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC432
Comment: Not a good professor. I am  offended by some inappropriate comment he makes weekly...always as a so-called joke. I wonder if he doesn't pay attention to what comes out of his mouth? Lastly, EVERY week he alludes to younger women dating older men and how he is in his prime...Ewwwww! Not funny, very creepy.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC204
Comment: Avoid at all costs! I do NOT recommend taking this class from Bob. Lectures are dry, and test are based on lectures and are a horrible (fill in the blank/short answer) Nothing in this class "promotes" learning, however it does promote memorization.  "Bob" is lazy, just 2 midterms and a final. Uses Chalk and board. No Bb. Doesn't like office visits.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott LAWANDSOCIETY
Comment: He is very, very hard but you learn a lot, so only take his classes if you are willing to work hard and are interested in the subject matter!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Robert McDermott SOC204
Comment: He is a funny guy but he really really needs to work on his hand writing half of the time I can't make out what he is writing and the Biggest Negative for me was his tests His first Midterm Kicked my a**... I've taken other soc classes Like Soc 312 gotten an A. He just put to much material on his midterms all Purely memorization I didn't feel like

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gerald Swopes STAT1100Q

The weight of your overall grade is almost solely based on your exam grades, so there's little room to make up for poor scores if you're a bad test taker. A nice man but a bad professor.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gerald Swopes STATS1100

As long as you take the initiative to go through the book and do the homework questions and devote a bit of time to studying come test time you will do fine. He gives fair tests, you generally know what will be on them and he is a fair grader!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gerald Swopes STAT110
Comment: Mumbles a lot but is easy and can explain things well one on one

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gerald Swopes STAT1100
Comment: Good teacher, hard material, though.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gerald Swopes ALG
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gerald Swopes STATS110V
Comment: Easy class, take to get a good grade... I hate stats and i got a B... one exam i had 3 answers completely wrong, and he gave me 8/10 points!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gerald Swopes STAT1100Q
Comment: Math is not my strong suit and I really struggled through this class. He is quite old and mumbles EVERYTHING. He expects you to catch on easily. Isn't personable or approachable.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gerald Swopes STAT110QC
Comment: real good teacher, all you need to do to pass is just attend class and do the labs.... i got an A and did absolutly no homework or work otherwise, so i cant complain. and if you can take this class with him you might as well

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gerald Swopes STAT112Q

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PHYS450

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PY

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse CS201
Comment: from an old alum... i credit dr. grosse with the reason i got my first job and still love working for the same company (for 12 years!).  like it or not those COBOL skills and his emphasis on 'work ethic' were key!...

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PY102
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PY101

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PHYSLAB

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PHYSICSLAB

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse DIGITALELECTRO
Comment: Difficult. he knows his****, but he's tough at times.

This being said if YOU APPROACH him for help he will be more than happy to assist as long as you show you have been putting forth effort. Tests are ridiculous. You have to know EVERYTHING. He really wants you to know the material.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Neil Bernstein BIOLOGY
Comment: very pompous, demeaning and arrogant. Tests are not even close to the class lecture.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Neil Bernstein ECOL0

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Neil Bernstein BIO
Comment: very self centered and is of no help to students.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Neil Bernstein ECO101
Comment: Miss my chats with this professor - learned lots and refer to him regularily while teaching my middle schoolers.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Neil Bernstein IALL31260EX1

He is very helpful and willing to answer any questions you might have.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Neil Bernstein BIOL101

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Neil Bernstein BIO300

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Neil Bernstein BOTANY
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Laura Chambers SOCI121

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Laura Chambers SOCSCI101

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Laura Chambers SOC101
Comment: She is a very good teacher. She is an easy A if you do your homework, which she doesn't really give.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Laura Chambers SOCSCI101
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Laura Chambers SS101

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Laura Chambers SOCIOLOGY207

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Laura Chambers SOCSECT

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Laura Chambers SOCSC101

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Laura Chambers SOSCI101
Comment: class is so easy if you just take your notes and show up. seriously thats all it takes! plus shes very smart, funny, and kinda hot. i loved her class.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Laura Chambers SOCSC101

Comment: COULDN'T UNDERSTAND A WORD HTIS GUY SAID!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang MATH1132
Comment: Horrible teacher. Couldn't understand anything he said. Rude and refused to answer my questions. Demeaning. Ridiculous exams that don't cover what he teaches. DON'T TAKE THIS CLASS!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang MATH109
Comment: He is very hard to understand but he's really not that bad of a teacher. very fast paced class

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang MATH116Q
Comment: Once you learn to understand his english, he is an amazing mathematician who anyone can learn a lot from.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang MATH211
Comment: I took his class during the summer. Cramming a semester's worth of advanced calc into 6 weeks was really hard, and the exams were quite tough. Good news: he grades on a unique kind of curve. Basicaly, if you put in the effort, you get a decent grade (at least durring the summer). He's totaly fair and helpful (even if a little tough to understand).

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang MTH110
Comment: this guy is the best teacher ever. grading system is great. class attendance is not required. 3 exam worth 30,35,35 doing HW can give you extra 10+ points on exam! easiest A

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang MATH1131
Comment: -Took Calc II with him over the summer. Very nice guy, but his Exams were WILD. He gave us questions that were nothing like what we went over. Does grade on a curve though- which balanced out his ridulous questions, an 85 was an A, 70+ was a B and so on.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang CALC101
Comment: The worst teacher ever. Ruined my life and killed and buried my GPA. I was good student too. AVOID AT ALL COSTS.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang MATH115
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang CALC
Comment: very hard to understand, teaches too fast and is very unclear...

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang MATH
Comment: he is hard to understand!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang MATH116Q
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang MATH115Q
Comment: Dr. Wang is a great teacher. I learned a lot from him, and he prepares you very well for Calc II. His tests were not that difficult, he took the questions directly from the book. Overall, he is a very nice professor.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang MATH101
Comment: Good teacher.  can be fun to laugh at how he pronounces things, it is a hard class if you dont pay attention.  pay attention and you will do fine

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang MATH1132
Comment: He's a good professor and knows the material really well, tests were do-able if you paid attention and did your homework, he answers HW questions in class, he does have an accent but his english is understandable and he explains the calculus concepts well enough for you to understand, just do your work ask questions and you will do fine

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang CALC2
Comment: He doesn't speak English, his tests are unbelievable, he does not help out of class, and he loves to tell life's lesson stories....imagine a guy you can't understand looking smugly at you because he is quite proud of his profound advice.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Tixiang Wang MATH1010
Comment: Unfair grader. Graded me and a friend differently for the same answers. When approached, he added two points to my grade, upsetting my friend. Doesnt convey the material well. However, easy class.

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Irene Valos PSY407
Comment: i LOVE her! my fav teacher iv had in my life. she is so entertaining, and interesting, i would take this class over. the work she gives is doable. wont take more then 1hr

Teacher Name: Baker College - Brian Bridson MCSEPROGRAM
Comment: When I was a student of Mr. Bridson's for the MCSE program, I really enjoyed all of the courses that I had with him. He made the assignments very clear and he was very fair. He went above and beyond when it came to answering questions, providing class related materials, and utilizing Blackboard.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Brian Bridson CIS106A
Comment: Really great teacher. He goes over all the material and offers other insight while covering it. Exams are fair and you know exactly what to study for. Definetly learning a lot and have really enjoyed having him as my teacher.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Brian Bridson MCSE
Comment: Brian is an excellent instructor with a wry sense of humor. He makes class interesting and expects you to learn the subject matter. He will help you in anyway he can, including starting a lab aide program in order to have tutors that help the students.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Brian Bridson CIS106A
Comment: Great professor. I would take any of his classes.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Brian Bridson MCSETRACK
Comment: Brian's not necessarily an easy professor but you do learn your stuff with him. He will bend over backwards for students that ask him for help. He knows the MCSE track inside and out. Highly recommend him.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Brian Bridson MCSA
Comment: Very fair tests -- no surprises. The ball is entirely in the student's court to get a good grade. Very dependable -- always finishes the course outline laid out at the beginning of the term. Tests are always given on the days specified by the course outline. Graded work is always returned quickly.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Brian Bridson CIS106
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Baker College - Brian Bridson MCSE
Comment: Mr. B's classes are like being in the AirForce. You gotta weed out the weaker ones. Very demanding class and with 10 weeks to learn and pass, Mr. B does an awesome job and puts forth every effort for soon to be admin's to know the MS education.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Brian Bridson MCSE261
Comment: Better than many teachers. Kind of cocky though.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Brian Bridson MCSE211
Comment: Great teacher

Teacher Name: Baker College - Brian Bridson MCSE
Comment: Looking forward to the next class

Teacher Name: Baker College - Brian Bridson MSCE
Comment: Mr. Brison is fair in his teaching. He will make sure that you learn the material, but he did not calculate my grades properly, when I questioned him about it said that my grades were correct but I was so frustrated I did not take the time to fight it.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB302303
Comment: Not a big fan of hers, very strict with deadlines. Would be nice to get a little leeway on due dates given the current situation, but if youre even less than 24 hrs late she docks 20% of your grade and doesnt accept anything after 24 hrs. She has a clear grading criteria, but a little more compassion and understanding would be nice.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB302303
Comment: Lecture and lab are EXTREMELY structured. This is great because you always know what to expect, the guidelines for grading and study guides are provided giving you exactly what you should know for the exams.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB302
Comment: Ever wanted to take a year's worth of material in 10 weeks? Ever wanted to memorize 4,000 facts, then have a test that's 4x as difficult as the lecture material?  If you said yes, take Bruslind's MB 302 course! You'll spend 8 hours a day memorizing things, only to be tested at a much higher level!  DO NOT TAKE BRUSLIND IF YOU VALUE YOUR GPA

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB30X
Comment: MB 302: Tests are hard, they require very extensive memorization of many details. Homework is short (a couple paragraphs), but you can spend hours searching for the necessary information. MB 303: Best organized and most straightforward lab I have ever taken. The lab packet walks you through every single step you need to take. Impossible to fail.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB302
Comment: Awesome class.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB303
Comment: Eager to answer questions. Very informative pre-lab lectures. Most fun lab I've ever taken!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB230
Comment: A lot of non-science majors took it for Bacc Core and struggled, but I thought the class was sooooo easy. She lays out all the notes and the exams aren't difficult at all. She does throw in one or two questions on the exam about stuff that was mentioned in the book but not in the class notes, however I didn't read the book at all and got an A.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB302
Comment: Take Jeneva Anderson!!!! I wish I was told this before... Linda is a very sweet lady but makes her test much harder than she should. Nice teacher but she writes her tests to have an C average. Again, a nice professor... but this class was harder than my physics class. Take Anderson!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB441
Comment: This class is a lot of work! That being said, the work is usually fairly easy, and Linda is (as usual) organized, efficient, and fair. Be prepared to write ~2 lab reports a week for ~5 weeks. The lab work is fun, but towards the end of the term there is too much downtime in some exercises.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB302
Comment: Prepare to pick apart the text and memorize every detail. Even that may not prepare you for the tests. The lecture was general to the point of uselessness compared to the level at which I was tested. The book was written in almost a shorthand style. You will need to use outside sources to define many of her vocab words. Wish I hadn't taken her.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB302
Comment: I can see how people would find her unapproachable but she is a very busy lady! If you come to her during office hours she is much more patient than if you have questions after class. I thought she was great for offering her lectures online for people to watch which was helpful for me when I fell behind in my notes.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB441
Comment: The work and reports are 'easy' enough but it really is a lot of work for a two credit course (2 lab reports a week, powerpoint+group research at the end of the term). And the grading is kinda harsh.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB303
Comment: I appreciate her "hardcore approach" and admittedly learned a lot in her class, but there were too many times when I felt disrespected and witnessed other students being disrespected by Linda. Her pride is the only thing keeping her from being an excellent professor... to be specific she could work on acknowledging when she is wrong.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB302
Comment: I took the online version of this class. She wrote the textbook and provided it for free which is great, however that also means all info in it is fair game so read a lot and read well. Tests were relatively easy so long as you study. Homework and quizzes are super easy. Definitely take this class online.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB302
Comment: I took this class after hearing the campus prof was difficult. Her lectures are clear and she provides a nice outline of notes. However, her grading on homework is hard and her proctored online tests are unfair at times. There was some material tested that was never discussed in the lectures which was frustrating. Probably not worth taking online.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB302MB303
Comment: The overall lecture and course material was extremely organized as Linda provides the outline notes for both lecture and lab. She offers recorded lectures for those that miss class. The lecture was by far more difficult than lab. Overall, taking both lecture and lab simultaneously will require much effort as the lecture alone has lot of material.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind 30X
Comment: I have both lecture and lab with her. I've enjoyed the lab, but the lecture exams are quite difficult and she didn't curve the midterm when the average was low. I liked her teaching style but the exams can be tricky.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB302
Comment: Linda appears to be a cute and sweet lady in lecture, but watch out - the homework is terrible and completely unnecessary, off-topic at times, and WAY out of league for a 300-level course.  The mandatory attendance is ridiculous and insulting, anything open-ended is graded harshly, and the material is vast without meaning or application.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB302
Comment: I did not do well on the first test, but better on the second one and aced the final. Her tests are fair - you get out what you put in. I started studying for the final almost two weeks earlier and I was only a few points behind the class high. I watched her lecture videos over and over again and made a stack of notecards.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Linda Bruslind MB303
Comment: Linda is a great instructor.  fair grader and gives fair tests.  As long as you pay attention to initial lecture material and read the manual you still can get an 'A' even if you get a 'C' or 'D' on a midterm. Manual purchase is Absolutely necessary but I didn't use textbook at all.

Teacher Name: Coastal Pines Technical College - Mandy Lee RESP2140
Comment: Mrs. Lee is a very good teacher that really connects with her students and clarifies the material in the respiratory program. She is a very respected instructor in my book.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev ENG350
Comment: I like this professor and I have had them for multiple classes, however, they often are hard to reach outside of class time. I enjoyed their courses but it was frustrating at times when you need clarification and you are unable to reach them.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev THOUGHTANDCIV
Comment: pointless class, horribly boring, and her grading system makes it very hard to do well.  also she grades very subjectively.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev ENGL350
Comment: Sachdev is absolutely wonderful, I cannot recommend her enough! She tries to make the readings as relatable as possible for her students and goes the extra mile to listen to what everyone has to say. She very clearly loves teaching and loves what she teaches, so if you're hunting for a professor who's dedicated to their craft, she's your gal.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev ASIANWOMENSLIT
Comment: She has a great personality and is really interested in her students.  She has a great deal of knowledge and she is very accomidating.  I think she is a great professor and a wonderful person.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev ENGL250
Comment: Rachana knows how to make her class fun and interesting for everyone regardless of their major or background. She really strives to make everyone feel included and represented and ensures that everyone has a voice in the classroom. She tends to be a bit disorganized, but it's in a fun English teacher kind of way.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev HON101
Comment: I have Rachana for both of my honors classes this year, and I love her! She really gets you to think of the topic she approaches in a new and different way, as she is always willing to look over your papers and really help you out. She is one of the best teachers out there.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev ENG350
Comment: Extremely easy grader. You watch a lot of films. The skits are hard only because people's schedules are so different, but really fun when actually performing. (No acting experience needed!!) Really fun teacher!

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev LIT
Comment: Do not take this lady.  Very tough grader and a horrible grading system and she's so boring.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev HO200
Comment: Nice lady, very tough grader, very dull class

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev HON200
Comment: Thought & Civ was horrible. focused soley on the death penalty, all analysis of issue on her part was superficial. boring discussion, wasted paper with lots of readings, pointless trips (went to a prison & almost set off the alarms.) A lovely person outside the classroom, but avoid like the plague!

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev ENGLI100
Comment: Class is long-winded and it's easy to doze- that's just the nature of it, though. Lots of reading but is all online. Requires you participate in discussion 2x per week (at least). Very caring, thoughtful, and a pretty decent professor.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev SHAKESPEARE
Comment: Rachana's a very special, memorable prof.  She took a personal interest in me and helped me to find my passion for teaching and language.  She does miss a lot of classes, but she has a very active scholarly career, and she coordinates a Shakespeare conference.  She opens minds.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev HON101
Comment: Really lovely woman - she makes us cupcakes and is very nice. Everyone calls her by her first name. Super easygoing, doesn't care if you're late, barely cares if you did homework. You don't learn much and she gives everyone an A, so she's a real catch for requirement classes.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev MANY101
Comment: Dr. Sachdev is very disorganized, and gave me an 80 for class participation when I had attended more classes than she did. I learned some things in her class, but I honestly felt that her class was very dull. I would absolutely not recommend her.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev ENGLI100
Comment: Had her for writing and thinking. She missed a total of 4/5 classes. Her grading system is horrible. You read 5 books then write essays on them. Essays arent hard. All you do is talk in class. Everyone has to volunteer or you will write essays. She is a nice teacher and all, but the class is very boring (also considering I had the class at 8 a.m.)

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev ENGL205
Comment: Not a terrible class given it was Shakespeare & The Environment. Some participation is necessary. Not a heavy grader and is willing to work with you. However the class focused more on the environmental issues then Shakespeare.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev ENG350
Comment: I took Rachana's Asian Literature course and enjoyed her teaching style so much that I also took Shakespeare with her as an elective my senior year. Her classes are on the easier side, so as long as you do the readings and participate in group discussion you'll be fine.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev HONS301
Comment: I'm very surprised to see so many low ratings.  I had Rachana for Shakespeare, and man was it fun!  (As a business major who hates Shakespeare, that says a lot.)  She was not a particularly hard grader, the skits/presentations were fun, and the field trip to D.C. was a blast.  Nothing funnier than Sachdev getting a little tipsy at dinner.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev SHAKESPEARE
Comment: Nice Professor. Very open to alternative projects if you do not like essays. Had class outside once and brought up out to the campus garden. Grading is easy if you try and she will always proof read essays so you know what she wants.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Rachana Sachdev ENGLISH
Comment: Impossible to know what she actually wanted. Very unclear with instructions.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENG100
Comment: Love this teacher! He is always late though, but so was I so it didn't really matter. Attendance is very important on essay days. He grades tough on essays, but helps you a lot.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENGLISH102
Comment: he's ok

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENGA2
Comment: EXCELLENT PROFESSOR!!! I RECOMMEND TAKING HIS CLASS, YES HE WAS LATE EVERYDAY, BUT OVERALL HE IS A GOOD PROFESSOR, AND HIS METHOD OF TEACHING WILL PREPARE YOU FOR THE EXAM EXAM & OTHER FORM OF WRITING.... HIGHLY RECOMMEND HIS CLASS!!!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENGLISH102
Comment: loved his class! hated him being late everyday but hes an awesome teacher!!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENG101
Comment: I took him for 101 and 102. He's very cool. He's very helpful. His way of helping to prepare for the exit exam is great. I got an A.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENG101
Comment: Best english teacher I have had in Long time

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENG101
Comment: Mr. Adam is a great English teacher. He is very simplistic in his teachings. He doesn't cloud your mind with a bunch of unnecessary information. He gets to the point immeadiately, and follows his syllabus. Definitely a recommended teacher to take a class with.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENGL101
Comment: He was a very easy teacher and was very clear with the subject. The only problem I had was him being late to class and me waking up at 6 in the morning to get there at 8 and him not being there. Overall good teacher and you should be able to pass the class if you pay attention.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENGL101
Comment: Great teacher. Highly recommended!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENG101
Comment: if you were ESL student, and your English is not strong, don't take this class.  He's going to tell you that you'll not pass a final essay.  This is what he told me and my friend; as a result, we dropped it.  However, we both took English 101 with a different teacher, and both passed.I'm sure this class is fun for people w/t no problems in English

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENGC
Comment: He's a really good teacher.  His games help the students learn alot. All you have to do is come to class and pay attention and you'll be all good. Test are SUPER easy.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENG101
Comment: He is a very good English teacher. He focuses on specific areas that will ultimately prepare you for English 102 and further in writing . I would highly recommend that if possible a student take his class. He is awesome.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENGLISH102
Comment: LOVE LOVE LOVE his class! best english class I have taken!!!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENG101197
Comment: Adam was awesome. I had never actually used my grammar skills in my writing until I took his English 101-197 class. I'd totally advise to take classes with him. The class was real helpful and he was a great and easy teacher. Great personality and has a great way of teaching. Attending class is very important though. Be there.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENGLISH102
Comment: Adam is an excellent professor. I do recommend taking this class if you're a pro in grammar. I would stay away if you're not cause he is really picky with grammar. If you like the one-on-one interaction then I think this is the class for you.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENG101
Comment: HE IS AN EXCELLENT TEACHER HE MAKES YOU ENJOY LEARNING THE PROPER GRAMMAR AND MECHANICS OF ENGLISH. FURTHERMORE, HE IS REALLY HELPFUL IF YOU NEED HIM TO BE AND HE ANSWERS ALL QUESTIONS AND WILL ASSIST IN ANY WAY HE CAN.....GREAT TEACHER!!!!!!!!!!!!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENGLISH101
Comment: At first, I was very disappointed because I registered to that class because of the professor that was going to teach the class. Nonetheless, he ended up being a great teacher. He is always wiling to help you. He makes English easy to understand and easy to pass the class. What's more, he is very very hot. He made me blush every time he looked @ me

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENG101
Comment: Easy A if you know your stuff.  Not the best for people who don't already know grammar and such.  Tries hard though.  Nice guy.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENG101
Comment: He is a very good proffesor. his class is easy if pay attention and if you fall behind he will assit you with help.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Adam McOmber ENG102
Comment: My fear of writing has plagued me all my life.  I went into this class hoping to survive.  Actually, I thrived! Adam's a great teacher -- he loves what he does and does it very well.  He's patient, helpful, engaging and committed to each and every student's success.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Chris Patchell DESIGDESI
Comment: Awesome guy. I feel like Patch is like one of the students. He knows what he's talking about and he can be fun to talk to but he's also strict on deadlines.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Mark Davison PS101
Comment: Dr. Davison is a great professor. He doesn't lecture and he makes his class fun. I would have to say it is one of my favorite classes and I would pick another one of his classes if I had the chance.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Mark Davison PSY101
Comment: Very "easy" and very "friendly."

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Mark Davison PSYCHOLOGY
Comment: Best Teacher in college history. He knows his stuff

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - John Horn SC200
Comment: John is wonderful and gives amazing feedback. Just like most PAFA faculty, if you have a question he will happily help you. You get the same amount of growth out of this class as the effort you put in, so if you slack-off youll come out with nothing. John is very articulate and is an absolute master of anatomy. Great class!

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - John Horn SC251
Comment: Learned so much about human anatomy through sculpture in this class, took it because I had been recommended by several of my peers to take one of his ecorche courses. Very charismatic professor with a wealth of knowledge about human anatomy as well as sculpture as an artistic medium. Provides casts and books for you to reference and print outs!

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - John Horn SC200
Comment: This was a sculpting class for large figure modeling. John Horn was a pretty terrible organizer. He gave no real instruction on how you can improve your sculpture nor did he give any substantial opinions (do expect a lot of "red herrings", he and his colleagues are masters of this rhetorical strategy). Would not recommend his classes.

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - John Horn SC300
Comment: Took his sculpting classes. The only instructional words he utter that semester was contrapposto. Disappointed.

Teacher Name: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts - John Horn SC300
Comment: I really wish I could rate him higher but he always start his classes late and just have his model wait just is not excusable. Very bad professionalism. Don't recommend.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - J Heller ACCT131
Comment: Awsome professor. Makes class fun, uses many examples that clarify the sometimes confusing material. I definatly recommend this class. Very little homework but alot of groupwork. Values opinions of students. A+++. Books are cheap!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - J Heller ACCT131
Comment: He is a pretty good guy but bad teacher.  He doesn't explain much.  He never collects homework which is kinda scary cause you don't know what ur going to expect for a grade.  He is very disorganized

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - J Heller ACCT132
Comment: Excellent teacher. Inspirational and helpful.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - J Heller ACCOUNTING
Comment: It depends what you are trying to do.  If you hate accounting, and just want a good grade, take his class!  You WILL get a good grade.  If you REALLY want to learn acconting, try another teacher.  You don't need to do his homework to get a good grade, so it doesn't matter if you are doing it right.  :)

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - J Heller ACCT2101
Comment: I know nothing about accounting. I hate that I had to take it as one of my prerequisites for the UConn School of Business. But this guy made the material fun and simple. I will never use accounting again, but I will remember this class. He helps you get good grades and genuinely cares. Oh, and he does an Elmo voice. That has to count for something!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - J Heller ACCSECT
Comment: Great guy, cares about students a lot, tries to make class interesting.  Agree with the two first comments below on this list - if you are serious about a career in accounting and doing well in future classes, take this class with another prof.  Quite disorganized, and you don't come away with a whole lot of solid knowledge. If you want a little kn

Teacher Name: Baker College - D Forsmark SPK201
Comment: She is a sweet lady. She has you do a page and a half of an overview of each chapter so make sure you have you get a book. She is pretty hard when grading. Each "um, or uh" used is a point off or if you say "working good" instead of "working well". This hurts your score. Other then that she is a decent teacher.

Teacher Name: Baker College - D Forsmark ENG101
Comment: Very nice and friendly. Always ready to help.

Teacher Name: Baker College - D Forsmark ENG101
Comment: Super easy. Let everyone leave early. Very helpful.

Teacher Name: Baker College - D Forsmark ENG101
Comment: Not the most exciting teacher. Topics for essays are lame. She trys to be helpful but grades you like you are suppose to be a professional at writing. A- student getting a B or worse in this class. I do not recommend taking her unless you can write without any errors!

Teacher Name: Baker College - D Forsmark ENG101
Comment: It was very hard to get an "A" out of her but she was extremely helpful and appreciated the work people did.  I felt she truly enjoyed listening to our thoughts and things we shared in class.  She is as sweet as they come.  She explained things well and never minded questions.

Teacher Name: Baker College - D Forsmark SPK201
Comment: Good teacher and cares alot of your work. Makes the class easy.

Teacher Name: Baker College - D Forsmark SPK111
Comment: Pretty easy for the most part. As long as you do your homework and follow the speech guidelines you will pass with a good grade. She's old so she's not very interesting but overall she's a very good teacher.

Teacher Name: Baker College - D Forsmark SPK201
Comment: As long as you do your speeches and homework, she is a fair grader. She is a very helpful and understanding teacher. She truely likes to hear your speeches and loves her job.

Teacher Name: Baker College - D Forsmark SPK201
Comment: Very easy going, but you'll still learn.  Her relaxed style causes everyone to get comfortable in a class not may would voluntarily take.  She wants you to do well.

Teacher Name: Baker College - D Forsmark COMP1
Comment: Very judgemental teacher.  She says she wants you views but that is just until you disagree with her.  I will not take her again.  Very vocal about her christian views.  Harsh grader.  She does spend time of grammer which is helpful, but is more worried about the tests than teaching it to you.

Teacher Name: Baker College - D Forsmark SPK201
Comment: She is a pretty easy teacher, just do your speeches, and your homework. Always lets you out early. She is really funny when she talks about her life stories. Very old but nice.

Teacher Name: Baker College - D Forsmark SPK201
Comment: This teacher is a biased person who treats being by stereotypes.  I found her to be harsh and unfair.  I wouldn't recommend anyone who has feelings to take a class of hers!

Teacher Name: Baker College - D Forsmark
Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH411PH412
Comment: Hetherington is obviously very interested and involved in the subject, but seems to forget what he has and hasn't taught sometimes.  Testing is completely unpredictable; tests range from moderate to ridiculous difficulty and their impact on grades may be changed drastically in the middle of the course.  Expect to work much more than you learn.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH411
Comment: he can't lecture worth a damn. he knows his stuff but is unable to communicate in any way.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PHYS212
Comment: lectures are very boring and complicated; sometimes he does sample problems or derives formulas, you don't know.  homework isn't mandatory, but it doesn't matter since it none of it shows up on the exams.  exams are difficult, very different from sample exams.  class is curved around a c+, ridiculously low where 3 exams determine EVERYTHING.
