Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH212
Comment: The guy has his own agenda. Gives demonstrations that waste class time and do not help.Goes off on extreme tangents. Does not bother with the text. Would definately take this sequence from Bannon instead.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PHY211
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PHY411
Comment: Lectures are near incomprehensible.  Labs are often performed before the material is lectured on.  Handouts and practice exams have mistakes in them. Midterm was twice as long as time allowed; nobody finished, average was around 50%. Barely  used book. HOWEVER, English IS his first language, and he is available after class for questions sometimes.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH213
Comment: classes are a complete waste of time. exams average 30-40%. completely unrealistic expectations in grading. Labs cover material 3-4 chapters ahead and do not synchronize with lectures. this is your warning not take this class from this guy.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington CHEM480
Comment: I googled this professor 26 years after I took his class at the University of Arizona in Tucson (Chemistry 480; Physical chemistry).  He was the WORST professor I've ever had.  EVER--except for his colleage J. Pemberton.  I look at these comments, from Oregon, 26 years later--nothing has changed.  He should be dismissed from academics.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH212
Comment: Very unclear and boring lectures.  He wastes a good portion of class time explaining extraneous stuff not really relevant to class, then gets upset when we get bored and leave.  Assigns homework ahead of lectures and expects you to know how to do them from reading the text book.  He didn't write the practice midterms and the real midterms are nothing like it and they're very hard.  Of 200+ students, class avg on the first midterm was 40%.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH411
Comment: Horrible lectures.  His voice trails off when he is getting to his main point. He never makes a class announcement and hopes people spread the word (even for our midterm.)  He made our 3 credit class much harder than paradigms and 314 combined.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH313
Comment: This was an outstanding course, taught by a great professor.  It was very difficult and I would not have wanted to tackle it without already having a background in physics and chem.  It needs to be an alternative physics sequence to allow adequate time to lay the foundation for the really interesting stuff.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH412
Comment: Don't hate on Dr. H!!!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH411
Comment: Not a good lecturer, and not very organized, and that gets very annoying. However, he's very friendly, entusiastic about science in general and very knowledgable in many areas. Energy Alternatives is a great Bac Core class, 411/412 were too unorganized.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH411
Comment: Dificult professor.  Tries to cram a bunch of material in without explaining it in enough detail.  Expects you to already have an understanding of electronics before taking this class.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH313
Comment: IF you're taking energy alternatives, by all means take it with another Prof.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH411412
Comment: William Heatherington is poorly organized, but he knows his stuff. His problem is that he doesn't communicate everything he needs to for you to understand the material and the class. The labs force you to spend extra time when you're only scheduled for a certain amount, and nothing is ever really explained to you. Class = Trial and error.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH211
Comment: Tries to do problems, does them wrong. Does not explain the material. His homework do not cover what was covered in class. B's in the 55/100 range. It was horrible!!! I noticed the pre-labs suck here and have nothing to do with the class; expect to be stuck after class to do "redo"s for your pre-labs. Hey, and i am smart guy, (3.43 gpa).

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PHY213
Comment: Useless lectures, I went to 3 felt less intelligent after 10 minutes and left. World class brutal tests! I've fumbled through Advanced Calculus 300 series and his midterms are the toughest I've seen! We all failed apparently dont know how you can grade a 40% avg. test, some people failed worse than others? Physics and Chemistry are lacking at OSU.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH211
Comment: This class was hard to stay awake in. The examples are bogus; as are the problems he assigns and teaches in class. The midterm is insane. I am actually one of the survivors as half of the class seems to have already dropped.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - William Hetherington PH211
Comment: Only halfway through this one, but so far hes made physics horribly uninteresting and also the tests are super unpredictable..

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Richard Chapman BUS655
Comment: I took the course BUS 655, Designing Effective Orgs. with Professor Chapman and this was a hybrid, meet bi-weekly course.  We had homework due every class meeting & a large research paper due at the end of the term.  It was not a hard class, do the work, talk don't be shy towards Professor Chapman he is a great guy and is pretty basic.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON202
Comment: he was very helpful, and gave great advise to me.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON
Comment: He is ok as a teacher but unfortunately he doesn't explain much. He is a nice guy and also funny.However I belive he could have done better.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON201
Comment: George is a very interesting professor to say the least. His motto is "If you don't know economics, you don't know George Tang" let me tell you. I know George Tang, but I do not know Economics. I took both 201 & 202 with him. EASY CLASS, allows cheat sheets for all tests. He's funny, but sometimes says the wrong things.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON201
Comment: George is a wonderful professor, and also he works at the admission office as a college adviser. He is easy to work with and totally understanding. If your grade is not so well, make sure to talk to him after class then he?d offer help and advice. I had a pretty big improvement at the end of the semester. I surely recommend him to all of my friends

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON201
Comment: OMG~ George, my professors, is the father of modern economics~

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON201
Comment: He is teaching online courses mostly. George is a nice person; however, in this course you have to study on your own. Make sure you read the textbook thoroughly and ask him questions. Some multiple attempts for the quizzes are allowed sometimes.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON102
Comment: Mr. I want to learn Kung Fu was a great teacher. He has a goofy, fun personality which kept the class entertaining. And he actually cares about his students and wants them to do well. I wish more teachers were like that.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON201
Comment: Wonderful professor. It is an honor to be taught by such an educated guy for Econ. I recommend him completely.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON201
Comment: nice and helpful! feel free to ask him questions if he's not busy during the day. i strongly recommend this teacher

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECONF
Comment: Professor George is a wonderful man; he is definitely funny. He knows his stuff, but he teaching is different... You have to read, read, read the material.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON201
Comment: He's a genuine nice guy. A very funny guy. No one will fail his class.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON101
Comment: He asks people if he looks better than public figures such as presidents. I think he does. His class is easy just do your work.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECN202
Comment: He's a nice guy but his exams are hard sometimes

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON202
Comment: George is a great guy and he is very lenient at grading. If you follow his lectures and the notes he give you, you will be able to learn the material. His exams are easy and study guides are usually given to you before an exam. I took him for 2 economic classes and he is great!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON202
Comment: great teacher. as long as you try. you will get a good grade

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - George Tang ECON201
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Allison McNeese MUTLIPLECLASSES
Comment: Very interesting professor. I had three classes with her and enjoyed everyone. She does expect you to participate and complete the work, but I don't think that is too much to ask, you are in college aren't you. Her tests are all essay, but she gives you the topics ahead of time and if you write a rough draft she will go over it with you.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Allison McNeese HI115
Comment: I have nightmares about her PPTS. From the choices for color, font, and transition variety to the ungodly quantities of texts on each slide, it's torture to try and follow the extremely disorganized information. Expects 30 hours of work weekly. Tons of filler info and homework. Overall, at least 75% of the class is a total waste of your time.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Allison McNeese HI115
Comment: She is a fair teacher.  Expectations are easily understood.  Lots of reading!

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Allison McNeese HI140
Comment: I have her for Western Civ. once a week for 3 hours straight. She isn't boring, but the workload is RIDICULOUS!! Expects way too much from students in one week... it's insane. She is helpful, though.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Allison McNeese HISTORY
Comment: There is sooo much homework in her classes but i guess you do learn a lot

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Allison McNeese HI114
Comment: Very good professor, knows what she's talking about. Requires a lot of work, but is manageable. Text books a must in this class.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Allison McNeese HI114
Comment: Her powerpoints were VERY painful.  She needs to use less color and more organization on it.  Just really confusing.  Her as a teacher isn't bad.  She expects a lot and just be prepared to spend HOURS on homework.  But, she is willing to work with you, as long as you try.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Allison McNeese EUROPEINREV
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Allison McNeese HI114
Comment: PowerPoints are an absolute mess. They are hard to follow with so much color, long paragraphs on one slide, and they jump all over the place. She cancelled class half the time. Never read a single book and still wrote the papers. She assigns a lot of busy work that isnt unneeded.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Robert Wood PHOTO101
Comment: I loved Bob Wood's class. His power points are really relevant, his examples are actually helpful, and his studio is awesome. He really knows what he is talking about, and he is really a great guy. He made lighting ratios make sense, now that is hard to do.

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Robert Wood PROPHOTO
Comment: Good hands on explanations

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CIS310
Comment: Very hard.  Always wants to get to her lectures first and then help you.  Also, she can get you lost in her classes and she teaches too fast.  I recommend not take any of her classes if you are a slow learner.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CIS421
Comment: Class was Database Administration. We used the Oracle 10.1g database, but both the book and all the teachers notes covered Oracle 10.2g (which is quite different)

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CIS218A
Comment: Very little classroom participation or facilitation on blackboard. She grades way harder than necessary, and is rude. 10\10 would never take her class again.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CIS310
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CS218
Comment: I had Julie for several classes, and enjoyed each and every one of them.  She can be tough, but she is fair and is willing to help.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright WEB361
Comment: Unclear instructions, test questions that could be interpreted many different ways, won't tell you what you did wrong until she has graded the assignment, which is too late by then because you're stuck with whatever crap grade she gives you. Make sure you turn your work in on time or you get a zero...

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CS335B
Comment: She is very fair at grading. If you put forth zero effort, it will definitely show. Julie is very responsive, and helps when needed. However, she lacks knowledge in some areas and will stop helping you if she does not know the answer.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CIS310
Comment: Hard only if you don't know programming

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright WEB361
Comment: I think Julie is a good teacher.  I appreciate the structure and found her to be very helpful.  She graded honestly, and expected students to complete work on time.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CIS218A
Comment: One of the worst teachers I have ever had.  Too busy telling students about her years of experience she runs out of time to teach anything of substance.  Do not take her online course.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CS218
Comment: I had Julie for three courses, AS400, C++, and Adv. C++. I appreciated her positive encouragement and continued support. I give her two thumbs up.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CIS310
Comment: A real pain in the neck.  She can easily get a slow learner lost in her classes.  Also, she expects you to zip assignments and send them through Blackboard, a pain in the butt.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CS218
Comment: I had Julie for C++, Advanced C++, and AS/400. Excellent teacher. I would take one of her courses again in a second... Excellent communicator; Teaches with conviction.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CIS310
Comment: Hard and dosen't tell anything clear enough

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CS217
Comment: I took two three of her courses and wish I could take more. She was extremely responsive to questions and was constantly active on the message board. Top notch course administrator in my book.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Julie Wright CS350
Comment: Like most of the professors at Baker College online this was more about adminstrating a class than actually teacher. This teacher was no different. She took too long to grade assignments. It would be well into week 3 before we'd get week 1 graded.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MUS150
Comment: Very enjoyable guy! I always look forward to symphonic band. He is thorough in the music, making sure every bit is as should be.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MARCHINGBAND
Comment: Greatest director ever.  Does a fantastic job teaching rehearsal... he's funny and goofy, but able to be strict when he needs to in order for the band to get things done.  Go Doc!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MB
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MUS153
Comment: Doc Townsend is simply amazing. I love this guy, his sense of humor, and his general wish for everyone's well being. His only downside is his bi-polar activity, which only shows itself when the band actually deserves it.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MUS153
Comment: Great director. It doesn't matter if you've marched before, he is totally patient and teaches you how.  Can be strict at times, but he is trying to control 150+ band students, so it makes sense. He respects his students and expects his students to respect him back.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MARCHINGBAND
Comment: hes a really really awesome director. I enjoy every minute of the class

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MUS353
Comment: Doc is a good guy, but he sold out.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MUS153
Comment: Doc rules, simply put. :)

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MUS153
Comment: Doc is the man! Amazing guy. He's hilarious and gets the job done. He's brought the OSUMB back to life. I'd like to say that the person that commented three spots down obviously doesn't know what they're talking about. They're the one that has the problem and they're  a complete moron seeing as hardly anybody has anything bad to say about Doc.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MARCHINGBAND
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MUS153
Comment: This guy absolutely makes the class. Not only did he learn everyone's names and personalities, but he honestly cares about our performances. He keeps students coming back.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MARCHINGBAND
Comment: What a cool guy!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MUS153
Comment: He's the best professor I've had here at OSU. I love marching band and I love symphonic band, and he made them amazing. Marching band is not easy, by any means, but I enjoyed doing all the work.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MU102
Comment: Great Professor, loved how he played the piano and sang in the lectures, however, it took him three weeks to respond to questions I made. Grading took forever and the class participation was slow but easy. Want an easy A? This is the class to take.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MB
Comment: He is a tyrant, who is only out for himself and his wellbeing.  OSUMB used to be one of the best collegiate bands here until he came.  Practice is a waste of time because of the nonsense that comes out of his mouth.  He is Like the devil taking our souls.  There is no compromise with him, its HIS way only, which is totally annoying!Waste of my time

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MUS350
Comment: He is awesome!! As long as you are doing what you are supposed he is the Best! If your not then he can't get ugly, but sometimes that is what people need:)

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MUS353
Comment: Great guy who has restored marching band to prominence in the Pac-12. Sometimes he does go a little overboard with his rants, though generally only after being provoked by stupid people doing stupid things. You'll get an A unless you are are too stupid to get to games on-time.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MUS102
Comment: I had Doc Townsend for MUS 102 through Ecampus so I cannot speak to OSUMB. However, he made the class extremely interesting, brought to life the American Musical, and used video lectures (which is important for online class delivery). It is a straight forward class and if you do the requirements you will get the grade.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MBMUS150
Comment: He is great and will be missed. Helpful and understanding, he will understand if you have a good reason. Don't slack because he will call you all out on it. This is his final year at OSU. All those kids at University of Pittsburg are lucky sons of guns.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Brad Townsend MUS353
Comment: This man is worthless. He plays games, takes sides and manipulates his musicians through political band drama and shallow commitments. He's got his numbers, so from here on out all members of OSUMB are expendable. His tyrannical outburst are unprofessional and his creative skills embarrass the program.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Stephen Parks HIST101
Comment: He is a good teacher talks about his book alot. But his test are easy cause he gives u EXACTLY whats on it before the test. The quizes are hard the first time but you get to retake them. (you can look back at you old quiz and get a 100 on the next one)

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Stephen Parks HIST1502
Comment: Great teacher, and a very easy grader on the mid-term, paper, and final. Don't by the textbooks because as said before, the quizzes can be retaken and looked back on to get 100, and the book of articles can be found online. The only thing you need to do is study the articles for the midterm and final and do the paper.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Stephen Parks HIST1010
Comment: good

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Stephen Parks 101
Comment: he is there to help and makes things very distinct as to what and how he grades.  Best teacher for history I have ever had.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Stephen Parks HISTORY
Comment: I hated this class with a passion. Very unclear in his teaching methods. The quizzes were impossible and I couldn't even make it through some of the classes.

Teacher Name: Coastal Pines Technical College - Bernard Restrepo EMS
Comment: Average

Teacher Name: Coastal Pines Technical College - Bernard Restrepo EMS1110
Comment: Good

Teacher Name: University of Phoenix - Ganesh Shanmuganathan WEB237
Comment: By far the most knowledgeable prof I have ever had.  Not only did he cover all of the course requirements, but he added so much info from personal experience to enhance and fortify all of the topics.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Kathleen Meany POL201
Comment: knows her stuff ... is very easy going ... test and quizzes are easy.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Kathleen Meany SOCIALSCIENCE
Comment: she is good!!!  As long as you do all reading and homework, you'll get an A

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Kathleen Meany POLSCI
Comment: One of the best at HWC. Harvard grad & elected official. Smart, articulate, cares about subject and students. Will let good students slide on deadlines. Wants students to talk. Very informed, up to date on politics. I'll take any class she teaches.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Kathleen Meany POLS201
Comment: Great teacher. Loves teaching.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Kathleen Meany SOCSCI102
Comment: There should be more teachers like prof. Meany:)

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Kathleen Meany SOCSCK
Comment: All we have to do is read the chapters, do the homework and show up to class. It's an easy A. She talks about what's going to be on the test. There is one oral presentation towards the end of the semester. She is lenient with homework and gives out extra credit. Really connects what you are learning to the current events.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Kathleen Meany POLSCI201
Comment: Great teacher who works in the field.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Kathleen Meany SOCSCI102
Comment: She's an excellent teacher. Very nice. Very helpful. Just as long as you go to class, read some of the weekly chapter(you SHOULD read all though) and do the homework, the exams will be easy A's. The weekly homework assignments toward the end got pretty intense though, but she goes over everything you need to know before the test.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Kathleen Meany POLITICALSCIEN
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Kathleen Meany POLISCI
Comment: Professor Meany is one of the best teachers at Harold Washington I was privy to taking her class and she makes her class fun. The advantage many students get is that she's an elected official and well educated. You can't get more quality than that. She's fine tuned to the field she's got her degree

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Kathleen Meany POLS201
Comment: My only complaint is that she comes to class somewhat unprepared and can be a scatter-brain. Other than that, I highly recommend any class she teaches.

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Charles Coleman EDUC407
Comment: EASY EASY EASY!! no hw. final is a power point of choice. If u dont get an A ur dumb!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli NUR110
Comment: This is one amazing professor. He is so helpful and makes everything so clear. AWC is lucky to have him!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli CALIICALIII
Comment: AWC is fortunate to have this person. Very few math instructors can match his proficiency, set aside the fact that he currently uses advanced mathimatics in the field to save peoples lives and contributes his math skills to biological sciences!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli NUR110
Comment: Great Professor!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli CALC
Comment: really cool guy.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli ENV101
Comment: He is the best! Geo is extremely passionate and transmits that to his students. He is truly inspirational with all he does, and has done. Exams consist of 5 chapters, and questions are taken directly from powerpoints. I highly recommend taking this class.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli MATH231241262
Comment: good personality and an excellent teacher who has a practical knowledge of math

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli MAT151
Comment: He is down to earth, iteresting, practical, learned a lot from him!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli MAT241
Comment: Wow this professor is great! Montopli will teach you everything that you will need to know and none of the extra stuff that you wont use on tests! All his exams are half take home and half in class, the take home is hard but you can work with other students! Plus, the in class portion is so easy! Just one great professor!!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli ENV101
Comment: Amazing teacher! Took him this semester and never regret it. His classes consist of power point on the chapter as well as labs that we do once or twice a month and which they are pretty easy so they are easy points. Each class day we have a quiz but they are fairly easy and always gives extra credit points. Homework as well easy! totally recommend

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli ENV
Comment: Took stats with him and I liked his instructional methods, but I am not good at math. Took Env a year later and LOVED how passionate he is about life and earth in general! It's a must have professor!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli ENVSCIENCE
Comment: Environmental Science was an interesting topic and it was mostly because the professor has a passion for the environment. Lectures can be long, but he tries to make it fun. Tests are based on every 5 chapters so just study his reviews and you'll be fine. Homework can accumulate and help your grade so do it!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli MATH270
Comment: Awesome teacher. This class is a bit hard but he breaks it down and goes over everything and answers any and every question.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli ENVI101
Comment: Very passionate professor who is funny and understanding. He is willing to work with you and is very approachable. He gives plenty of extra credit and accepts late work for a reduced grade. He usually lets out early, but still covers everything that needs to be covered. Test replicate materials learned in lectures. Overall great professor!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli ENV101
Comment: he is a good professor, gives a lot of credit if you participate and do well in the quizzes, only be carefull with the 100 questions per test.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - George Montopoli MAT231241262
Comment: This professor is the BOMB.  The best of the best.  His classes is particularly hard as any but he will find a way to make his students understand.  He has a little sense of humor, and he uses his math and statistical skills to save people's lives.  Now thats cool!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CH123
Comment: One of the best chemistry professors I have ever had. Extremely helpful.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CH123
Comment: I am terrible at Chemistry and have looked at the subject as the obstacle I will have to pass in order to graduate. After having Dr. Weiss for 121 I was still left with little hope. However, I then took 122/123 with Dr. Drapela and I finally feel like I can make it to graduation. He was an outstanding professor and I will be forever grateful!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CH121
Comment: great professor, very helpful, kind, and wants students to be successful

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CH336
Comment: Even though I love chem. Drapela imo has always been the best in-class instructor in chemistry. His teaching style is hands down 2nd to none! as osu has now fired him. good luck to him and his family.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CH12X
Comment: Dr. Drapela is the greatest professor I've had! He explains concepts in such a way that anyone can understand. His tests are super easy. Of course, attending lecture is important - as with any class. Also, he has fabulous demonstrations. He is a wonderful teacher and I'm very sad to see him go.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CHEM123
Comment: Dr. Drapela was the best Chemistry professor I've ever had the pleasure of learning from. I know that a lot of us were very upset to hear that he had been let go from the university and we all believe it was a mistake. He was a great Chemistry professor and he should still be teaching here next term!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela 121
Comment: One tough professor but is clear and very professional.  Science is not my strength, but his quality of instruction helped me foster a successful grade.  Very strong instructor.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CHEM123
Comment: Dr. Drapela is incredible! Very strategic with his lectures and has creative ways to present the material. I was registered for the other OSU Gen Chem teacher but i never once went to her lectures. By far my favorite teacher at OSU!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CHEM123
Comment: Go to the lectures and you will get good grades. The best Chemistry teacher I have had.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CH331
Comment: Great teacher, great person.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CH331
Comment: Drapela used humor to engage the students in an early morning class, he was always upbeat and cheerful. I looked for more classes to take with him because he was so phenomenal

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CH121
Comment: I hate chemistry. I never would have passed if not for Drapela. He is the best instructor I've ever had in a lecture setting. Classes were enjoyable and informative, and he expects his students to behave like adults. Awesome teacher!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CH123
Comment: Great teacher. Clearly understands what he is doing and his lectures make perfect sense

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CHEM123
Comment: Great teacher overall, engaging in classroom lectures and interested in the subject he is teaching. Knows the material we are covering in class inside and out.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela A002
Comment: Best chem instructor I've had by far. Very good professor and well liked by everyone I've known who has had him. Very dynamic and willing not only to help his students, but he really goes above and beyond. I consider myself very lucky to have had Dr. Drapela.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela GS105
Comment: I cannot honestly say that Chemistry is a subject that I enjoy I was not looking forward to taking the class before I did. Because of Dr. Dapelas compassion for science he did a very good job at making the course material interesting and at keeping our curiosity levels peaked.I recommend his class to anyone considering a course in Chemistry.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CH12X
Comment: Drapela was awesome for Chemistry. He makes a very hard subject fun and easier to understand. You can tell he actually cares about his students. My favorite teacher at OSU so far!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CHEM123
Comment: Best professor I've yet to have at OSU. Understood everything he taught and he was very timely in answering any questions I had.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CH121
Comment: Outstanding instructor!  Take him if you can for 121.  He's far and away better than Nafshun!  He is a wonderful person too, I went to his office many times. He was always happy to help and talk about life in general. One of the best profs at OSU, no doubt about that. I'll always remember a lot of what he taught me and our class.  Bravo!!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Nicholas Drapela CHEM104
Comment: Chemistry can be a difficult subject but Professor Drapela loves this subject and it shows in his teaching style. His passion is infectious!! I highly recommend this professor when taking chemistry.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - David Deorge POGLOB
Comment: The one thing I learned in college was in David's Globalism class. He is great!

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - David Deorge POL101
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - David Deorge PO101
Comment: You really have to pay attention during lecture, and reading certainly helps, but isn't necessary. Just follow study guides before a test and you'll be fine.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz PHYSCI111
Comment: You definitely have to work in this class. Be on time and make sure not to skip many classes as there are quizzes everyday. Just do the reading before class and you'll be fine.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz PHYSCI107
Comment: Awesome science teacher. He's pretty straightforward. Read the chapters, get a mini-quiz in the beginning of class. His lectures are awesome bc having worked for NASA in the past, he's very knowledgeable on the subject. He makes science interesting. Has a hard time with technology sometimes, the lil old fella. Great teacher nonetheless :)

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz BIO114
Comment: He lectures as if you already understand using complicated terms and when more than half the students get an F (none getting an A) for the third time, he again feels its your problem, nothing to do with his teaching. "You should be studying at least 10 hours a week."

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz PHYSCI111
Comment: Thorough, great communicator, well respected on campus, and will support your personal educational goals if you initiate a dialogue. Definitely chat about your interests with him because he'll truly listen. He is super helpful and intelligent, and enjoys chatting about current events after class. Reach out to him! Really nice, professional guy.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz BIOLOGY114
Comment: Every class there is an exam, or quiz and sometimes he doubles up on the quizzes. The lectures are long. There are times where he would give out these long lectures knowing we have a time critical lab to do right afterwards, leaving many students scrambling at the last minute trying to complete it.  We had to discover labs points vary.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz PHYSCI111
Comment: cool dude with good stories and lectures. helpful and answers any questions in or out of class. TA is nice and chill. TONS of extra credit on the weekly quizzes. practice questions at the end of the book chapters help a lot with exams. do your labs and the homework and youre good. just do the work and nothing to worry about.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz BIO109
Comment: Grade based entirely on quizzes (yes, these are given BEFORE the corresponding lecture) and exams;  very easy if you do your readings.  Extra credit available on all quizzes/exams.  I never found Prof. Bednarz to be rude, contrary to a number of the reviews posted here.  Respect him and he will respect you.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz PHYSCI111
Comment: If you seek a degree trying to clarify the inconceivability of our world, Professor Bednarz is an excellent educator. For those in pursuit of a general knowledge class to learn basics, he is not for you. The Professor exhibits a classic case of brilliant intellectualism with an implementation of curricula well-above a general elective requirement.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz ASTRO20162016
Comment: If you take Astronomy, do not take that class with this teacher. Does not help you when you fall behind on an chapter, he will basically tell you to just re-read the material.  A quiz every class day, and is not helpful.  The extra credit he offers? Ridiculous! I had to drop this class early. Do yourself a favor and do not take this class with him.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz ASTRO201
Comment: I was not a huge fan of Prof. Bednarz because he was just very difficult sometimes. He would refuse to give any extra credit even if you were doing terrible. I guess because it was a summer class that he was a little more strict, but I don't know he was just too much sometimes. I am  glad that class is over.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz ASTRO201
Comment: I very much enjoyed his class, even changed my major! He worked for NASA and is passionate and you could tell he loves teaching about th universe. Funny dude, respect to be respected and make sure your writing is clean. Also, its college so so your readings and youll be fine, very easy quizzes but study for exams!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz PHYSCI111
Comment: Would not recommend to take this course. He will complain if you don't write your full name or if your handwriting is to small. Grades you hard and will give random quizzes in the beginning of class. Is never prepared when there is a lab due today. and gives 20 mins to do a lab at the end of class. Wouldn't take again or recommend to anyone.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz ASTRO201
Comment: I took this class for my physical science credit, and it was the worst class. It seems like he doesn't know how to properly get the information he's teaching across, and majority of the classes are spent with heavy lecturing with a quiz at the beginning. He's a tough grader, so that meant I was failing a lot of tests and exams.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz BIO109
Comment: Prof is a great teacher with high expectations. He expects you to come to class having already read the chapter, which is to be expected. Class is really just to get clarification on what you read, as well as taking quizzes on the chapters at the start of each class. Overall I think he was a pretty fair teacher. I have a very high A in the class.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz BIO114
Comment: Professor Bedarz is the worst you can take for Biology course. He does not answer questions and gets mad at you when you don't get something. Be ready to teach yourself. Expect quizzes every class followed by tests. If you can avoid him please do so. More than half the class dropped the course after midterms. Please take another professor!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz ASTRO201
Comment: Easy class in my opinion. Heavy lectures involve presentations via powerpoint that you can download to your computer. There are weekly quizzes for extra points or an exam. Main homework is to just study. Assigned two assignments the entire semester. As long as you show up and do your readings, you should pass.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz PHYSCI111
Comment: Most boring teacher and class I've ever taken. It's simple in that you just have to study for the quizzes and tests, but all he does is lecture for the entire class, and his monotone voice puts you to sleep. He can be rude sometimes. Don't take if you're not okay with a quiz every class & having to studyread frequently. Take if you memorize easily

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz PHYSCI111
Comment: He expects you to MEMORIZE entire chapters. Does not provide study guides and expects you to spend at least 10 hours for homework per week for his class. His lectures are extremely boring. When asked for help, he told me that if I did not have those 10 extra hours available, it was better to quit.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz PHYSCI111
Comment: This professor is no good. Beware of this clown. He is a tough grader. If you write your name and initial for last name he says half the name so half the grade. His class is very boring and talks about the power points that he doesn't even make all he does is read them something I can do. Expects to do very well when he sucks at teaching.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Floyd Bednarz BIO109
Comment: Great professor and know so much about the topic (Genetics). There are quizzes every week based on the reading, but as long as you skim through the chapter you'll be fine. Offers a ton of extra credit, some people passed with over 100%. For tests and the final, as long as you really go over all the notes and past quizzes, you will ace them.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Richard Haffner MATHSCIENCE
Comment: Mr. Haffner is one of the few teachers that really shows you how to teach math and science.  And face it that is what the teacher prep program is all about!  Mr. Haffner is very passionate about teaching and wants you to be too.  There is no room in the teaching field for people who just want a paycheck.  Teaching is a way of life, not a job.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Richard Haffner MTH111
Comment: he gives information that is not need, and teaches to fast,

Teacher Name: Baker College - Richard Haffner MATH101
Comment: He doesn't use the board at all.  He uses a projector and away goes the problem before you have a chance to finish it. He also has the whole class do story problems aloud going around the room.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Richard Haffner SCI351
Comment: He is a great teacher and he is very helpful

Teacher Name: Baker College - Richard Haffner SCIENCEMETHODS
Comment: I had Mr. Haffner for a class aimed at helping me teach science to students. He did an excellent job helping me prepare! I have taken several classes where the goal was to help me learn how to teach, and instead I spent the semester memorizing facts. Mr. Haffner taught me how to TEACH science.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Richard Haffner MTH111
Comment: This is math I did in 8th grade. I dont really pay much attention to his teaching styles, but it looks ocnfusing. He gives people a chance to get extra points all the time though. extra assignments, extra test questions, stuff like that. He does not like when people go in and out of class either and he HATES cell phones. lol

Teacher Name: Baker College - Richard Haffner MATH
Comment: I think Mr. Haffner is a GREAT teacher.  I had him for the teaching math class and science classes and he aims his lessons towards how to teach the subject not on how much info you can remember and recite on a test!

Teacher Name: Antonelli Institute of Art and Photography - Ronald Cala GD2B
Comment: Pros - creates awesome portfolio pieces out of his students.  Cons- Gets unprofessional super fast, he will scream and holler at his students for the most  minuet things. His critiques last 2+ hours because he tends to repeat the same things over and over and over again. He repeats himself so much its more of a nuisance than a help. Ron beware.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gregory Stone JOUR102
Comment: ok, word of advice, study the powerpoint presentation, pretty much all of the exam comes from that.  this guy is awsome and has a lot of passion for jour. plus field trips! who can complain?!?!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gregory Stone JOUR2000
Comment: Had this guy for two semesters. lectures are very dry, but he throws out a lot of hypothetical situations and prepares you well for interviewing and reporting. knows a lot about the industry, but if you cant take criticism well, dont take the class. he will give you several chances to do well. The textbook sucked, pay attention to his powerpoints.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gregory Stone JOUR2000
Comment: His class really prepares you for a career in reporting. The work load can be fairly heavy, since you are assigned stories that you have to collect interviews for and write an article. He is very accessible and helpful. His lectures can be a bit dry, but he can be funny at times. He really makes you a better writer.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gregory Stone JOURN102
Comment: Interesting only when engaged in a discussion.  Lecture is very dry. Good sense of humor. Don't bother following study guide because his tests are off the wall.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gregory Stone JOUR102
Comment: I love this class. Prof Stone is such a nice guy who is always willin to give you another shot at something. His tests are pretty "off the wall" as said before but i disagree, if you study the studyguide youll do ok, he really wants opinion.  Def take him for this class!

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gregory Stone JOURNALISM
Comment: I have a problem with him making us buy his book during class.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Gregory Stone JOUR2000
Comment: would only recommend this class if you really enjoy journalism and I mean really enjoy it. The professor is very demanding of how he wants things done and there is a ton of writing for this class

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer SPC215
Comment: Excellent teacher. I took her public speaking course and enjoyed every session. Class is fun. Everybody is forced to communicate and I ended up making a lot of friends. I had a great time and Mrs. Spencer is probably the most helpful, kind person I have ever met.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer EDUSPEECH
Comment: An awesome lady. I took both Speech Communications and Intro to Education classes with her and enjoyed both of them very much. She made both classes easy and fun. I highly recommend that you take a class with her.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer SPC215
Comment: great teacher!!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer EDU210
Comment: Presentations all semester long.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer EDU110
Comment: Mrs. Spencer is an awesome teacher. I really enjoyed her class and will be taking her two times next semester. I would reccomend her to anybody.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer EDU110
Comment: Class was mildly interesting, mainly for the fact that most students withdrew from class at the end of the semester; I don't quite get these people, all you have to do is get the 20 observation hours done as soon as possible, do the weekly assignments, and submit them in time. It didn't take me more than 30 minutes to do all those.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer EDU221
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer SPC215
Comment: Karen is an awesome professor I would recommend her to anyone. She knows what she's talking about and really helps you develop public speaking skills. She's kind, understanding, and very clear on what she wants from you as a student. All you have to do is complete your work and speeches on time and you will succeed. She's always willing to help!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer SPEECH101
Comment: Very soft-spoken and easy to talk to.  Has been known to speak her mind when students get out of hand--good for her!!!  Would highly recommend her class.  She is a very kind-hearted woman.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer EDU110
Comment: Teacher is amazing, understanding and helpfull. You really have to dedicate time on homework assignments and 20 hours of observation are required. Lots of presentations but super fun class.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer EDF101
Comment: Made work easy to understand very caring.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer SPC110
Comment: She is challenging, but not too hard. She helped me a lot in public speaking. I have nothing but good things to say about her. :)

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer EDU110
Comment: Extremely easy, and helpful, most carrying teacher I know. You have to complete all 20 hrs. of observation or you wont pass the class. She's always available for any questions u might have. Makes class interesting. All you do is observations, very fun class I learn a lot from her, I highly recommend to take her class, you wont regret it!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer INTROTOED
Comment: she's a great teacher...highly recommend!!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Karen Spencer ALLEDU
Comment: AMAZING!!

Teacher Name: University of Phoenix - Ellen Stokes BCOM275
Comment: She is filled with lots of good information.  Fair

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: Biggest waste of time ever. Take it from a grad student over the summer. You'll learn a heck of a lot more, and get a better grade doing it.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: This guy's an idiot. He spends all the class time going over things that DON'T WORK, expecting you to come to office hours to find out what does work. Hello! Why not try teaching during class time, for a change? Don't expect to do well on the exams.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: Very difficult class. He knows the material, yet pace is way to fast. Lectures don't prepair you for exams. Programs ARE difficult. Forget the textbook. It won't help. Online notes difficult to follow. Course was a waste of time/didn't learn a thing in there/not a good value for this student. Sorry!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: I got an A, so heres my advice: -Dont buy the book. Never used it. -Go to class ALWAYS. If you miss a class, youll get behind very fast because the class is taught at turbo speed. -Dont take his attitude personally, he treats everyone like an idiot. -Dont be discouraged by the midterms: I got 67% (avg=40%) and 65% (avg=60%) and still got an A!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: I've never hated a CS class as much as this. Smart guy, HORRIBLE teacher. His tests are atrocious! OMG, I've never had a class where the 80% of the test questions are based on material not explained in class. Only a math genius will be able to do well.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: Very hard class! Very theoretical, programs aren't too bad. There seems to be a large curve in the class. Dr Cull tries hard to get you to understand, and is very enthusiastic for the material

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: Enthusiastic guy. Not my style of teaching. Tough class. Curve makes it relatively easy to pass.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: Horrible horrible teacher.  The fact that he brought cookies to class after tests to "ease" the pain tells you how great of a teacher he was.  Trust me, if you can take this class over the summer from a TA or maybe a chittering squirrel you'd be better off.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: Quite possibly the worst professor I've ever had here in my four years at Oregon State. In the ENTIRE TERM, we were not given a grading distribution. I didn't know how much my exams were worth and how much my assignments were worth. When asked in class about this, Cull just laughed. The 1st midterm had an avg of 45/100! Take at your own risk.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: Worst CS class ever. Lectures are impossible to follow. Material itself not much better. Average on the first exam was 24% The curve at the end of term was decent though.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: Spitting image of Gimli from LotR.  Seems like a nice guy in class, don't let it fool you.  Class is impossible!  Nothing he says makes sense at all, but you'll pass anyway because like 40% is an A.  Ridiculous and useless.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: Covers material fast at the beginning but then gives it time to sink in without much new stuff. The tests are over exactly what was presented in class and the home work, but most people do poorly on them. If you show improvement you will do fine.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS535
Comment: Expects you to have a firm grasp of CS so that you can follow lectures.  He is very smart and will endeavor to make things clear.  Grades on effort, so the class is pretty easy.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: Terrible class.  Worst i've taken at OSU.  Dr. Cull would rather be at a math party or out writing dry papers to publish.  No grading scale even presented, so it's all up to his HUGE curve at the end to determing your final grade.  It's a required class, but very little learning involved!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: Worst class I had at OSU. Cull EXPECTS you to come to office hours. Sorry, dude, I have a life. I'm expecting to get taught DURING CLASS. I don't have 10 hrs a week to spend in your office (plus doing your homework). Your teaching methodologies suck.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: "Ego involvement"

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: It's an extremely hard class, but you gotta take it.:) Just try your hardest, and talk to him if you have troubles. 95% of the people will fail all the tests.  Just do well on your homework (they will take forever), and the curve at the end will save you.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: Hardest class at OSU, but one of the most rewarding.  Just because he forces you to think does not instantaneously make him a monster.  Office hours are very helpfull if and only if you are willing to learn and come with a determined attitude.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: A difficult class, made more so by not having satisfied the prerequiste classes. There seemed to be an expectation of going to office hours. I had a question on on an exam, I needed to beg to get extra points added, I found it distasteful. Did it anyways.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Paul Cull CS325
Comment: Your brain will twist in knots, but it's worth it.  Go to his office hours and don't copy everything he puts on the board - it won't be on a test. Generous curve if you make an effort - he just wants you to think.  Leave your ego at the door.

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Laurie Stanton EDUC317
Comment: You write so many LP's in this class so be prepared! and Their is 3 big projects but nothing too bad. Their is also a final (better study!)

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Laurie Stanton EDUC317
Comment: I loved Laurie. This was the first class I had taken that  required creating LPs so I was nervous at first. But she is very helpful and demonstrates a lot which I really liked. She also gives you chances to resubmit LPs once you see what you need to fix! I learned so much and would gladly take her again. She is also very sweet. :]

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Laurie Stanton EDUC325
Comment: Hands down the most unprofessional professor I had during my time at La Verne. Poor communication, emails riddled with spelling errors and written in a pink font, gum chewing while she lectured - it was pretty awful. I also felt that the assignments for this class were irrelevant to the class so that was pretty frustrating too.

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Laurie Stanton EDUC325
Comment: Play by the rules.  This teacher doesn't reward ingenuity or thinking outside the box.  This class was just another hoop to jump through.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Roy Pettibone COST130
Comment: Study abroad class in Italy. Worst professor ever. I had a 3.9 GPA before taking his class. He expects you to read the chapter on your own, and then he evaluates you. It is not a teach then evaluate thing. You can't get a proper response on any question. He looked at me thru the glassdoor at 1 minute after class started and proceded to lock me out

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Roy Pettibone BA435
Comment: Great

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Roy Pettibone TECHCOMM
Comment: Was very helpful, would highly recommend him as a teacher.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Roy Pettibone BUSIN436
Comment: Very Poor Instructor

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Roy Pettibone ACCTINT
Comment: Roy was terrible. He says that he gives you the "topics" that the test is going to be over. This is totally false. Anything he tells you is going to on the test is not and all the things he said arnt going to be are and have questions completely revamped to an entire new level from what you go over in class. He thinks is is good but not at all.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Roy Pettibone BC443
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Roy Pettibone ACCT131
Comment: Roy is a more difficult professor. I have yet to find a "good" accounting professor. They give lectures in a way that makes it seem like you already know the information. You have to work hard to do well in his class. I respect him while I did not like him very well as a professor. He knows his stuff, but he should find a better way to teach it.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Roy Pettibone BC325
Comment: Roy is the best. He knows what he teaches; uses real life examples.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Roy Pettibone ACCT435
Comment: I had Pettibone for several years as a professor. Great teacher. He gives excellent real life business examples to expand the book lessons. Yes, he expects you to read the textbook. Shocking.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Roy Pettibone ACCT131
Comment: 06A:131 (Inc. Meas.) had him for study abroad in Italy... best professor ever! He really works to build rapports with students and is always willing to help. He will take students out for Chinese if you ask nicely! His classes are not easy, and he will definitely make sure you know the material inside and out, but he is a super effective professor.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO202
Comment: Mr. King is a great instructor! Super helpful and provides study guides for every quiz and exam!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO202
Comment: First Bio Class where I actually learned and retained what I learned. He lectures on the very material he will cover in the exams. Take notes.... He also provides a guide so you're not all over the place studying things that aren't going to be on the exams/quiz. Other Professors should take note. Best Prof. At AWC thus far.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO201
Comment: Excellent Professor!! best biology teacher ever. He cares about his students and treat us with respect.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO202
Comment: Proffesor King, by far my favorite Proffesor I have ever had! His an amazing educator and overall an amazing human being. He cares so much for his students success.  Do the study guides!! That's your exam! Front to back! Take good notes :)  Overall I got B on Bio 201 and B on Bio 202, I wish he was a Bio 205 Proffesor because his the best!!!!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO201
Comment: excellent professor! wish he was teaching anatomy 2

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO201
Comment: He is an amazing professor. He gives you all the information you need for quizzes and exams, but you do need to study!! You can't miss a class because you will miss a lot of information. He is always wiling to help and goes beyond expectations. He is always available if you need help. You will learn a lot and he will make you love his class.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO202
Comment: There is a lot I can say about Doctor King. He is one of those professors that leave a big mark on you. He is so knowledgeable. You don't need to study a lot because the way he teaches helps you a lot to learn.  I really appreciate this professor! I haven't had such a professor like him. THE BEST hands down. Thank you Doctor King!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO201
Comment: I took his A&P back in 2010. Love his teaching style and I found his study guides challenging, yet useful when preparing for exams.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO201
Comment: Awesome instructor.. Really knowledgeable of the material and cares about students.. I will take A&P 202 with him for sure..

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO202
Comment: Prof. King is a very tough teacher. However, he is extremely helpful nad his letures are very clear. You will learn a lot in his class, but you will also study very hard.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO201
Comment: He is one of the best professors I have ever had.  I learned so much and he only talks about the material he will be testing you on.  His study guides are exactly what you will get on the tests and quizzes.  Very nice guy!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO202
Comment: Prof. King is such a nice guy. He is very informative, passionate about biology and teaching it to his students. He give you everything you need to get an A in his class. His class is easy to understand and he gives excellent study guides.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO181
Comment: He is really good at teaching and delevering the message to the students. AWESOME professor

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO201
Comment: Currently taking King for 201. He is seriously such an amazing professor and I love coming to class. Very straightforward with quizzes and exams and provides a study guide for each, do them! He is very easy to contact or find outside of class and is willing to work with you if there is something you are not understanding. Can't wait for 202! :)

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO202
Comment: Professor King took his time to thoroughly explain each subject in a simple manner. I really appreciated how available he was to answer any questions. The study guides are very similar to the tests. If you put it in the time to study then you'll pass. He is a very caring professor who makes the topics interesting. I would recommend him to many.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO202
Comment: Great teacher, his lectures are very interesting and what he lectures on is what he will include on test and exams no surprises.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO202
Comment: THE BEST PROFESSOR EVER. STUDY GUIDES ARE EXACTLY LIKE THE EXAMS/QUIZZEZ. IT'S EVERYTHING A COLLEGE STUDENT DREAMS FOR

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King 202
Comment: Prof King is awesome! his lectures are clear and to the point only covers the material that will be on the tests or quizzes. Answers any questions you have before the quiz or test. Truly cares if his students understand the material.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO202
Comment: Mr. King is a great teacher and I enjoyed his class very much. He provided study guides for all quizzes and exams. He is very helpful and will answer any of your questions.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - John King BIO201
Comment: Dr. King is just an amazing human being, he teaches straight to the point , he is always willing to help you and answer any questions you might have. I had lost hope on myself and he gave me that back. Believe me you wont regret taking his class.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes MEDTERM
Comment: Dosen't like to explain things. She is not a very good instructor. Do not take if you want an A.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes MED103
Comment: Great teaching style technique and willing to help students out.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes MEDTERM
Comment: Great taecher to have. She is fun and exciting. A teacher who tells you exactly what to study for! How can you go wrong? Let's see never show up, never study, never do your work, never pass the class. Do any or all of those things in any amount and you can't fail. Her personality is stupendous, up-beat, and energetic. She wants you to succeed.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes MEDTERM
Comment: By far one of the best professors I have had while attending Baker.  She takes her job serious and expects her students to take it serious as well. Got a A+ in the calss, so the A is definately possible as long as you are willing to put in the effort.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes PATHO221
Comment: Awesome, Fun, and energetic.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes SCI101
Comment: she was a very big help with anything. if you had to miss class she was there to help you.  if you didnt understand something ask and she would help you to understand it.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes ANATOMY
Comment: Best professor I ever had! Learned more from her than any other teacher.  Recommend for med term.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes APSCI
Comment: Simply awesome ! She is wonderful ! I wish she taught everything !

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes SCI102
Comment: I adore Dr. Rhonda. She takes complicated material and explains it in a way that everyone can understand. She can be tough but I have learned so much from her class. Highly recommend her to anyone taking A&P.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes MED103
Comment: I absolutely LOVE her! She is the best teacher I have ever had! I have her for anatomy and med term and she rocks! She has a great personality and will help you whenever you need it! Plus, she will tell you what to study for, so you aren't wasting your time on other meaningless things while taking other classes as well.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes MED1920
Comment: Dr. Rhonda Rocks!

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes SCI100F
Comment: Organized and passionate about teaching, she could teach rock science and everyone would walk away with some knowledge learned. Dr. Rhonda is by far the best teacher I have had in life.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes MED103
Comment: Great instructor! Very clear. Always willing to help a student. Clearly explains assignments. I wish she would teach all of my courses

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes MEDT1
Comment: She is a very helpful and caring person.  She is willing to go the extra mile to help each and every student!

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes MEDTERM
Comment: She is one of the best instructors at Baker! She has very strict rules that you must follow but she has a very interesting way of explaining the material. Gives great reviews for her tests! You just have to study and you will pass!

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes SCI211
Comment: She is awesome.  She has so many great stories that go along with the lecture.  She will even help you with other class.

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes MEDICALTERM
Comment: Her tests are easy if you study for them.. But doesnt explain things well enough

Teacher Name: Baker College - Rohnda Hughes MEDICALTE
Comment: This instuctor is the best of the best.  Class is eciting and lots of fun but only if you do the work.  She lays down the law but it is very fair and when you follow it, SUCCESS "A"

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLSCI201
Comment: Grading scale is absurd. Got B's on the midterm and final, an A on the final project, but he seems to think I didn't participate in class so I lost 10% of the final grade. Criteria is straight from the textbook and watch movies 50% of the time. Avoid if possible. 4 grades total during semester: Midterm, Final, Project, & participation.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLSCI201
Comment: Prepare yourself to sit in class for an hour and 20 minutes to hear a lot of criticism about what's going on in the world, especially in the U.S. Nevertheless all you have to do is to memorize answers of multiple choice questions at the end of every chapter in order to pass. At the exam you'll see the same exact questions. It's an easy A class.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad 225D
Comment: Amazing teacher!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLSCI201
Comment: Professor Gulzad is an interesting professor. He always makes it a goal to use current day events as an example to explain what is talked about in the class. He also makes it clear on what you have to do in order to get a good grade in his class.A proper college student who attends class, pays attention and is willing to work, can't fail the course

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLSCI204
Comment: I took Professor Gulzads class last semester and I was amazed with the amount of knowledge this professor have about politics and history. He is an outstanding individual with a lot of experience and credentials. He knows what he is teaching and he makes it very easy for you to understand the course. I definitely recommend him and his course.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad 225D
Comment: Zalmay is very knowledgeable in Political Science. He has multiple degrees, PHD's in this field and is able to look at politics from a different angle since he is not originally from the US. I recommend everyone to take his class whom are willing to listen any kind of ideas and willing to challenge their ideas.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLISCI
Comment: Zalmay is a crusty, old, cynic-perfect for poli sci. I'd sooner have a cup of coffee with him than a lecture but I like him. At times it seems he doesn't have a filter, but it may be that he has a neutral stance in a culture that is not neutral. Language barrier is very slight. Questions are mostly taken from the textbook.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POL201
Comment: Mr. Gulzad is a very knowledgeable professor. Lectures weren't long; we usually got out 30 min early. He's willing to help you as long as you're respectful and want to learn.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLSCI
Comment: He was such a horrible professor!He would favorite people and have them do his work for him.He barely even lectured and talks horrible things about the US gov. His midterm and final are from the back of each chapter and some questions he throws in.A waste of my time!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLSCI201
Comment: While not an amazing teacher he is quite the intellectual.  I would like to have seen us have more open discussion about politics if we weren't going to spend it being really "taught" anything.  Much of the course came from movies, oftentimes conspiracy theory films like Zeitgeist, which is hardly appropriate for this class.  Really good guy though

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad 1037
Comment: He doesn't teach the class  He can talk about irrelevant stuff in the class He only grades you for the first test . The power point and the last test and attendance I asked him question's and he didn't even look at me to pay attention I felt disrespected.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLISCI204
Comment: great professor! he knows exactly what he's talking about, this class is incredibly easy to pass if you do the section reviews at the end of the chapter cause thats where he gets his test questions from. i recommend everyone to take any class he teaches!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLSCI201
Comment: Professor Gulzad has good teaching method very knowledgeable I always struggled with Political Science but currently I am taking his Political Science course and his lectures are very informative, he makes you understand the content better give plenty of examples. I would highly recommend his classes hard working students will do good in his class

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLSCI201
Comment: I took Mr. Gulzad's class this semester and I thought that he was a great professor. He gave good examples relating to real life events which helped me understand more the course. It also helped showing us movie clips related to the course.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POL201
Comment: Didn't like his class whatsoever. I didn't learn anything.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLSC204C
Comment: Dr. Gulzad is an amazing professor he incorporates the curriculum book, his personal knowledge, and daily current issues into his lectures. If you are a lazy student, then you will not make it in his class. Dr. Gulzad is very helpful to students, he is very clear when he is lecturing that makes him easy to understand. I would take his class again.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLISCI201
Comment: if you like to sit in class and do nothing for more than an hour, then you'd like this class. He spends most of the time talking about how terrible the US is. He totally messed up his grades last semester, so im waiting for mine to be adjusted. He doesn't know the basics of technology and always asked students to help him. Beware his class.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLSCI201E
Comment: Excellent professor;  Heshe is easygoing and engenders a lively mood...

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLSCI204C
Comment: Awful,awful man. Not at all helpful and has an issue with African american females. Feels that he doesn't have to explain or clarify anything including justification of grading. He doesn't teach at all just gives you exams directly from each chapter review verbatim.  He doesn't seem to kin on the US so may he should go back to his home land.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Zalmay Gulzad POLSCI
Comment: Professor Gulzad is one of my favorite professors. He is very helpful when you need him and he is always available when it comes to helping his students. His lectures are based on today's issues, so indeed his classes are ought to be learned from.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Epapante "Penny" Vlahos CHEM1127
Comment: Shes a good teacher. A lot of people who did poorly in her class were the complainers who, HA HA (no surprise here), didnt study or even remotely try to prepare for class or pay attention. im a math/science person, but its not THAT hard to get an A in this class. her weekly hw assignments required more thinking than the tests in my opinion...

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Epapante "Penny" Vlahos CHEMISTRY
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Epapante "Penny" Vlahos MARN3000
Comment: I really enjoyed this class. She is enthusiatic about the subject and willing to give extra help when needed. If you pay attention to her lectures you will do well.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Epapante "Penny" Vlahos CHEM128
Comment: She goes REALLY fast during the lectures, so be sure to take notes. She only offers the class at 8AM, which is tough. However, she is very willing to help if you have questions and does not belittle you like some other professors. I am not good at Chemistry, but I am doing well in her class.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Epapante "Penny" Vlahos CHEM127Q
Comment: She just can't get the information across.  I had to withdraw because of the lack of clarity in the class.  If you're good at math and don;t need lots of help, this class is for you.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Epapante "Penny" Vlahos CHEM127Q
Comment: Very helpful teacher. Very nice. Her grading is fair and her tests are fairly straightforward. If you need to take chemistry, take it with her.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Epapante "Penny" Vlahos CHEM128
Comment: No surpises with her on tests. She will help you immensely on many things. In and out of class. She will also help you out on assignments for the lab.

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Epapante "Penny" Vlahos MARN3000
Comment: Just a great teacher

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Epapante "Penny" Vlahos CHEM127
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Epapante "Penny" Vlahos CHEM127
Comment: Great professor, knows her stuff

Teacher Name: University of Connecticut Avery Point - Epapante "Penny" Vlahos CHEM1128
Comment: She cares about the students and teaches the material clearly

Teacher Name: Coastal Pines Technical College - Angela Brownlee ENGL1102
Comment: Extremely difficult to work with. Does the exact opposite of motivate you. Will tutor you but get ready to get treated very little of. I use to love English and always received the best grades for it in high school, but her class has made me extremely dislike even the thought of the subject.

Teacher Name: University of Nottingham Medical School - Andrew  Bennett LIFE3000
Comment: Absolutely awful. Had him as a supervisor and hes not been helpful at all. Never checks emails. Always never in the office. Had 2-3 meetings with him in one year.
