Never checked up on progress & given feedback that was long overdue. Got intro draft 3 months later (1 month before ddl) and another draft 2 days before the ddl. Ridiculous!!!

Teacher Name: University of Nottingham Medical School - Andrew  Bennett PHDSTUDENT
Comment: Doesn't read emails  Be lucky if he attended any meeting  Sarcastic and not helpful kind  Talk down to student  Not sure he understand the subjects he is working with

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MATH245
Comment: Stephanie was very helpful! She provided great extra credit opportunities and regularly checked in with students. I would definitely take her classes again!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MTH112
Comment: The delay in communication makes the online class a huge FAIL. I needed help many times, had to call ecampus to get on her about it. If she can't handle it, she doesn't need to be teaching an online class. I STILL never got my midterm back because she "couldn't find it". When I needed help, it wasn't there, and this is ESSENTIAL in an online class.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MTH112
Comment: She explains the concepts behind math, and never teaches how to implement them. Leads to extreme confusion with homework and midterms, and thus bad grades. Although she's very nice, I Would definitely choose another teacher.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MATH252
Comment: Had a great class with her. I had an online math course and it was the first A I've gotten in a math class since probably middle school. Part of it was the platform she used for the homework but she also offered the opportunity for extra credit which was great because I'd accidentally missed a discussion board and it hurt my grade. Recommend!!!!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MTH112
Comment: The only problem I had with my lectures were the people who start packing up early.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MATH245
Comment: If you're looking to take a class with her online, I'd recommend taking a different one or even going to a local community college to get your math credits. I've been extremely frustrated with her lack of feedback and accessibility which is crucial for an online course. Your overall grade is heavily dependent on the midterm and final.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MATH105
Comment: Stephanie is such a sweet person! She makes topics so so easy to understand and goes at the perfect pace for anyone. Online homework was super frustrating, but it wasn't her fault. I highly recommend her!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MATH245
Comment: She is a great professor although she missed many classes this term. Otherwise, I learned a lot and she made sure we knew the material. If the class didnt get it, she would make up similar problems and would try to teach it in a way would would get it. Downfall, she does not answer her emails and when she does, its many days later.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MATH105
Comment: She is a very nice teacher and fun to listen to. Her class is pretty easy (Math 105), lectures are a little boring, but easy to catch up if you miss one.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MATH241
Comment: She is awesome and really wants to help you.  I found the set up of the class more than fair, but you still have to put in work.  There is a weekly recitation and online homework.  She definitely helps you prep for exams.  Would highly recommend!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MATH390
Comment: She is amazing! She is the most caring professor I have ever had. She wants to get to know you. If I ever needed anything she would be the professor I would go to. She is a very easy grader but makes sure that you understand the information. She is clear on expectations. 10/10 would recommend and will take her classes again.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MATH212
Comment: Stephanie is an average professor; she leads with a mini lecture then brings out notes or an activity. Her instructions are over simplified in an irritating way. She rarely ever responds to emails, but she does grade tests and quizzes quickly. Her methods of teaching are a bit confusing, however, she always has great teaching assistants in the room

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MATH112
Comment: I actually really like Stephanie. She's very sweet and if you need help, she'll do what she can to try to help you. I'd take her again if I could. A lot of  people tend to talk alot around you though so it's sometimes hard to hear her (she isn't as loud as some others), and I wish she'd actually say something since it's very disruptive.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MTH112
Comment: I think my tags cover most of what I want to say about Stephanie for MTH 112 last winter. I will say I failed the midterm but with all the extra credit she gives and a lot of studying before the final, I got a C+. Extremely clear lecturer and great recitation worksheets.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers 245
Comment: Nice teacher and easy to pass, less homework and the review is similar to the exam

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MATH245
Comment: Basically non-existent in the online course. Goes weeks without any announcements or communication. No feedback on discussions or homework. Takes forever to grade exams.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MTH245
Comment: Great online class, good organization & communication.  Everything is laid out clearly and the reviews match exams.  I would recommend this class!

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MATH245
Comment: Ms. Bowers was a little bit slow to respond to questions and grading at times, and the structure was slightly disorganized. However, her video lectures were very useful for understanding the content, and she was available to help if needed. She gave ample opportunities to improve grades through homework and extra credit.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MTH245
Comment: This is one of the only math class I can genuinely say I enjoyed. The homework wasn't overwhelming (one per week) which allowed me to really focus on understanding the material instead of speeding through it. That was a huge selling point to me.

Teacher Name: Oregon State University - Stephanie Bowers MTH112
Comment: She is really helpful and easy to pass, she will go out of her way to help you.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Jim Grove FILM101
Comment: 1st teacher ever here..i took him for film adaptation! He is soooo awesome..... Take Him for sure!!

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Jim Grove WRITINGFILM
Comment: Jim definately pushes his students, but is there to help them.  Though I still have issues with the fact he would not ever give me anything over a B+ no matter how hard I tried, I do think he was one of the best professors I could have had for my freshman English course. Definately prepared me to get a B+ on the rest of my college papers.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Jim Grove ENGLISH
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Jim Grove EN111
Comment: Jim Grove was an exceptional professor. He was very helpful with all of my writing assignments and personal problems that occurred during my Freshman Year. He is an all around great person, who is willing to do what ever he can to help a student out.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Jim Grove AMNOV01
Comment: Dr. Grove is very intelligent and carries a vast knowledge of american literature.  The course allows you to read some of the finest works in american literature and gain a complex and indpth understanding of each  novel read.  This course has made me better able to think critically about all books I read.

Teacher Name: Mount Mercy University - Jim Grove EN111
Comment: Jim Grove is simply the best professor that MMC has to offer.  Not only does he care about his students, but he pushes them to do their personal best.  He does this not only for the sake of one's grade, but for the sake of learning.  Out of all the professors at MMC, Jim Grove is the one I learned the most from -- both in my writing and in life.

Teacher Name: University of Phoenix - Todd Nickelsberg HCS235
Comment: Loves to show movies.

Teacher Name: University of Phoenix - Todd Nickelsberg HCS335
Comment: Mr. Nickelsberg demonstrates a vested interest in higher learning. He brings real life examples to his lecture and provides the students with resourceful information in preparation for the healthcare industry

Teacher Name: University of Phoenix - Todd Nickelsberg HCS335
Comment: This instructor is excellent and easy going, however you have to work for your grades no passes but very easy going.

Teacher Name: University of Phoenix - Todd Nickelsberg HCS235
Comment: Very nice guy. Helpful but can be a little confusing at times. Very knowledgeable.  Great teacher overall.

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Vincent Carter BUS500F
Comment: Professor Carter also teaches at CSUB, this was an easy class simply do your homework, case studies, group project.  He's VERY easy! Pretty much an A, he is annoying. However, he's easy. So, if you need this get it done.

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Vincent Carter MKTG3000
Comment: Such an annoying professor. Many times irrelevant. Kept arguing i was miscalculating my grade when told to do point tally. Dropped the class, hes so stubborn and always hits you with the there is no further discussion. Horrible professor. This was at CSUB.

Teacher Name: University Of La Verne - Kern County - Vincent Carter MKTG3000
Comment: This professor is absolutely careless. He doesn't care to listen to students questions during lecture. He doesn't even use canvas to keep track of our grades, he just uses emails. I think that is very lazy. There is no assignments apart from exams. He constantly makes students feel stupid. I honestly wished to never take this class.

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH111
Comment: Her lectures/class time was very clear and helpful. She encouraged class involvment which would normally stink but she did it in a non-threatening way in order to make sure everyone understood the material. If you get an overall 97% in the class she doesn't make you take the final!!

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MATH099E
Comment: i did not like her one bit she only went over a few things from the book.. when asked how to do something by hand she told us that it can be done with our calculator and that what it is there for

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH111
Comment: This woman is amazing, easily one of the strongest woman I have ever met! Class is okay, makes it easy to understand. Do your hw for the hw quizzes and you'll be good for the A

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MATH112
Comment: This teacher is a joke she treats you like your in grade school and you can't answer the questions untill the whole class gets the right answer she will not teach you anything horrible teacher i would advise against taking her class

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH111
Comment: Do not take her if you're not confident in your math abilities. On one hand, I see what everyone is saying when they say shes not very helpful and makes you feel dumb. On the other hand, I saw so many people ask questions that they should already know the answer to by this level. She shouldn't have to stop because you're way behind everyone else.

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH112
Comment: Dr. C was so helpful and supportive.  If you make an effort you will do well.

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH2685
Comment: MAKE sure you have your calculator. She demands that you use it.  Don't ever use the word "NEVERMIND" in her class.  She is very condescending.  Unless you have a Full grasp of the subject you will not want to take her.

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH099E
Comment: Great teacher. Do your homework and practice quizez, ask questions when you get stuck, learn concepts and you'll do great in class.

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH099
Comment: Dr.Cascarell is the best teacher to take if you are not naturally good at math, she takes the time to make sure you understand the material before moving on. I hate math and passed with a A in her class.

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH099E
Comment: Dr. C. is an excellent instructor. Very patient but does not tolerate rudeness; we're all adults. If you don't understand something; ask her; she will explain & does very clearly plus she asks if anyone doesn't. Can tell she enjoys teaching math. Highly recommend her!

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH112
Comment: Extremely nice lady. She says we are in college now. Its not up to her to teach it. She gives assignments and go over material, its up to you to learn it! Tough teacher, but structured.Seemsvery intelligent and at times talk down to you. better be a very good algebra student before taking her class. good luck!

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MATH099
Comment: I dont feel I learned anything from her, she talked to us like we were in kindergarten

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH2225
Comment: I enjoyed taking her class. Some of the people before were correct when saying she hates stupid people, if you don't get it she won't like you. As long as you try she is very willing to help and really wants to see everyone succeed

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MATH111
Comment: Pretty nice, she goes over the material thoroughly. Answers any questions you have and is always there if you need her. She won't put you on the spot or embarrass you in front of the class.

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH111
Comment: Very good instructor. Goes over all the material thoroughly. Tests are very fair, does not try to trick you. Would highly recommend for this class, especially for anyone who has knowledge of material going into the class.

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH111
Comment: Unless you are extremely confident in your math abilities .. DO NOT TAKE THIS INSTRUCTOR !!  She teaches very fast and stops for no one. I'm sure she would be a great instructor for an upper level math class, I have no idea why anyone thought she should teach basic algebra to people who struggle with math. BAD IDEA!!

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH112
Comment: I really enjoyed taking this class with this instructor. I was able to pass this class and understand what I was suppose to do. Just be sure to do all of the homework problems and take time to study for tests. It will be worth it. The only thing I did not like about this professor is the fact that she pointed out those with the highest grades.

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH111
Comment: She is a good teacher.

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH112
Comment: I had her for my basic algebra class. If you already know algebra like I did...don't take her. She got so mad at me because I had all my homework done for the entire quarter in the first 3 weeks and when I got pneumonia and missed a take home test she took points off for it being late since I wasn't there to get it the day I was in the hospital.

Teacher Name: Baker College - A Cascarell MTH111
Comment: Dr. C was a great teacher! She will not tolerate immature behavior in her classroom. It was a relief to have her as a teacher, it had been over 10 years since my last math class! She helped me get an A! GREAT TEACHER! Be on time, pay attention, ask questions, do your homework & quizzes!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENG102
Comment: He is a superb teacher. If you are lazy, don't take his class. Really though, if you are lazy, why are you in college. He is very clear in his lectures. Know the syllabus inside and out and keep up with your reading and you will do great. You will get something out of his class!

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENGL201
Comment: He is a Aewsome teacher and care about his students work. I have him for ENGL 201 & LIT 155. -Make sure you go to class or you'll miss out on important information. "T A K E HIM"

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENG102J
Comment: He's a cool guy,but very strict. I can honestly say that I learned a lot from this guy about critical thinking. You must definitely pay attention in his class,and don't miss days or be late. The penalty will be most unpleasant.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENG201
Comment: Excellent teacher; real College Level studies. If you're looking to transfer to a 4-year good College, take his class. You'll be prepared. Straight clear on his syllabus/grading... No bad surprise. Very organized.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENG102
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENGL201
Comment: Commendable :-}

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENGLISH102
Comment: too strict

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENGL201
Comment: Great teacher! Assignments are fun (if you love writing).

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner LIT126
Comment: Excellent Teacher!  Cares about learning and wants students to take pride in their work.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENG102
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENG201
Comment: Committed teacher who cares about his student's performance, a little on the difficult side but well worth it.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENG102
Comment: if you can work hard in his class, you will probably work hard even if you're not taking him. clep is about hard work & avoiding instructors that aren't your cup of tea.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENG102
Comment: he is very enthusiastic about teaching & he wants his students to be just as serious about class as he is. taking the clep would take less work though if you aren't prepared to work hard.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner LIT126
Comment: Great teacher! Very helpful and class are entertaining, great discussions. Fairly easy if you come to class all the time and read. If you're lazy and don't like going to class then don't take his class.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENG102
Comment: He dislike lateness and penalizes it. In addition, he expects his students to participate in class discussions, he calls on them. Always bring the necessary books to class and read beforehand or you will lose pts for in-class exercises based on the book. Turn in all work on time, do the readings, go to every class, participate and you will pass it.

Teacher Name: Harold Washington College - Matt Usner ENG201
Comment: One of the best.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Brian Karasek MAT231
Comment: made the class fun

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Brian Karasek MAT150
Comment: Very helpful and laid back class. He's honest about what is useful and what you don't need to know. I hate math and this class was super enjoyable.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Brian Karasek MATH142
Comment: little Cuttie pie! and kind of cocky!!!!   :)

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Brian Karasek MAT151
Comment: he's a very kewl guy, and easy to talk to and very helpful to his students..

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Brian Karasek MAT221
Comment: Great guy, solid teacher.

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Brian Karasek CALC221
Comment: Good teacher. Must pay attention but makes math fun!

Teacher Name: Arizona Western College - Brian Karasek MATH142
Comment: Good instructor.  I'm a math rock and I got out of there with a 96 or something for a grade.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating HUM1A
Comment: Clark talks more about the historical aspect of Huckleberry Finn, Rowlandson, and Crevecour. He's not a bad lecturer but he's not outstanding either.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating HUMANITIES
Comment: Ughh, he's got to be THE MOST boring lecturer in the whole humanities series.  I couldn't stand the way he kept repeating his thesis (like a million times) Hello! enough is enough!  We get the message!

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating LAW101
Comment: Professor Keating is so good at teaching and make me understand more about law. This class is worth to enroll even grade A is so hard to get.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating LAW101
Comment: She was incredible. She's the best law professor there is. She really knows her stuff and her speeches are so powerful. She does play favorites a lot, but it doesn't take from the fact that she's such a great professor and defense attorney

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating COS126
Comment: Best teacher ever

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating LAW101
Comment: Share a few shots of alcohol with Professor Keating because you'll be up all night. Oh, Theres also cameras everywhere. Apparently they're filming a tv show.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating HTGAFM100
Comment: There is a lot of reading but the good thing is that you actually experience a lot from the court cases.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating LAW101
Comment: Overall, I really enjoyed her class. She taught us what its really like to be a defense attorney, although she only ever took 5 of her students to the courthouse. But now that I think of it, she really did favor those 5 students: only ever calling on them, skipping class with them, and having sleepovers.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating LAW176
Comment: Absolutely the best professor!

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating LAW101
Comment: I won the trophy once and was able to skip the test. Best teacher ever.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating LAW420
Comment: No class work, just case work Love her!

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating LAW101
Comment: Professor Keating may be an alcoholic but she is a hell of a professor. Love her.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating COS255
Comment: So good

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating LAW203
Comment: She's great

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating HUMCORE
Comment: His lectures were clear and usually concise.  His use of artwork to explain the themes of the book was at the least helpful, at the least innovative.  An excellent teacher, I only wish he could replace the three weeks of Van Sant.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating HTGAWM123
Comment: this Professor is tough, like really tough and knows exactly what she is talking about. Knows the material well. If you are strong this isnt the class for you, going to take a lot of sleepless nights. But you will come out with a lot of knowledge

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating LAW101
Comment: Annalise Keating is the smartest professor I've ever had! its guaranteed her clients will never go to jail, and she will do everything in her power to do so. she can be real tough, but she will protect you at all costs, even if it means choosing you over her husband. she'll keep you up all night working on a case, but at least lets you stay over!

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating HUMCORE1B
Comment: i don't sleep in class and i could not for the life of me keep my eyes open.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating CRIM101
Comment: The class is amazing. Even better if you can get chosen to be one of the Keating 5.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating LAW101
Comment: Professor Keating is a lit professor. Share a shot of Henny with her and might as well pass the class. Lucky, I was one of her top 4 favorites in class. Her lectures are HEAVY just like the glasses we drank while solving crimes we did. 100% recommend the class.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating HTGAWM2218
Comment: Professor Keating might be an alcoholic and a tad bit rude. however, she has a good heart. I mean shes managed to keep her students from rotting in jail. Overall, study hard & youll get an A. Buy her henny & shell give you extra points.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating LAW101
Comment: Professor Keating is the most amazing professor I have ever had. Met her husband once and he was a really chill dude. Really liked the blue wallpaper in her home. Give AK a bottle of Vodka and drink with her and you're sure to pass the class. I got the trophy once but the scales weren't on it which I thought was odd but still got to skip the test!!

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating 5568LAW
Comment: Oh so nice

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating CRIT100B
Comment: The reading list for the course was interesting and texts were compelling, though he did not inspire, and discussions were often dry when they could have been engaging.  A bit too ivory-towerish.

Teacher Name: Middleton University - Annalise Keating COS126
Comment: Shes the best.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet ENGLA311
Comment: The best writing professor. Works one on one with students, thorough workshops, knows everything about anything, gives great insight and generally cares about the work you do. Be prepared for some serious workshopping of your work, but it pays off. Highly recommended.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet THEAM417
Comment: One of the best professors I have ever had. He is extremely knowledgeable about his subject. Class is always interesting. I have learned so much and become a much better writer. He is also willing to read anything students send to him and offer feedback. It would truly be a loss for a Loyola student not to take a class with him.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet ENG205
Comment: great prof. has an awesome extention policy. willing to work with students!

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet ENGL0
Comment: Took back to back classes, Reading Poetry and Creative Writing, he was very helpful and gives great lectures.  Great for a workshop.  A very published author, has a novel and a collection of short stories, writes a column in The New York Times.  Attendance wasn't bad.  I got two B+ and didn't rreally put much time into my papers.  Great guy . .

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet ENGL412
Comment: He's a great teacher for workshop

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet 201
Comment: Without him I would still be puttering around writing 5 paragraph slop.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet ENGMAJOR
Comment: I love him!  He knows everything and is very helpful  in you have ANY problems.  I want to marry this man haha

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet ENGLA206
Comment: I TOOK HIM FOR READING POETRY AND LOVED THE CLASS. I NEVER HAD ANY INTEREST IN POETRY, BUT HE MADE THE CLASS VERY INTERESTING AND ENGAGING. HE IS VERY SMART, HELPFUL, AND EASY GOING. THE CLASS IS PRETTY STRAIGHT FORWARD AND HE REALLY TRIES TO MAKE IT SO EVERYONE DOES WELL. ATTENDANCE ISNT REALLY MANDATORY, BUT I WENT BECAUSE I WANTED TO GO.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet ENGL412
Comment: Took him for writing fiction and was hesitant on taking another class of his but I did it anyway and I regret it extremely. He does not teach anything else besides grammar. I took screenwriting with his and learned nothing about the topic. All he does is grill students about their grammar.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet ENGL211
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet FICTION
Comment: Has the effect of making people want to be like him. Great writer, loves what he does, but sometimes obsesses over small details and can forget to say anything nice about a story he really liked.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet FICTIONWRKSHP
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet ENGL0
Comment: Took back to back classes, Reading Poetry and Creative Writing, he was very helpful and gives great lectures.  Great for a workshop.  A very published author, has a novel and a collection of short stories, writes a column in The New York Times.  Attendance wasn't bad.  I got two B+ and didn't rreally put much time into my papers.  Great guy . .

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet POETRY
Comment: Took him for Poetry and Creative Writing in successive semesters because I was that intrigued.  Very mild mannered and professional.  Listen to what this man says, he can help you immensly!

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet POETEDIT
Comment: I took him for two classes, and he is amazing.  He will make you  a better writer, reader, and ever speaker. I hated poetry until his class.  Very understanding.  Go out of your way to take one of his classes.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet 2002
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet ENGL211
Comment: One of the best writers in the United states at the present time - is willing to put large amounts of time into helping you improve your writing. Earning top grades is hard - participation does help. Light workload, but simply attending lectures is life changing. Majors, minors, those seeking interesting electives - take this man's class.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet ENGL311
Comment: He's one of the most helpful and encouraging professors I've ever met.  Definitely recommend taking him.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet ENLG
Comment: extremely knowledgable about poetry and all other literature. VERY helpful one-on-one and interesting course lectures. one of the most distinguished professors at Loyola in my opinion. super nice, and his class isn't too demanding or difficult

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - John Biguenet ENG311
Comment: Writing Fiction: Really lenient on due dates. Overall nice guy. Class is more evaluating other people's work than actual leacture

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman ECON101
Comment: Super-nice guy...makes a true effort to make material make sense...very clear at explaining concepts

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman HCC1A
Comment: Okay, what was with the maps? Half of his lectures were dedicated to unnecessary historical and geographical background. He was an okay lecturer, but not really interesting. At all.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman HUMCORE1A
Comment: His lectures were a little harder to follow, but he still presented good points. He also got creative with interpreting pictures and relating it to the books. A lot of people favored him over Hart and Van Sant.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman ECON229
Comment: Not as expected

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman ECON101
Comment: Very dogmatic and simplistic in his thinking, although that's par for the course in Intro Micro.  Seriously, that class makes you stupider.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman PHDEXAMS
Comment: Can make your blood freeze during the orals but definitely motivates you to know your stuff.  An expert on both colonial and 20c American lit.  Good to have on your dissertation committee b/c he's so well-connected professionally.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman HUMCORE1ALECT
Comment: Professor Clark was helpful even though lectures were a bit dry.  He gives a good background to the work he is covering and helps you understand the history of the time.  Worth going to lecture for sure!  He is a very knowledgeable instructor.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman ECON229
Comment: Andrew is pretty easy, very nice, and very helpful. Probably the most fair professor I've ever had. He is really nice in class, but will seriously try to avoid speaking to students in passing. It's kinda weird....

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman ECON110
Comment: Andrew is really nice, and yes, tries real hard to help you understand the material. In fact, he suceeds. Homework is easy, class is relaxed, yet the only issue is for some reason his final was incredibly hard and did not reflect the problem sets we were given. Regardless, Andrew is a good teacher.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman INTROMICRO
Comment: Andrew got me interested in econ-- I've taken 3 more since, with kris and sanjay, even though it is not my major. Andrew is so, so clear and funny

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman ENGLI101
Comment: Awesome Professor!!!

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman ECON101
Comment: excellent teacher

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman HUMCORE
Comment: An engaging and interesting lecturer. His lectures were coherent, creative, and memorable.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman MACROECON
Comment: The man is clear, sometimes too clear. But perhaps not, b/c it there is always 20% or so of the class that still doesn't understand. He's also alarmingly helpful - does he have any time for his fam? cute sense of humour, discriminating inteligence you should expect from an economist, non-radical :(

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman HUMCORE1A
Comment: He was an okay lecturer, he spoke loadly and knew his material, even though at times he could be a bit boring.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman ECON101
Comment: Very laid back. Attendance is not mandatory and you can come in late. He is very nice and funny. All his examples are interesting and engage the class. There is little homework- only online exercises and problem sets every few weeks. He is also a fair grader. But his exams are harder than the problem sets he gives us. Still worth taking his class.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman ECON102
Comment: Andrew is a fantastic introductory economics teacher; he is clear, always available for extra help and further discussion, and provides a fair workload.  Testing is based entirely on problem sets and reading - no surprises.  It doesn't hurt that he's an extremely kind individual.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman ECON101
Comment: He is so funny! He interprets things clearly and his class is always fun.And it's not hard!

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman ECON
Comment: He is a good professor, but I don't like his teaching style.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Andrew Pearlman ECON101
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard HUMCORE
Comment: Professor Clark's lectures were the most interesting this quarter. He used a lot of visuals and had great connections between the three books he covered. He was very interesting and I would definitely recommend him.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard PH5902LOGIC
Comment: The best logic class and easily the most useful course I have ever taken. I use what I learn every day and used it professionally in the US intelligence community (IC) for several years. In a society having lost its ability to think critically, this is a must-have skill. Dr. Leonard is the perfect teacher for this course.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard PH201FALL
Comment: I am rating Dr. Leonard for only one class here, but I have had 4 with him total. He is by far the best professor that I have had throughout my entire college experience. He is helpful, engaged, passionate and more than willing to dialogue with students help them to better understand Christian Philosophy. You'll have to work hard, but it's worth it

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard GEN101
Comment: Seems to be more interested in his own studies. Also, comes across in a boring manner.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard HUMCO1A
Comment: Excellent lecturer. Clear and doesn't beat around the bush when getting his point across. Though it can get boring at times because of the material, he's still a really good professor.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard HUMH1B
Comment: Very clear and concise lecturer. He improved my comprehension and understanding of the texts in HumCore.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard HUMCO1A
Comment: He really knows his stuff but can be pretty boring at times. He's not the relaxed type and always starts lectures a couple of mins early so get there early! He always gives a lot of background to what is being read and is into studying art related to the work. He also likes to read from the book...aloud in class....a lot.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard HCORE1A
Comment: you reallyyyy have to pay attention in his lectures because his outline for his notes are very minimalist. he uses a LOT of pictures and he seems like a way chill person. overall, a pretty good lecturer

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard PH101
Comment: Challenging professor, but great structure and presentation in his courses. I have had 2 courses with him.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard PH5902LOGIC
Comment: He teaches confusing Logic.  He expects you to know how to do exercises without first explaining. I recommend taking the course with another teacher.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard PH1900
Comment: If you're  stupid, lazy, or just looking for an easy class, move along-to another school. Dr. Leonard's not for you. If you're interested in learning and appreciate genuine and honest critiquing, don't miss his Critical Thinking course. He was very open and available. I use what he taught me extensively. I reference his text books at least weekly.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard HUM1A
Comment: Not as clear as the other lecturers, didn't talk directly about the texts as much.  Lectures were pretty easy to follow.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard HUMCO1A
Comment: He was more helpful than Van Sant, however still boring, sometimes unclear, but very very intelligent. With his lectures I think its best to bring a recorder then play it back! He brings up interesting points , but honestly iin the morning its hard to follow.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - David Leonard ENG102B
Comment: I recommend Professor Clark- not only does he teach an interesting topic, but he has a sense of humor which pairs well with his extensive knowledge on American history. He gives most people B's. Only about 10/90 students received an A. Lectures are easy to follow even if you haven't read.

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Al Mohler THEOLOGY
Comment: Wow.

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Al Mohler THEO2700
Comment: While a great mind theologically, and a very helpful class, yet he shows up late or not at all many of the classtimes.  I guess something else is more important.  When he was there the lectures were amazing and accurate.  When he wasn't it was sub par stand ins.

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Al Mohler THEOLOGY
Comment: he's a great man and a great thinker. his class, however, was one of the easiest i've ever had, especially compared to Stinson's classes.

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Al Mohler THEOLOGY
Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Al Mohler THEOLOGY
Comment: Mohler pushes his ideology rather than teaching. He doesn't challenge students to think and doesn't accept challenges to his thinking. He has been a good seminary president but should stay out of the classroom.  He does a very poor job of preparing students for the challenges of pastoring in the 21st century. Avoid his classes.

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Al Mohler NT101
Comment: The most well spoken Theology and Current Issues prof at Southern. All negative comments on this page were written by students who haven't sat in his course b/c there is usually a waiting list to get in. He does keep a busy schedule however, and we often ended up listening to a teaching assistant instead, bummer! Very biblical and thought provoking

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Al Mohler 27177THEO
Comment: This was really a preaching class that incorporated the Shepherd's Conference as part of the work load. I've been preaching for 7 years and continually want to get better. As a result of the books we read, lectures we listened to and reviewing 3 sermons we preached I think this has been one of the most valuable classes I've taken.

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Al Mohler THEOLOGY
Comment: A politician

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Al Mohler SYSTHEO1
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Al Mohler THEO2700
Comment: Syllabus promised April 13, it's May 4 and still nothing. Class starts in 6 days. The books used are his books and his new one coming out. If he cannot meet promised deadlines, why should I trust the rest will go ok?

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Al Mohler TH317
Comment: speaking ability was good, but the content was poor. for a contemporary issues in theology and culture class i wish we could have interacted with issues in theology, not just sexual issues. overall, slightly disappointing

Teacher Name: Colorado Northwestern Community College - Martha  Powell 20410
Comment: Kathy is all about helping students succeed. She gives a block of time to turn in HW & it counts as part of your grade- very helpful. She puts all the powerpoints online. A grp of us took the class via POLYCOM, so we did not need to travel to the Craig Campus. You need economics, take her.

Teacher Name: Colorado Northwestern Community College - Martha  Powell ENG100
Comment: This picture is hilarious. He's really nasally and his lectures are boring and dry like his personality. I think he's approach to grading is out of whack.

Teacher Name: Colorado Northwestern Community College - Martha  Powell ENG100
Comment: AWESOME LECTURER, just PAY ATTENTION and you don't even need to read the text. He's amazing. In Eng 100, the text is heavy and hard to understand, but if you take good notes in class and talk to Clark about things you don't understand, you'll do ok. BUT YOU GOTTA STUDY: seriously, it's not easy, but you can gain so much knowledge from this class.

Teacher Name: Colorado Northwestern Community College - Martha  Powell ENG100
Comment: you really have to do the reading and go to lecture to get a good grade. grade is based on two exams and the final, attendance and participation are not considered, he's a tough grader, he explains a lot of the readings in class but at the end of his sentences, he lowers his voice, so you really have to listen. boring class, but informative.

Teacher Name: Colorado Northwestern Community College - Martha  Powell ENG100
Comment: English 100 is the worst English course I have ever taken.Theory is something you either love or hate (I hated it).You might as well take this professor because he's better than Warminski. You must attend class and you have to take very detailed notes. I'm an A/B student and I studied my ass off for this class, but still got a B-

Teacher Name: Colorado Northwestern Community College - Martha  Powell ENG100
Comment: Prof Clark is wonderful! You have to read, attend class and use your brain! If you make the effort, Clark will work with you. Attend office hours and introduce yourself to him. He is extremely helpful and understanding if you have any issues with the material or the class in general. Read the material, Show up, take notes, and you will do fine!

Teacher Name: American Career College - Kristine Bustos NURS400
Comment: Miss Bustos is a very chill teacher. Her quizzes and exams are very easy and as long as you read her slides you'll be fine. However you must really study for the proctored exam on your own because she doesn't go in depth with the proctored exam materials. She's is also a very fun clinical teacher and teaches everything step by step.

Teacher Name: Assemblies of God Theological Seminary - Daniel Morrison Morrison PTH514
Comment: Great teacher, he makes you think. Some students didn't like him because he makes you think for yourself. Get ready to work.

Teacher Name: Assemblies of God Theological Seminary - Daniel Morrison Morrison PTH514
Comment: Dr. Morrison spoke down to the entire class. He tells you that you are wrong but can't back up the reason why only that his interpretation of the Bible is better. I've never doubted myself more as a preacher, and I hope other young pastors avoid this class and that feeling. Ministry is hard enough, we don't need to be wounded by our educators.

Teacher Name: Piedmont College - Phillip Moery BUS3130
Comment: Very inconsistent in his grading. Grades based on personality. Do not take him.

Teacher Name: Piedmont College - Phillip Moery BUS3130
Comment: Do not take him. Grading is too subjective.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PHY101
Comment: Class & Lab is hard especially w/ him, but he's helpful and understanding if you go to him for help.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PY
Comment: He really wants to make you think and learn, not just spit back information.  He's a great guy who makes physics fun and worth all the work you have to put into the class.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PHYS450
Comment: the material thought was very fulfilling information and he was an easy grader and due dates were very acceptable due dates

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PHYSLAB
Comment: I had Dr. Grosse for Physics I and II labs and he was an excellent teacher.  He rides a bike to school every day, too.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PHYSICSLAB
Comment: not clear, condescending, and not organized

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PY101
Comment: The class isn't easy, but he's a great guy

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse DIGITALELECTRO
Comment: Difficult. he knows his****, but he's tough at times.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PHYS450
Comment: Very knowledgeable. Dr. Grosse is extremely experienced and does his best to share his knowledge. He is always willing to help and often goes the extra mile.

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse CS201
Comment: from an old alum... i credit dr. grosse with the reason i got my first job and still love working for the same company (for 12 years!).  like it or not those COBOL skills and his emphasis on 'work ethic' were key!...

Teacher Name: Susquehanna University - Fred Grosse PY102
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews ABNORMAL
Comment: Really nice and class is interesting. You learn a lot and if you study the tests aren't too difficult. She's very helpful.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews CLINPERSONAL
Comment: great teacher, very experienced and very approachable if you are serious about your coursework. she is very easy if you read and study both the text and the notes.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews DEVELOP
Comment: very no-nonsense but also very clear and approachable

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews ABNORMAL
Comment: She's very clear about what is on the tests.  The multiple choie parts are actually standard for the book, so read the book nad you'll do fine.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews PSYCHA235
Comment: Abnormal Psych! Great lectures, nice lady! The tests are a little hard but as long as you read before the test youre fine!

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews PSYCHWOME
Comment: Very great professor. Psych of Women was not as awful as I thought it would be, but the text was VERY biased. Multiple choice questions on the test have more than 1 right answer, but you have to choose the BEST answer, which makes the test kind of hard. Panels can be fun. Not an easy A, but far from impossible to get an A.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews CLINICAL
Comment: Dr. Matthews is great, she knows alot.  Listen and you can learn sooo much from her. Study your notes and read the book and you'll do fine.  She's excellent if you need help with anything from grad school to volunteering.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews PERSONALITY
Comment: If you read the chapter and take notes you will do fine.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews ABNORMAL
Comment: She conveys the material well and knows her stuff. Attendence isn't required but you get a bonus if you miss a minimal amount of classes. It taught from a clinical perspective which makes it less interesting than it could be.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews PERSONALITY
Comment: dr. matthews is by far the most helpful professor i've had at loyola.  she genuinely cares about your future, if you express interest in graduate studies, she really helped me out during the application process.  her classes are extremely interesting, she is an excellent lecturer.  take notes and read, the tests are very straightforward.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews WOMENSPSYCH
Comment: tests difficult and detailed..interesting topics though

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews ABNORMAL
Comment: Read the textbook and her notes and you will do just fine

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews PSYCA240
Comment: Dr. Matthews is one of the best teachers I have ever had.  She may not come of as that interesting at first, but once she gets into her subject she is fascinating.  She brings in lots of patient videos to watch and makes the class fun.  I would take her again anytime!

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews PSYCA440
Comment: Had her for theories of personality. Amazing class, she really knows her stuff and presents it in an interesting way. She is also very willing to meet up to talk about the material. Would definitely recommend :)

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews ABNORMAL
Comment: she's very clear and to the point. You will learn and it's not too hard.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews ABNORMAL
Comment: Great Teacher! She has so much experience in the field of psych which make her lectures very interesting. Make sure that you read the chapters in the book because the tests are a combination of lecture notes and material from the book.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews ABNOR001
Comment: Matthews has the same class structure and usually keeps in line with the syllabus for topics, tests, and the papers.She is willing to stop her lecture (or slow down) if any one person needs clarification/elaboration on a topic.She's pretty clear and the writing portion of her tests are strictly from lectures (just take decent notes).

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Janet Matthews PERSONALITY
Comment: You can easily pass her class if you read the book and take notes. She is not hard and very sweet lady.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - Marvin Jones HI522
Comment: Dr. Jones is an adjunct prof, and teaches online courses. He did not seem to put much effort into the class, and my overall opinion was that the class was not really at the grad level

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - Marvin Jones HERMBIBL
Comment: Unclear on expectations but a great guy. Willing to explain on phone if you take time to call him.  I believe he is now full-time.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - Marvin Jones TH202
Comment: Professor Jones is easy to understand and consistent.  The study guides for midterms and finals always prepare you for what will be on the exam.  This class was on the easier side, which makes it great for a busy semester.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - Marvin Jones HIST101
Comment: The work fo this class was over the top! I withdrew.

Teacher Name: Luther Rice College & Seminary - Marvin Jones HI202
Comment: Pro: Good, comprehensive overview of church history with a emphasis on development of theology over the ages.   Con: I found it very hard to keep up with all the reading each week.  Bottom line: Hard class, but worth the effort.  I liked the emphasis on historical theology.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge ENG201
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge AMERICANPOETS
Comment: His voice finds this one pitch, during class, somewhere in the middle of his range, and it just sticks there for a long time.  Very difficult to pay attention to.  Impressive belly.  Old school, has an odd way of naming authors ("Robert the Frost", "TS the Eliot", or "Ezra the Pound") and likes to read aloud in class.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge LIT
Comment: Despite what people have said, he's quite a good professor. He's extrememly knowledgeable and enthusiastic about the subjects that he teaches, and it is obvious that he loves his job. He challenges his students to do their best work, and is a really tough grader, but I think everyone comes out better after learning from him.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge LIT
Comment: the classroom was on the 3rd floor so he was always panting for most of the class.  impressive belly. will tell you he went to harvard, then oxford.enjoys talking about ewalks,muhamad ali and homosexuals. bring up these 3 subjects and he will give you an A.they called him toosh la farge in the 70s.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge FYS
Comment: He created a hostile discussion environment in my FYS where he mainly lectured.  He does have some interesting stories and a lot of knowledge, but he is quite picky and very anti-PC.  Quite pompous, but at least interesting.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge LIT210
Comment: He is one of the best professors at the school and one of the only professors at the school with a sense of humor. If you're an effete pretentious person, which you most likely are if you're at this school, you might not enjoy his class.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge LIT210
Comment: i'd never fallen asleep in class before this. not only lectures, not only reads aloud (both theoretically tolerable) but does so in a monotone, in rhythm. very lulling. unsure about his grading criterion. gives helpful feedback, i guess. very knowledgeable. could be worth it if you really like the subject.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge FYS
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge MYTHTALE
Comment: Ben is a very old-school teacher. Loves Freud and irony. Will go on tangents about his wives. Despite this, an awesome class. He knows a LOT. A bit self-important, but just laugh at him in your head a little and you'll be fine. He likes to hear himself quoted in essays, but if you disagree and have a good argument he respects that.  He's great.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge LIT202
Comment: Metrical Verse is a very awesome class and Ben does a great job of teaching it, as long as you don't mind knowing a little too much about his sex life.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge FRESHSEM
Comment: He gave me low grades on my essays, so I met with him to discuss how to improve.  After the meeting, I realized that he wanted me to take copious notes of his lectures and then spit his ideas back out to him as if they were mine.  It was all As after that.  Fortunately, he was the only prof at Bard who I knew to do such a thing.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge ENGLITI
Comment: People don't like profs who are tough. Lafarge is funny and knowledgeable, but he won't go out of his way to make you feel better about yourself if your work isn't where it should be. He represents the old school. Who said college should be easy?

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge LIT209
Comment: Offensive, condescending, demeaning, out of touch. Here's a sample direct quotation, completely accurate; verbatim: ?I know that you don?t have really any experience with Blacks. Maybe if you?re wealthy your family had a black cook or black maid. [Pause] Don?t be ashamed- it?s quite common.? I'd putmore quotations but am only allowed 350 characters

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge FYSEM
Comment: Well He gave me bad grades on my paper but was unavailable to help me out.. unapproachable.. classes felt uncomfortable...

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge YEAH
Comment: fun to listen to him talk.  traditional.  the only professor at bard that has ever made me correct my grammar, which i still appreciate.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge LIT251
Comment: La Farge is amazing. He talks a lot, but it's all helpful. He lets you know what's on the final. He's a pretty easy grader. The class pretty much runs itself. Take something with him if your interested in LIT

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge FIRSTYEARSEM
Comment: The classes are somewhat boring, because they mostly consist of him lecturing. When discussion does occur it is very interesting, but I think this happens randomly, not because of encouragement from La Farge. He is very intelligent though. The class might be boring just because the reading material is boring, and so perhaps through no fault of his.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge AMERICANPOETS
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge MULTINA
Comment: Ben La Farge was the finest professor I have ever known, and you are missing out on one of Bard's finest experiences if you don't take a class with him.

Teacher Name: Bard College - Benjamin Lafarge FYSEM
Comment: I do not recommend taking his class is you want to be empowered. He has poor people skills, does not moderate very well, and is boring. LaFarge's strength is his knowledge of history/literature. And when I met with him after class he offered useful/thoughtful feedback on my work.

Teacher Name: Assemblies of God Theological Seminary - Melody Palm PCP663
Comment: Amazing woman. I love Dr. Palm's class. She is such an example, very talented at teaching, interesting, and knows her stuff so well. She does require a lot out of you, but she's upfront about what she wants you to do. I learn a lot in her classes. The grading on her research papers is really harsh, I agree. Get an editor if you take her class.

Teacher Name: Assemblies of God Theological Seminary - Melody Palm PCP663
Comment: Dr. Palm is great, has great real life experience that really helps you grasp concepts. Her assistant ruined the classes for me. Her grading was so unbelievably harsh and inconsistent that I would be left devastated on papers I researched for weeks on. This was not just me, but my whole class. I heard when Dr. Palm grades papers she does better.

Teacher Name: Assemblies of God Theological Seminary - Melody Palm PSY
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Assemblies of God Theological Seminary - Melody Palm PSY
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Assemblies of God Theological Seminary - Melody Palm COUN1111
Comment: The person that grades her assignments is the hardest, cruelest grader.

Teacher Name: Assemblies of God Theological Seminary - Melody Palm PCP663
Comment: Dr. Palm is an excellent professor. She expects a lot out of her students, but in return, they gain a lot of knowledge. In defense of the person who grades her papers, the grading is tough, but the person is always good about writing improvement suggestions which pay off on subsequent papers. I highly recommend Dr. Palm's classes!

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Mark Coppenger MULTMULT
Comment: Excellent classes, presented expectations clearly.  Not typical lecture based format, but very good in doing what he designed it to do.

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Mark Coppenger EVIL1
Comment: Never really answered the main question that the class was dealing with - Problem of Evil.  Overly used the Socratic method of teaching so that we never really got any information from him.

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Mark Coppenger FAITHREASON
Comment: The professor did not explain difficult material.  The requirements for the class were not outlined clearly.  Too many stories and not enough lecture material.  The best part of the class was talking to various philosophers on the phone who knew the material and could actually explain it.

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Mark Coppenger EPIST1
Comment: No Comments

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Mark Coppenger 29740
Comment: Great guy, lousy prof. Never prepared for class because he was so busy with other stuff, rarely interacted with issues raised in our reading, and was completely random. In addition, his understanding of some basic concepts (like natural law) were flat-out wrong, and he is condescending to those who disagree with him. Worst prof ever.

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Mark Coppenger TRUTHCULT
Comment: Christianity, Truth, and Culture was the class. Very random lecture style. No class notes or outline. Not my style at all.

Teacher Name: Southern Baptist Theological Seminary - Mark Coppenger 28500
Comment: In Intro to Christian Philosophy, Dr. Coppenger takes complex ideas from philosophers like Kant and Kierkegaard, breaks them down, and offers practical insight as to why they are important. He cares about his students. He is an engaging and funny lecturer. He is current on Christian & secular news. All of that shapes his lectures. Great class & guy

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PSYCH101
Comment: intro to psych, test are mulitple choice.. easy to make an "a"

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PSYC315
Comment: Extremely solid teacher. His lectures can be boring.  You get e.c. if you miss less than 5 classes. He posts every powerpoint. And every test is straight from the power point. There will NOT be anything on his test that isn't already on the powerpoint though some questions can be tough. And he gives you the essay questions ahead of the exam.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSIO
Comment: The class (physio psych) is hard as hell, but it's not because of Zucker, it's just the material.  He's a great professor who is accomodating and always willing to help.  One of the best profs at Loyola.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSI101
Comment: BEST. PROFESSOR. EVER. This man really cares about his students. he is brilliant and inspiring. best best best!!!

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSI101
Comment: This is by far the BEST teacher that I have ever had. You must take him! He is super cool!

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSIO
Comment: His Physio class seemed rather normal at first and then as the semester went on I realized that he is the spawn of Satan.....His final is in 2 days, lets see how that goes and then I will tell you whether or not this class was worth the time/ effort

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSIO
Comment: This class is somewhat hard, but he tries to explain it in an easy way.  He's a really good teacher and knows what he is talking about, it's just hard to grasp the concepts because there is so much info to learn. He's very helpful and he's funny sometimes in class.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PSY101
Comment: This man is awesome! He's the best professor I ever had!

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PSYC315
Comment: m

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSIO
Comment: Dr. Zucker really knows his material and is willing to answer any questions you may have.  His Physio class is not a cake walk, but I honestly learned more in that class than any other class last semester!

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSIO
Comment: He really knows what he's talking about. Sometimes the lecture was a little challenging, but if you study your notes and do the practice tests, this class is not hard, and it covers material every psyc major should be familiar with.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSIO
Comment: it's ok, but you gotta work really hard

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker 315316
Comment: Tries to make the material harder than what it really is. Gives absolutely no guidance on what material we should concentrate on, especially for physio lab. My advice: take Cognition lab!

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSIOPSYCH
Comment: This class is difficult, but has by far been my favorite psych class at Loyola!! He is a great teacher and explains thing very well. He really knows his stuff and actually makes class entertaining with his quircky jokes!

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSIO
Comment: Physio really is a lot of material, but it is super interesting. It isn't your normal psych course b/c it involves more of the biological aspects of the body and mind. I highly recommend this course. It is a ton of memorizing/learning for one exam, but I loved it!

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PSYCA315
Comment: The material is tough and it is definitely not an easy A, but his lectures are very clear and most of the important material is on the powerpoints he posts on blackboard. He gives test essay questions and examples of multiple choice in advance, and will correct them before the test. Great teacher, love his physio class!

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSSTAT
Comment: I got an A in his statistics clss with a  very minimal amount of effort, but I thought his physio class was nearly impossible.  Not very organized and chronically late.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSI101
Comment: This professor is the BEST I ever had. If you work hard and earn his respect, he will help you in every way. He is AMAZING.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSLECT
Comment: The physio material is hard, but Dr. Z is a great teacher & does a pretty good job of explaining everything. He has a quirky sense of humor & is a fun, nice professor. Lab was great, he almost always let us out early. Tests are hard, but just because of how much material is covered.He gives the essays in advance-big help.  I'd definitely recommend.

Teacher Name: Loyola University New Orleans - Evan Zucker PHYSIOLAB
Comment: In class we did not discuss the material at all, we just went over the directions for the labs.  Every test was hard considering we were given no guidance.  I like this professor's other classes but avoid physio lab at all costs!!

Teacher Name: NewSchool of Architecture and Design - Francis Safaie-Brown ARCHTHEO
Comment: A free thinker!  Take what you can from him.

Teacher Name: NewSchool of Architecture and Design - Francis Safaie-Brown CITYPLANNING
Comment: Your knowledge in City Planning and Development is outstanting.  I understand it is very hard for you to express your knowledge in a 10 week course. My suggestion to you is to structure the letures on the basic or fundimentals of the subject.  It is nice to hear you rant and rave but more sturcture will give us more knowledge about the subject.

Teacher Name: NewSchool of Architecture and Design - Francis Safaie-Brown AR382
Comment: He is an easy going kind of guy and really funny. He runs a late night class so his enthusiasum will keep your attention. He is pretty cool for an old guy. He is British and has all sorts of complaints about America that are fun to listen to.

Teacher Name: NewSchool of Architecture and Design - Francis Safaie-Brown ARCH742
Comment: He's easy and interesting.  Just show up and nod along.  Grades papers easy!

Teacher Name: NewSchool of Architecture and Design - Francis Safaie-Brown AR451
Comment: Safaie-Brown is the ****! Although he's sometimes a little off, and can't help but tell daft jokes in class he's still pretty helpful if you can keep your attention on. Just do the assignments, because they determine your grade...and mind the content of his handouts. They usually have funny comments in them.

Teacher Name: Colorado Northwestern Community College - Charlene Opper NUR106
Comment: Knowledgeable, kind, fair,
